[\[141b.2\]]du thams cad kyang mi rtag par 'gyur ro/_/byis pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyang don med par 'gyur ro/_/bye brag gi gtan tshigs med pas na byis pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs 
[\[141b.3\]]pa ni rtag pa'ang ma yin/_mi rtag pa'ang ma yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha' bzhin du tshogs don med par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po nam mkha' ni rtag pa'ang ma yin/_
[\[141b.4\]]mi rtag pa'ang ma yin te/_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa spangs pas gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyis ka dang /_gnyis ka ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i nyes pas brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po skye ba med pa rtag pas ri bong dang /_
[\[141b.5\]]rta dang /_bong bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_sbal pa dang /_sbrul dang /_bya dang /_nya'i rwa dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/_skye ba med pa rtag par 'gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa yang ma yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po rnam grangs gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[141b.6\]]rtag pa de lta bu'i rnam grangs kyang yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mngon par rtogs pa thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rtag pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 
[\[141b.7\]]mngon par rtogs pa thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni rtag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs byed thams cad kyis mngon par rtogs pa rnams la chos nyid dang /_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dang /_chos gnas pa nyid 'di ni 'dug pa ste/_nam mkha' la ni chos gnas pa mi 'gyur na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni khong du mi chud do/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni shes rab dang /_ye shes kyis rab tu 
[\[142a.2\]]phye ba ste/_blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_ma rig pa'i bag chags kyis rab tu phye ba ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po srid pa gsum po thams cad ni yang 
[\[142a.3\]]dag pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa las byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su rtog pa las byung ba ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po gnyis po yod na rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa nyid du 'gyur te/_gnyis su med pa la ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen 
[\[142a.4\]]po chos thams cad gnyis su med pa dang /_ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid pas na gnyis po dben pa'o/_/des na de'i phyir blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa'ang ma yin te/_blo gros chen po 
[\[142a.5\]]ji srid du tshig gi rnam par rtog pa 'jug pa de srid du rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po rnam par rtog pa'i blo zad pas byis pa rnams kyi rtag pa dang mi rtag par lta ba bzlog ste/_dben pa'i blo zad pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rtag dang mi rtag rnam grol zhing /_/
[\[142a.6\]]rtag dang mi rtag rab phye bar/_/gang gis sangs rgyas rtag mthong ba/_/de dag lta ba'i dbang mi 'gro/_/rtag pa dang ni mi rtag la/_/yang dag bsdu ba don med 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog pa'i blo med pas/_/mi rtag pa dang rtag pa bzlog_/ji srid du yang dam 'cha' ba/_/de srid thams cad 
[\[142a.7\]]'dres pa can/_/rang sems tsam du blta bya ste/_/rtsod pa brtsam par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang mi rtag par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'jug pa dang ldog pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_bdag ma mchis na gang zhig 'jug pa'am/_ldog par gyur na byis pa rnams ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa 
[\[142b.2\]]la gnas pas sdug bsngal zad pa khong du ma chud pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu mi shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas/_blo 
[\[142b.3\]]gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan pa dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rgyur gyur pa/_skye ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad byed pa bdag 
[\[142b.4\]]dang bdag gi spangs pa ni gar mkhan bzhin du 'gro ba nyam nga bar 'jug ste/_de khong du ma chud pas gsum 'dus pa'i rkyen gyi bya ba dang ldan par 'jug na/_rgyu la mngon par chags shing zhen pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyis ni khong du mi chud do/_/thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros 
[\[142b.5\]]pa'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rnam pa mang po bsgos pas/_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa/_ma rig pa'i gnas kyis las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa bdun dang lhan cig tu rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs bzhin du rtag tu lus rgyun mi 'chad pa mi rtag pa'i nyes pa 
[\[142b.6\]]dang bral ba/_bdag tu smra ba las rnam par log pa/_shin tu rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa 'jug go/_/de ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa skyes nas 'jig pa yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bdun po skad cig pa yin te/_yang dag pa ma yin par 
[\[142b.7\]]yongs su rtog pa'i rgyu las skyes pa dbyibs kyi bya ba dang bye brag la dmigs pa/_ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par chags shing zhen pa/_rang gi sems snang ba'i gzugs dang mtshan nyid khong du ma chud pa bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal mi myong bar thar pa'i rgyu ma yin par ming dang mtshan ma dang /_
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]kun nas ldang ba'i 'dod chags kyis bskyod cing skyed par byed pa de'i rgyu la dmigs pa'o/_/zin pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba de dag yongs su zad cing 'gags nas de ma thag tu mi skye zhing gzhan dag kyang mi 'jug pa'i phyir/_rang gi blo'i rnam par rtog pa'i 
[\[143a.2\]]bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal mi myong ba 'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_bden pa dang /_rnam par thar pa la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i blor 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[143a.3\]]gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rab tu ma gyur na/_'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa bdun rnams 'gag pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa rnams de'i rgyu dang de la dmigs par zhugs pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_
[\[143a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir te/_gang gis gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pa dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid yongs su bzung bas 
[\[143a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'jug ste/_chos lnga dang /_rang bzhin dang /_chos la bdag med par mthong bas sa'i rim pa mtshams sbyar ba gzhan du 'phos na ldog par 'gyur te/_gzhan mu stegs can gyi lam la lta ba rnams kyis bskyod mi nus so/_/de'i 
[\[143a.6\]]phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la rab tu gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin bden pa'i sgo'i lam bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag par bzung ba de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_rang gi smon lam 
[\[143a.7\]]la rnam par lta bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yang dag pa'i mtha' las bzlog nas bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pas shes par bya ba nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs byed thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lam gyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]lam bcu dang /_ye shes dang /_yid kyi lus dang /_ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du byed pa med pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen po khyad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun 
[\[143b.2\]]gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/_/blo gros chen po gal te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de la med du zin na/_blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes 
[\[143b.3\]]bsgrags pa med pas 'jug pa'ang med ldog pa'ang med par 'gyur na/_blo gros chen po byis pa dang /_'phags pa rnams la 'jug pa dang /_ldog pa yang yod de/_rnal 'byor can brtson pa mi 'dor ba rnams bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas 
[\[143b.4\]]gnas so/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs can rnams dpyod pa'i lta ba can rnams kyis khong du chud par dka'o/_/rang bzhin yongs su dag pa yin mod 
[\[143b.5\]]kyi blo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pa'i phyir de rnams la ma dag pa ltar snang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni ma yin te/_blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhin du mngon sum gyi spyod yul du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[143b.6\]]blo gros chen po de nyid lha mo dpal gyi phreng ba'i phyir bstan pa brjod pa dang /_blo rnam par dag cing zhib mo yangs pa mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes par bsgrags pa rnam par shes pa bdun dang 
[\[143b.7\]]bcas pa/_'jug pa la mngon par chags pa'i nyan thos rnams la chos bdag med pa bstan pa'i phyir/_lha mo dpal gyi phreng ba'i ched du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bshad de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs byed gzhan rnams kyis rtogs 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]pa'i yul ma yin no/_/gzhan du na blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/_khyod lta bu zhib cing mkhas pa'i mos pa dang /_blos rab tu 'byed pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[144a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po don la rton pa rnams kyi'ang yul te/_bstan pa brjod pa la sgra ji bzhin du mngon par chags pa'i mu stegs can gzhan dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni ma yin no/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen po khyod dang /_byang chub 
[\[144a.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba 'di la brtson par bya ste/_thos pa tsam gyis ni chog par mi bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya 
[\[144a.4\]]ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni/_/rnam shes bdun dang ldan par yang /_/'dzin pa gnyis kyis rab 'jug ste/_/yongs su shes pas ldog par 'gyur/_/gzugs brnyan bzhin du sems snang ste/_/thog ma med nas yongs su bsgos/_/yang 
[\[144a.5\]]dag ji bzhin rnam bltas na/_/don dang 'dra yang don med do/_/ji ltar byis pa sor mo'i rtser/_/'dzin cing zla ba mi lta bar/_/de bzhin yi ger 'brel ba rnams/_/nga yi yang dag nyid mi shes/_/sems ni gar mkhan bzhin du gnas/_/yid ni bzhad 
[\[144a.6\]]gad pa 'dra ste/_/lnga dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes/_/snang ba tshon dang 'dra bar rtog/_//'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa/_bam po bdun pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen 
[\[144a.7\]]pos gsol ba btab pa/_bdag med pa gnyis rab tu dbye ba rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis bdag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams thams cad kyi rim pa mtshams sbyar ba dag tu chos 'di dag rnam par sgom par 'gyur ba 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]dang /_chos de dag gis ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi so so rang gi sa'i bar du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i chos lnga dang /_rang bzhin dang /_
[\[144b.2\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_bdag med pa gnyis rab tu dbye ba rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin tu legs 
[\[144b.3\]]par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros 
[\[144b.4\]]chen po chos lnga dang /_rang bzhin dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_bdag med pa gnyis kyi rab tu dbye ba rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid khyod la bshad do/_/'di lta ste/_ming dang /_mtshan ma dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ye shes dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin 
[\[144b.5\]]gshegs pa'i bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa la 'jug pa/_rtag pa dang /_chad pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa'i lta ba rnam par spangs pa/_tshe 'di la bde ba'i sgor snyoms par 'jug pa/_bde bar gnas pa rnal 'byor can rnams la mngon sum du 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[144b.6\]]de la blo gros chen po chos lnga dang /_rang bzhin dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_bdag med pa gnyis dang /_rang gi sems dang /_phyi rol gyi dngos po dang /_dngos po med par khong du ma chud pa'i phyir byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa 'jug gi 'phags pa rnams kyi ni 
[\[144b.7\]]ma yin no/_/blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang ji ltar na byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa 'jug cing /_'phags pa rnams kyi ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po ming dang /_'du shes dang /_brda la chags 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]pas byis pa rnams sems kyi rjes su 'brang ste/_rjes su 'brang bas mtshan nyid sna tshogs su 'dod pas/_bdag dang bdag gir lta bar lhung ba'i bsam pa can rnams kha dog rgyas pa la mngon par chags par byed de/_mngon par chags nas mi shes pas 
[\[145a.2\]]bsgribs pa rnams shin tu 'dod chags so/_/shin tu 'dod chags pa'i rnams 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byed do/_/mngon par 'dus byas nas phyir phyir zhing dar gyi srin bu bzhin du rang gi rnam par rtog pas yongs su 
[\[145a.3\]]dkris pa'i blo can rnams 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho dang /_dgon par lhung zhing zo ba'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du mi 'da' yang gti mug pa'i phyir/_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu'i zla ba'i rang bzhin dang 'dra bar/_bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'i chos thams cad yang dag pa ma yin par 
[\[145a.4\]]rnam par rtog pa las byung ba/_mtshan gyi gzhi dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'jig pa 'jug pa rnam par log pa/_rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba/_dbang phyug dang /_dus dang /_rdul phra mo dang /_gtso bo las 
[\[145a.5\]]byung ba ma yin par ni mi shes te/_blo gros chen po ming dang mtshan mas g.yengs pa'i phyir/_byis pa rnams mtshan ma'i rjes su 'jug pas mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ngo /_/de la blo gros chen po mtshan ma ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i snang bar 'gyur ba yin te/_
[\[145a.6\]]gzugs zhes bya ba'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams la sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos zhes bya ba ste/_'di ni mtshan ma zhes bshad do/_/de la blo gros chen po rnam par rtog pa ni 
[\[145a.7\]]gang gis ming du brjod cing /_'di ni glang po dang /_rta dang shing rta dang /_rkang thang dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med la sogs pa zhes bya ba yin te/_de bzhin gyi 'di ni gzhan du ma yin no/_/zhes mtshan ma gsal bar byed pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'o/_/blo gros chen po 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]yang dag pa'i ye shes ni gang gis ming dang /_mtshan ma mi dmigs shing /_phan tshun blo bur du 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa/_rtag pa med pa/_chad pa med pa'i phyir/_mu stegs byed dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sar lhung bar mi byed 
[\[145b.2\]]pas yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming dang dngos por mi byed/_mtshan ma dngos po med par yang mi byed do/_/sgro 'dogs pa dang /_skur pa'i mtha' gnyis 
[\[145b.3\]]su ngan par lta ba rnam par spangs pa/_ming dang mtshan ma'i don mi 'jug par shes pa de lta bu ni de bzhin nyid 'di yin par bshad do/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni snang ba med pa'i rtogs pa'i spyod yul thob 
[\[145b.4\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba 'thob ste/_des byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba thob nas/_mu stegs can dang /_ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las rnam par ldog pa yin te/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa la yang 
[\[145b.5\]]dag par zhugs pa/_rtog ge'i lta ba la ltad mo dang rnam par bral bas mtshan nyid la 'dris pa'i phyir sgyu ma la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos kyi tshul rnam par sgom zhing /_mthar gyis bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid chos kyi sprin gyi sa'i 
[\[145b.6\]]bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sprin gyi sa'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin dang /_stobs dang /_dbang dang /_mngon par shes pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/des thob nas sems can yongs su smin par bya 
[\[145b.7\]]ba'i phyir sprul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes te/_chu'i zla ba bzhin du thug pa med pa'i gnas la shin tu 'brel ba'i chos can mos pa tha dad pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/_blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin nyid 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]la zhugs pa'i phyir yid dang /_rnam par rig pa dang bral ba'i lus de yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gsum po rnams chos lnga'i nang du 'dus sam/_'on te rang gi mtshan nyid du grub pa'am ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[146a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po 'di nyid kyi nang du rang bzhin gsum dang /_rnam par shes pa brgyad dang bdag med pa gnyis kyang 'dus so/_/de la ming dang mtshan ma ni yongs su kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/gang yang blo gros chen po de la gnas shing zhugs pa'i rnam par rtog 
[\[146a.3\]]pa sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bsgrags pa nyi ma dang 'od zer lhan cig pa bzhin dus gcig tu byung ba sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid rang gi rnam par rtog pa khong du chud par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni blo gros chen po gzhan gyi dbang zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes dang de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jig 
[\[146a.4\]]pa'i phyir rang bzhin yongs su grub pa shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba la mngon par chags pas ni rnam par rtog pa brgyad du phye ste/_mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i phyir/_bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa gnyis rnam par zhi bas bdag 
[\[146a.5\]]med pa gnyis skye'o/_/blo gros chen po chos lnga po 'di rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang sa rnam par dbye ba'i mtshams sbyar ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes rtogs 
[\[146a.6\]]pa la 'jug pa rnams kyang 'dus so/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po chos lnga rnams ni mtshan ma dang /_ming dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i ye shes te/_blo gros chen po de la mtshan ma ni gang /_dbyibs dang /_rnam pa dang /_khyad par dang /_byad dang gzugs la 
[\[146a.7\]]sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du snang ba de ni mtshan ma'o/_/gang mtshan ma de nyid la rdza ma la sogs par ming btags te/_'di ni de bzhin gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni ming ngo /_/blo gros chen po gang gis bde ba zhe'am/_go cha zhes ming de brjod cing mtshan ma gsal bar byed pa 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]sems dang sems las byung bar bsgrags pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'o/_/chos de dag phan tshun du myong ba med cing kun brtags pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir/_gang blo rab tu zhig gi bar du ming dang /_mtshan ma shin tu mi dmigs pa ni de bzhin nyid de kho na nyid yang dag par nges pa 
[\[146b.2\]]mthar thug pa/_rang bzhin dang /_ngo bo nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid du nga dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag gis kyang thugs su chud de/_ji lta ba bzhin du bshad do/_/btags so/_/bkrol lo/_/gsal bar byas so/_/gang gis 
[\[146b.3\]]khongs su chud cing yang dag par rtogs pa dang /_gang chad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog par mi 'jug pa/_bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gi ye shes dang 'thun pa/_pha rol gyi phyogs su mu stegs byed dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[146b.4\]]rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes te/_blo gros chen po de dag ni chos rnam pa lnga'o/_/'di dag nyid kyi nang du rang bzhin gsum dang /_rnam par shes pa brgyad dang /_bdag med pa gnyis dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang 'dus te/_
[\[146b.5\]]blo gros chen po de la khyod kyis rang gi blo la mkhas par bya'o/_/gzhan yang byed du gzhug cing gzhan gyi dring la gzhog par mi bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos lnga dag dang rang bzhin dang /_/rnam shes brgyad po nyid dag dang /_/bdag med rnam pa gnyis par 
[\[146b.6\]]ni/_/theg chen thams cad 'dus pa yin/_/ming dang mtshan ma kun brtags pa/_/rang bzhin gnyis kyi mtshan nyid de/_/yang dag ye shes de bzhin nyid/_/yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[146b.7\]]chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa brjod pa las de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar gyi gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed do zhes gsung na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la sgra ji bzhin gyi don 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]gzung bar bgyi'am/_'on te don gyi bye brag gzhan zhig mchis sam ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po sgra ji bzhin gyi don du gzung bar mi bya ste/_blo gros chen po gang 
[\[147a.2\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma'i tshad kyis ni dus gsum gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi tshad du'ang mi 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi phul las 'das pa dang 'dra ba dag dang /_mi 'dra ba'i phyir dpe ni dpe ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[147a.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten gyi phul las 'das pa dang 'dra bas mi 'dra ba'i dpe mi ston te/_blo gros chen po gzhan du na rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa la mngon par zhen pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo mu stegs byed kyi lta ba ngan pas brlag pa/_'khor ba 
[\[147a.4\]]srid pa'i 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'di dag srid pa'i 'gro ba srid pa'i 'khor lo nyam nga ba de las skyo bar gyur te/_khyad par 'dod pas khyad par du rtsom par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas thob pa sla bar bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[147a.5\]]rnams skye ba ni u dum ba ra'i me tog lta bu yin no zhes brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ces bya ba 'di ni dpe tsam du bzhag pa'o/_/bstan pa brjod pa las ngas 'dul 
[\[147a.6\]]ba'i skye bo rnams bltas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba ni u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'o zhes bshad mod kyi/_blo gros chen po u dum bA ra'i me tog ni sngon sus kyang ma mthong zhing mthong bar mi 'gyur na/_blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[147a.7\]]rnams ni 'jig rten du mthong zhing da ltar yang snang ste/_rang gi tshul so sor gzhag pa'i gtam gyi dbang du bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba ni u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin rnyed par dka'o zhes ni ma bshad do/_/blo gros chen po rang gi tshul so sor gzhag pa'i 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]gtam bshad na 'jig rten gyi phul las 'das pa'i dpe rigs pa rnams mi bya ste/_yid ches par mi rung bas na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de kho na nyid ni sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das pa'i phyir bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang 
[\[147b.2\]]gi ye shes kyi spyod yul la ni dpe rnams mi 'jug go/_/de kho na nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin te/_de'i phyir na de dag la dpe rnams gzhag par mi bya mod kyi/_blo gros chen po 'on kyang 'di ni dpe tsam du byas pa 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang gA'i klung 
[\[147b.3\]]gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam ste/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pas na mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa med do/_/blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams ni nya dang /_ru sbal dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_mi dang /_ma he dang /_seng ge dang /_glang po dang /_rta la 
[\[147b.4\]]sogs pas dkrugs kyang dkrugs so zhe'am/_ma dkrugs so zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing dang sa la dri ma dang bral te rnam par rtog pa med do/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag gi 'phags 
[\[147b.5\]]pa so so rang gi ye shes ni gang gA'i klung gi stobs dang /_dbang dang /_mngon par shes pa'i bye ma rnams byis pa mu stegs byed pha rol rgol ba'i nya thams cad kyis dkrugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon gyi smon lam btab pa'i phyir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_bde 
[\[147b.6\]]ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas sems can rnams la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mdza' ba dang /_khong khro ba med pa'i phyir gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam ste/_bye brag med do/_/'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po 
[\[147b.7\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams ni sa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas bskal pa 'tshig pa nas ni bsregs kyang sa'i rang bzhin mi 'dor ro/_/blo gros chen po me'i khams dang 'brel pa'i phyir sa ni mi 'tshig ste/_gzhan du na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams log par ltung ba'i blos 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]'tshig par rtog mod kyi/_de ni me'i rgyu las byung bas na mi 'tshig go/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam ste mi 'jig go/_/'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[148a.2\]]ma rnams ni tshad med de/_de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer snang ba tshad med pa yang sems can yongs su smin par bskul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gtong ngo /_/'di 
[\[148a.3\]]lta ste/_blo gros chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams rang bzhin gzhan du mi rtsom ste/_bye ma rnams ni bye ma'i gnas nyid do/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni srid pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i 
[\[148a.4\]]rgyu chad pa yin pas na 'khor bar 'jug pa yang med/_ldog pa yang med do/_/'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams ni phri yang mngon pa med de/_bsnan kyang mngon pa med do/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po chos la lus med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs 
[\[148a.5\]]pa'i ye shes kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sbyor bas mi zad mi 'phel lo/_/blo gros chen po chos ni lus med de lus dang ldan pa la ni 'jig pa yod kyi lus dang mi ldan pa la ni ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams ni mar dang 'bru mar 'dod pas 
[\[148a.6\]]rab tu btsir kyang mar dang 'bru mar med pa de bzhin du/_blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis rab tu gzir kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du chos kyi 
[\[148a.7\]]dbyings kyi rang gi ngang gi smon lam gyi bde ba mi 'dor ro/_/'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams ni 'bab pa'i rgyun du 'thun par 'bab ste/_chu med par ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa thams cad kyang mya ngan las 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]'das pa 'bab pa'i rgyun du 'thun par 'jug ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po 'gro ba'i don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mi 'jug go/_/blo gros chen po 'jug pa ni 'gro ba'i don yin te/_blo gros 
[\[148b.2\]]chen po 'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' shes pa yang med de/_mi shes na ji ltar 'gro ba'i don du bshad/_blo gros chen po 'gro ba'i don ni chad pa yin na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni rab tu mi shes so/_/blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de gal te/_
[\[148b.3\]]sems can rnams 'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' shes pa yang med na/_de ji ltar srog chags rnams thar par shes/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba phyi rol gyi don yongs su shes pas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa/_gnas 
[\[148b.4\]]ngan len gyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu rnam par log cing rang gi gnas shin tu gyur pa ni thar pa yin te/_blo gros chen po 'jig pa ni ma yin no/_/de bas na blo gros chen po mtha' med pa'i gtam ni cir yang dgos pa ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po mtha' med pa'i mtha' zhes 
[\[148b.5\]]bya ba 'di ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam grangs te/_'di la blos yongs su brtags na rnam par rtog pa las phyi'am nang gi sems can gzhan gang yang med do/_/blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni shes pa dang shes par bya bas dben pa yin te/_gzhan du na rang gi sems snang ba'i rnam par 
[\[148b.6\]]rtog pa yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa 'jug ste/_de khong du chud pas ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang gis gang gA'i bye mnyam du/_/'jig med tshul gyi mthar thug pa/_/'dren pa rab tu mthong ba ni/_/de dag 'dren pa mthong ba'o/_/gang gA'i 
[\[148b.7\]]bye ma ji bzhin du/_/nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs te/_/'bab phyogs 'thun zhing rtag pa ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]bde bar gshegs pas chos thams cad skad cig tu 'gyur bas 'jig pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad 
[\[149a.2\]]skad cig pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po 
[\[149a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros chen po chos thams cad chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_
[\[149a.4\]]'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_zin pa dang /_ma zin pa rnams yin te blo gros chen po mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par 
[\[149a.5\]]shes pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams ni sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bag chags rgyas pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis dge ba dang /_mi dge bar yongs su brtags so/_/blo gros chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba dang /_snyoms par 'jug 
[\[149a.6\]]pa rnams ni tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i dngos pos 'phags pa rnams kyi dge ba zag pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po yang dge ba dang mi dge ba ni 'di lta ste/_rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams so/_/brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par 
[\[149a.7\]]shes pa zhes bsgrags pa dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_mu stegs byed kyis brjod pa'i rnam par shes pa 'dus pa lnga rnams so/_/blo gros chen po de la rnam par shes pa 'dus pa lnga rnams yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i skad cig ma 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]gcig nas gcig tu dbye bas tha dad du gyur pa/_rgyud kyi rgyun gyis lus tha mi dad pa 'byung ngo /_/byung nas kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi sems snang ba ma rtogs pa'i phyir 'gags ma thag tu rnam par shes pa gzhan 'byung ste/_dbyibs byad kyi bye brag 'dzin pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa 
[\[149b.2\]]'byung ngo /_/rnam par shes pa 'dus pa lnga dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_skad cig gi dus su mi gnas pa de ni skad cig pa'o zhes ngas bshad do/_/blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa yid dang lhan cig pa ni/_'jug 
[\[149b.3\]]pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bag chags kyis skad cig pa yin te/_zag pa med pa'i bag chags kyis ni skad cig pa ma yin no/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo skad cig mar smra ba la chags pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi skad cig pa dang /_skad cig pa ma yin pa 'di mi rtogs so/_/de 
[\[149b.4\]]ma rtogs pa'i phyir chad par lta bas 'dus ma byas pa'i chos rnams kyang 'jig par byed do/_/blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa 'dus pa lnga rnams ni 'khor ba yang ma yin/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong ba yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no/_/blo gros chen 
[\[149b.5\]]po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal mi myong ba'i rgyu dang bcas pa bag chags bzhi dang ldan pas 'jug cing ldog ste/_byis pa skad cig mar lta ba'i rnam par rtog pas bsgos pa'i blo can dag gis ni mi rtogs so/_/blo gros chen po gzhan yang gser dang /_
[\[149b.6\]]rdo rje dang /_rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dang /_thob pa dang khyad par dag ni mi 'jig pa yin te/_blo gros chen po gal te mngon par rtogs pa 'thob pa skad cig pa yin na ni/_'phags pa rnams 'phags pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_'phags pa rnams ni 'phags pa ma yin par mi 
[\[149b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po gser dang /_rdo rje ni bskal par gzhal kyang de bzhin 'dug ste/_mi 'bri mi skye na/_byis pa ldem po ngag tu bshad pa la mi mkhas pa dag gis phyi nang gi chos thams cad skad cig pa'i don du ji ltar brtag_/yang blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_gang yang 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gang lags/_ji ltar na yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[150a.2\]]pa/_blo gros chen po pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag ni 'di gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog go/_/blo gros chen po de la 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa la 
[\[150a.3\]]mngon par chags shing zhen pas mtha' gnyis su 'dzin pa srid par skye ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i yul 'dod pa dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po byis pa rnams tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 
[\[150a.4\]]'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_tshangs par skye bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa dag kyang mngon par sgrub bo/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis ni byis pa rnams bdag bde ba mya ngan las 
[\[150a.5\]]'das pa 'dod pa bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod par lhung ba'i bsam pa can rnams sbyin pa la sogs pa la rab tu sbyor ba'o/_/blo gros chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog rnams ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 
[\[150a.6\]]'byor dam pa la rnal 'byor pa rnams rang gi sems snang ba tsam du 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi sems gnyis su rtogs pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa dang /_len pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang /_rang gi sems dang /_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par ma chags pas sems 
[\[150a.7\]]can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dmigs pa de nyid la rnam par rtog par mi 'jug par sgom pa de ni tshul khrims te/_pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de'o/_/gang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas rnam par rtog pa de nyid 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]mi 'jug par bzod pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus gang gis nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha smad la brtson par byed cing rnal 'byor dang 'thun par mthong bas rnam par rtog pa ldog pa'i phyir de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa'i 
[\[150b.2\]]phyir mu stegs can gyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'dzin par mi ltung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_blo rab tu 'byed pa'i bar du rab tu phye na mtha' gnyis su mi ltung zhing gnas gyur pa sngon du 'gro 
[\[150b.3\]]ba mi 'jig pas bdag gi 'phags pa'i so so rang gis rig pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_rab tu sbyor ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/blo gros chen po de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yin te/_'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_stong pa mi rtag skad 
[\[150b.4\]]cig par/_/'dus byas la ni byas pa rtog_/'bab chu mar me sa bon dpes/_/skad cig pa yi don du rtog_/byed pa med cing skad cig pa/_/dben pa byed pa spangs pa dang /_/chos rnams skye ba med pa ni/_/skad cig don du ngas bshad do/_/skyes ma thag tu 'jig par ni/_/
[\[150b.5\]]byis pa rnams la'ang nga mi 'chad/_/dngos po rnams kyi rnam rtog pa/_/bar chad med par 'gro bar g.yo/_/sems de 'byung bar byed pa yi/_/rgyu ni ma rig de yin te/_/ji srid gzugs dag mi shes pa/_/de srid bar du de gnas ci/_/zhig par gyur ma thag tu ni/_/
[\[150b.6\]]sems ni gzhan rnams rab 'byung ste/_/gzugs ni dus su mi gnas na/_/ci la dmigs te 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang las gang du 'jug pa yi/_/sems ni log pa'i rgyu las byung /_/de ni rab tu ma grub na/_/ji ltar skad cig 'jig par rig_/rnal 'byor can gyi 
[\[150b.7\]]snyoms 'jug dang /_/gser dang rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dang /_/'od snang gnas kyi gzhal med khang /_/'jig rten rgyu yis 'jig pa med/_/gnas pa rnams dang thos pa'i chos/_/sangs rgyas ye shes phun sum tshogs/_/dge slong nyid dang shes thob rnams/_/skad cig mar ni 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ji ltar mthong /_/sgyu ma dri za'i grong la sogs/_/gzugs rnams ji ltar skad cig pa/_/'byung ba ma yin gzugs rnams dang /_/'byung po de dag gang du song /_/skad cig ma'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang 
[\[151a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra bcom pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba dang /_sems can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can rnams de bzhin 
[\[151a.3\]]gshegs par 'gyur bar yang lung bstan/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/_gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge gcig kyang ma 
[\[151a.4\]]gsungs ma bshad/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa lags te/_mi rtog mi dpyod par 'phrul pa dag kyang sprul nas/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba mdzad pa/_rnam par shes pa rnams kyang skad cig ma gcig nas gcig tu tha dad 
[\[151a.5\]]pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad/_lag na rdo rje yang khor mor rtag tu zhabs 'bring du 'brang /_thog ma'i mthar mi 'dogs la/_mya ngan las 'das par 'dogs/_bdud dang bdud kyi las rnams dang /_las kyi rgyu rnams dang /_bram ze'i bu mo tsan tsa dang /_mdzes ma kun tu 
[\[151a.6\]]rgyu dang /_lhung bzed bkrus bzhin pa la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa dag gda' na/_bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis nongs pa dag ma spangs par/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin 
[\[151a.7\]]tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la'ang dgongs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa rnams kyang rab tu spro bar bya ba'i phyir te/_blo gros chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dang /_gzhan dag na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa rnams gang 
[\[151b.2\]]dag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa yod de/_de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa las bzlog par bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po la rab tu spro bar bya ba'i phyir sprul pa'i nyan thos rnams la sprul pa'i sku dag gis lung bstan gyi/_chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[151b.3\]]rnams kyis ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po de la dgongs nas nyan thos lung bstan to/_/blo gros chen po rnam par grol ba ro gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa ni bye brag med mod kyi/_shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa ni ma 
[\[151b.4\]]yin no/_/blo gros chen po shes bya'i sgrib pa ni chos la bdag med pa mthong ba'i bye brag gis rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni gang zag la bdag med par mthong ba'i bye brag gis rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni yid kyi rnam par 
[\[151b.5\]]shes pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_gang zag la bdag med pa mthong ba la sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas spang bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sgrib pa rnam par grol ba de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i bag chags bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi chos kyi lugs la dgongs te/_
[\[151b.6\]]sngon dang phyis med pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir sngon bshad pa'i yi ge de dag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog mi dpyod par chos 'chad de/_mkhyen bzhin du mdzad pa dang /_dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /_bag chags kyis gzhi spangs pa dang /_shi 'pho gnyis dang bral ba dang /_
[\[151b.7\]]nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i phyir mi rtog mi dpyod do/_/blo gros chen po yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bdun rnams ni dge ba zag pa med pa'i phyogs dang bral ba mi 'khor ba yin te/_bag chags kyi rgyu 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]las 'byung ba'i phyir skad cig ma'o/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'khor zhing mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i rgyu yin te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo stong pa nyid kyis g.yengs pa'i blo can dag ni rnam par dag pa nyid mi shes 
[\[152a.2\]]so/_/yang blo gros chen po lag na rdo rje ni 'phrul pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung na 'dug gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo bo rnams kyi drung na ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo ni byis pa so 
[\[152a.3\]]so'i skye bo dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs can thams cad kyi tshad ma dang /_dbang po las rnam par log pa yin te/_tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa dag mthong bar rtogs pa'i chos shes pa'i bzod pas de rtogs par byed de/_de bas na lag 
[\[152a.4\]]na rdo rje de'i zhabs 'bring na mi 'brang ngo /_/sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni las las byung ba ma yin te/_de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa med/_de las gzhan na yang de bzhin gshegs pa med de/_rdza mkhan gyi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba lta bus bya ba 
[\[152a.5\]]thams cad byed cing mtshan dang ldan pa yang ston mod kyi rang gi tshul so sor gzhag pa'i gtam bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul ni mi ston to/_/blo gros chen po gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni rnam par shes pa 'dus pa drug 'gags pas chad par 
[\[152a.6\]]lta ba la brten to/_/kun gzhi ma rtogs pa'i phyir rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po rang gi blo'i rnam par rtog pa'i thog ma'i mtha' shes par mi rung ste/_rang gi blo'i rnam par rtog pa nyid bzlog pas thar par yang shes so/_/bag chags bzhi spangs pa'i phyir 
[\[152a.7\]]nyes pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_theg pa gsum dang theg med dang /_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das med dang /_/thams cad sangs rgyas lung bstan cing /_/nyes pa dang yang bral bshad dang /_/mngon par rtogs mtha'i ye shes 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]dang /_/de bzhin len med rtogs pa dag_/zhum pa rnams kyang spro bya'i phyir/_/de dag dgongs te bshad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas dag gis ye shes bskyed/_/de dag nyid kyis lam yang bshad/_/gzhan nas ma yin de nas 'gro/_/de phyir mya ngan de mi 'da'/_/srid pa'i 
[\[152b.2\]]'dod gzugs lta rnams kyis/_/bag chags rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/_/yid kyi rnam par shes las byung /_/kun gzhi dang ni yid la gnas/_/yid kyi rnam shes mig la sogs/_/mi rtag phyir ni chad par ston/_/thog ma med pas rtag pa dang /_/mya ngan 'da' 
[\[152b.3\]]mos lta bar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis zhus nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/_gang gis ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus na/_bdag dang 
[\[152b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyis sems can sha za ba la sogs pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa/_sha'i zas la chags pa'i sems can rnams kyi ro la sred pa spang ba'i slad du ci nas kyang sems can de dag ro'i sred pa bsal te/_chos kyi ro'i 
[\[152b.5\]]zas la mos pas sems can thams cad la bu gcig lta bur sdug pa dang ldan zhing phan tshun du byams pa thob pa dang /_thob nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams su byang bar byas te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_nyan thos 
[\[152b.6\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ngal bso ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad par sha za ba nyes par lta ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/_
[\[152b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can gzhan ngan par bshad pa'i chos can 'jig rten rgyang pan gyi lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang /_yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs dang /_rtag pa dang chad par smra ba rnams kyis kyang sha 'tshal ba bkag ste/_bdag kyang mi 'tshal na 'jig rten gyi mgon po 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]khyod kyis bstan pa thugs rjes ro gcig tu gyur pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rang sha 'tshal ba dang /_'tshal ba mi bzlog pa lta cis 'byung /_ci nas kyang bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kyis 
[\[153a.2\]]sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid du chos bstan par bgyi ba de bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba thams cad du bu gcig pa dang mtshungs par gzigs nas thugs rje chen po can gyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du sha 'tshal ba'i nongs pa legs par bshad du gsol/_
[\[153a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[153a.4\]]phyir nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyis rgyu tshad med pa'i phyir sha thams cad bza' bar mi bya ste/_de dag la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/de la blo gros 
[\[153a.5\]]chen po srog chags yun ring po nas 'khor ba rnams la gang pha'am/_ma'am/_spun nam/_sring mo'am/_bu'am/_bu mo'am/_gnyen bshes sam/_gnyen nam/_gnyen lta bur gang yang rung bar ma gyur pa'i sems can de ni rnyed par sla ba'i rnam pa gang yang med do/_/
[\[153a.6\]]gnyen dang gnyen lta bur gyur pa de dag tshe gzhan du lus brjes pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_phyugs dang /_bya'i skye gnas gang yang rung bar gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa 'byung po thams cad bdag dang 'dra bar gyur par 'dod pas 
[\[153a.7\]]skye bo srog chags su gyur pa thams cad las byung ba'i sha ji skad du bza' bar bya/_blo gros chen po srin po rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi chos nyid bzang po 'di thos nas sha za ba las rnam par ldog cing srin po'i rang bzhin dang bral nas snying rje can du 'gyur na/_chos 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'dod pa'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/_de ltar na blo gros chen po tshe rabs 'phos pa de dang de dag tu sems can thams cad gnyen bshes dang /_gnyen du gyur pa'i 'du shes kyis sems can thams cad la bu gcig gi 'du shes su bsgom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid 
[\[153b.2\]]can gyis sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po spyod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sha bzar mi rung ba dang /_'khrul pa'i phyir yang sha thams cad mi bza' ste/_blo gros chen po bong bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyi dang /_glang dang /_mi'i sha la sogs pa ni 'jig 
[\[153b.3\]]rten gyis bza' ba ma yin na/_'di ltar shan pa dag rin gyi phyir bzar rung ngo zhes zer zhing srang gi dbus dag tu 'tshong bar byed pas de'i phyir yang blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpas sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po gtsang bar 'dod pa'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas sha ni 
[\[153b.4\]]khu chu dang khrag las byung ba'i phyir sha mi bza'o/_/'byung po rnams dngang bar byed pa'i phyir yang blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' byams par 'dod pa rnal 'byor can gyis sha thams cad bza' bar mi bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po sme sha can dang /_gdol pa dang /_
[\[153b.5\]]nya pa la sogs pa khyi'i sha za ba'i sems can rnams ni rgyang ma nas mthong yang khyi rnams 'jigs pas zugs te/_la la ni bdag cag kyang bsad du 'ong ngo zhes shi la thug par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po nam mkha' dang /_sa dang chu la gnas pa'i 'gro ba shin tu phra ba gzhan 
[\[153b.6\]]yod pa de dag kyang sha za ba rnams rgyang ma nas mthong ma thag tu sna'i dbang po rnon pos dri tshor nas srin po las mi dag myur du 'byol ba bzhin te/_la la ni shi dogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po de'i phyir dngang bar 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas pas sha 
[\[153b.7\]]mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bos bsnyen cing dri mi zhim la mi snyan par byed pa dang /_'phags pa'i skye bos rnam par spangs pa'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas sha mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po 'phags pa'i skye bo ni drang srong gi zas za ste/_khrag dang sha mi 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]za bas/_de'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas sha mi za'o/_/blo gros chen po skye bo mang po'i sems rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir bstan pa la skur pa spang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis sha mi bza'o/_/de 'di lta ste/_blo gros 
[\[154a.2\]]chen po 'jig rten na bstan pa la skur par smra ba dag yod de/_kye ma 'di dag gi dge sbyong nyid ni ci zhig yod/_'di dag gi tshangs par 'jug pa'ang ga la yod de/_de ltar 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong gi zas bor nas sha zan bzhin du sha'i zas kyis lto gang zhing nam mkha' dang /_
[\[154a.3\]]sa dang /_chu la gnas pa'i 'gro ba phra mo skrag par byed pa rnams 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu rgyu'o/_/'di dag gi dge sbyong nyid ni nyams so/_/'di dag gi sdig pa spangs pa nyid ni zhig go/_/'di dag la ni chos kyang med 'dul ba'ang med do zhes de ltar sdang ba'i sems 'chang 
[\[154a.4\]]ba rnams rnam pa du mas bstan pa la skur to/_/de'i phyir blo gros chen po skye bo mang po'i sems rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir bstan pa la skur pa spang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyis sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po shi ba'i ro dri 
[\[154a.5\]]mi zhim zhing mi 'phrod pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas sha mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po mi shi ba'i sha bsregs pa dang /_de ma yin pa srog chags gzhan gyi sha bsregs par yang dri'i khyad par gang yang med de/_de gnyis ka dri mi zhim par 
[\[154a.6\]]mtshungs so/_/de'i phyir yang blo gros chen po rnal 'byor can gtsang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po dur khrod pa rnams dang /_dgon pa nags 'dab mi ma yin pa rgyu ba bas mtha'i mal stan la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_
[\[154a.7\]]rnal 'byor la spyod pa byams pa la gnas pa rnams dang /_rig sngags 'chang ba/_rig sngags grub par 'dod pa rnams kyi rig sngags sgrub pa dang /_thar pa la bgegs byed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi rnal 'byor 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]sgrub pa thams cad kyi bar chad byed par 'gyur bar rjes su mthong nas bdag dang gzhan gyi lus la phan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/gzugs la dmigs pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis chags pa skyed pa'i phyir yang 'byung po thams cad bdag tu 
[\[154b.2\]]gyur pa snying brtse ba'i/_bdag nyid can gyi byang chub sems dpas sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po de la lha rnams kyang spong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyis sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/blo gros chen po tshe 'di nyid la'ang de'i kha 
[\[154b.3\]]shin tu dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas sha thams cad mi bza'o/_/sdug bsngal zhing nyal ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhing sad pa dang /_sdig pa'i rmi lam spu g.yo bar byed pa mthong ba dang /_khyim stong pa na 'dug cing gcig pu dben par gnas pa'i tshe 
[\[154b.4\]]yang de la mdangs 'phrog pa'i mi ma yin pa rnams mdangs 'phrog pa dang /_bar bar sngang ba dang /_blo bur du 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba dang /_zas kyi tshod mi zin te zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa'i bcud legs par 'ju ba'i 'tshag tu 
[\[154b.5\]]mi 'gyur ba dang /_lto srin bu skyes pa dang /_mdze mang po'i gzhir 'gyur ba/_nad mang bar byed pa yin/_mi 'phrod pa'i 'du shes kyang mi 'thob ste/_ngas kha zas ni bu'i sha dang /_sman bzhin du bshad la/_blo gros chen po 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bos bsnyen pa/_
[\[154b.6\]]'phags pa'i skye bos rnam par spangs pa/_nyes pa du ma thob par byed pa/_yon tan du mas rnam par spangs pa/_drang srong ma yin pa'i zas mi bsod pa mi rung ba'i zas/_sha dang khrag rnams ji ltar slob ma rnams la gnang bar bya/_blo gros chen po/_ngas 
[\[154b.7\]]ni 'phags pa'i skye bos rnam par ma spangs pa/_yon tan mang po 'thob par byed pa/_nyes pa mang po rnam par spangs pa/_sngon gyi drang srong gi kha zas bsod pa/_'bras dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_sran ma sde'u dang /_bal sran dang /_
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]sran chung la sogs pa dang /_mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_hwags dang /_bu ram dang /_kha 'da' dang /_sha kha ra la sogs pa'i zas rnams 'os shing brtags pa yin zhes gnang na/_blo gros chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_skyes bu blun po 
[\[155a.2\]]'dul ba la rnam par rtog pa/_rnam pa mang po smra ba sha zan gyi rigs kyi bag chags kyis bsgos pa ro la sred pa la shin tu chags pa/_kha cig ni 'di bsod pa'i kha zas yin par 'dzin te/_blo gros chen po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_dad 
[\[155a.3\]]pa can rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba/_shAkya'i rigs kyi bu/_mi'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo lus dang /_srog dang /_longs spyod la ma chags pa/_ro la ma zhen pa/_ro la mi brkam pa/_snying rje can/_'byung po thams cad bdag bzhin du red par 'dod pa/_sems 
[\[155a.4\]]can thams cad la bu gcig bzhin du sdug par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni de snyam du 'dzin par bshad do/_/blo gros chen po sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_rgyal po seng ge 'bangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de zas su sha zos zhing ma 'os par 
[\[155a.5\]]bsten pas ro la sred cing chags pa la 'dun pa'i phyir mi'i sha'ang zos par gyur nas/_de'i phyir mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_gnyen dang /_gnyen 'dab kyi skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang spangs par gyur na/_/grong khyer ba dang /_yul gyi 'gro ba rnams kyis lta ci smos te/_
[\[155a.6\]]bdag gi srid dang yul yongs su btang ba'i phyir rab tu nyon mongs par gyur to/_/blo gros chen po dbang pos kyang sngon lha'i dbang po thob par gyur nas sha za ba'i bag chags kyi nyes pas khra'i gzugs su byas nas las kun pa bya thi ba'i gzugs dang cha byad 'chang ba shin tu gtses 
[\[155a.7\]]par gyur te/_rgyal po zhi ldan nyes pa med pa 'byung po la snying brtse ba can nyid kyang srang la btab cing sdug bsngal chen po thob par byas so/_/blo gros chen po de ltar tshe du mar goms shing lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur kyang bdag dang gzhan la nyes pa 'thob par byed par 'gyur na 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gzhan dag lta ci smos/_blo gros chen po mi'i dbang por gyur pa gzhan rnams kyang rta shugs chen pos khyer nas 'brog dgon pa na 'khyam 'khyam pa las srog gi rim gro'i phyir seng ge mo dang 'tshogs par gyur te/_bu dag kyang skyes par gyur to/_/seng ge dang 'grogs pa'i 
[\[155b.2\]]rgyus rgyal po'i bu rkang bkra la sogs pa'ang sngon gyi tshe rabs la sha za ba'i nyes pa'i bag chags kyis mi'i dbang por gyur kyang sha za bar gyur to/_/blo gros chen po tshe 'di nyid la'ang khyim bdun pa'i grong na sha la shin tu brkam zhing mi 'os par bsten na/_mi sha za ba'i phra men pha 
[\[155b.3\]]dang /_phra men ma ma rungs pa dag tu skye'o/_/blo gros chen po de dag tshe rjes nas kyang sha'i ro la chags pa de nyid kyis seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gzig dang /_spyang ki dang /_ta rak+Sha dang /_byi la dang /_wa dang /_'ug pa sha mang po za ba'i skye gnas dang /_sha mang du za ba'i 
[\[155b.4\]]srin po la sogs pa shin tu gtum pa'i skye gnas su yang ltung bar byed do/_/der lhung ba rnams mi'i skye gnas kyang 'thob par dka' na mya ngan las 'das pa lta ci smos te/_blo gros chen po sha za ba'i nyes pa yang de dag la sogs pa yin na/_shin tu bsnyen pa rnams lta la 
[\[155b.5\]]los kyang skye mod/_phyir bzlog pas na yon tan shin tu mang na/_blo gros chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni yon tan dang /_nyes pa 'di dag dang /_gzhan yang khong du mi chud do/_/blo gros chen po yon tan dang nyes pa 'di dag la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir 
[\[155b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyis sha thams cad mi bza' bar bshad do/_/blo gros chen po gal te ji ltar yang su'ang sha mi za na ni de'i phyir srog chags rnams kyang gsod par mi 'gyur na/_blo gros chen po srog chags nyes pa med par rin gyi phyir bsad pa ni 
[\[155b.7\]]phal che'i de las gzhan gyi phyir ni nyung ngo /_/blo gros chen po ro la sred pa ni shin tu mi bzad pa yin te/_de la shin tu bsnyen pas mi'i sha dag kyang mis bza' bar gyur na/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_phyugs dang /_bya dang /_srog chags las byung ba'i sha de dag lta ci smos/_blo gros chen 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]po sha'i ro la sred pas gzir ba rnams kyis rgya dang 'khrul 'khor 'di dag de lta de ltar bca' ste de dag gis ni bya ba dang /_shan pa dang /_nya pa la sogs pas nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /_sa la 'gro ba dang /_chu la rgyu ba'i srog chags nyes pa med pa rnams rnam 
[\[156a.2\]]pa du mas gsod par byed do/_/blo gros chen po 'on kyang rngon par gyur pa'i sems gtum pa can srin po ltar snying rje med pa rnams ni srog chags su 'du shes pas gsod cing za yang snying rje nam yang mi skye'o/_/blo gros chen po gang nye bar bzung ste nyan thos rnams la gnang bar 
[\[156a.3\]]bya ba ma byas pa dang /_byed du ma bcug pa dang /_ma brtags pa zhes bya ba'i sha yang rung ba med na/_blo gros chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing shAkya'i sras kyi yin no zhes khas len pa ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan thogs pa/_skyes bu glen pa 
[\[156a.4\]]log pa'i rtog ges sems nyams par gyur pa/_'dul ba la rnam pa mang por rnam par rtog pa/_smra ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba rgyas pa/_ro'i sred pa la chags pa rnams sha za ba'i gtan tshigs su snang ba/_de dang de dag ston te/_nga la yang yang dag 
[\[156a.5\]]pa ma yin par skur pa 'debs par sems so/_/don byung ba'i gleng gzhi de dang de dag la brtags nas smra ste/_don byung ba 'di ni gleng gzhi las bcom ldan 'das kyis sha'i zas gnang ste rung ba'ang ma yin/_kha zas bsod par yang gsungs te/_de bzhin 
[\[156a.6\]]gshegs pa nyid kyis kyang gsol ce'o zhes zer ro/_/blo gros chen po mdo gang las bsnyen par gnang ba med de/_zas bsod pa'i nang du'ang rung bar ma bshad do/_/blo gros chen po gal te ngas gnang bar bya bar 'dod dam/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 
[\[156a.7\]]bsnyen par rung ba zhig yin na ni/_byams pas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can dur khrod pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams la sems can thams cad bu gcig bzhin du 'du shes bsgom pa'i phyir sha thams 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]cad za ba gcod par yang byas so/_/blo gros chen po ngas ni rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo chos 'dod pa theg pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa rnams dang /_dur khrod pa byams pa la gnas pa dgon pa pa rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor thams cad sgrub pa dang /_
[\[156b.2\]]sems can thams cad bu bzhin du 'du shes bsgom pa'i phyir/_sha thams cad gcod par yang byas so/_/bstan pa brjod pa de dang de la bslab pa'i gzhi rim pas bca' ba skas kyi gdang bu bre ba'i tshul du rnam gsum bcas nas de'i ched du byas pa rnams kyang bkag 
[\[156b.3\]]ste de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis shi ba bcu'i sha ni ma bkag mod kyi/_'dir ni thams cad kyi thams cad du kun thabs med par ril gyis bkag ste/_de ltar blo gros chen po/_ngas sha'i zas ni su la'ang ma gnang /_mi gnang /_gnang bar mi 'gyur te/_blo 
[\[156b.4\]]gros chen po rab tu byung ba rnams la sha'i zas ni mi rung bar bshad do/_/blo gros chen po gang yang nga la de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gsol to zhes skur pa 'debs par sems pa de yang blo gros chen po skyes bu blun po rang gi las kyi nyes pa'i sgrib pa la gnas pa de dag la yun 
[\[156b.5\]]ring por don med pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_mi bde ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po nga'i 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni kha zas tha mal pa'ang mi za na sha dang khrag gi zas mi rung ba lta ci smos/_blo gros chen po nga'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[156b.6\]]sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi zas za ste/_zang zing gi zas ni ma yin na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lta ci smos/_blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni chos kyi sku/_chos kyi zas kyis gnas pa yin te/_zang zing gi sku ma yin/_zang zing gi zas thams 
[\[156b.7\]]cad kyis gnas pa ma yin te/_srid pa dang srid pa'i yo byad la sred pas tshol ba'i bag chags thams cad spangs shing nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa'i bag chags thams cad med pa/_sems dang shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]cad gzigs pa/_sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang mtshungs par gzigs shing thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/de ltar blo gros chen po nga ni sems can thams cad la bu gcig bzhin gyi 'du shes dang ldan pa yin na/_ji ltar bdag gi 
[\[157a.2\]]bu'i sha bza' bar nyan thos rnams la gnang bar bya/_rang gis bza' ba lta ci smos te/_ngas nyan thos rnams la gnang ba dang /_bdag nyid kyis zos so zhes bya ba 'di ni blo gros chen po gnas med do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[157a.3\]]sems chen gyis/_/chang dang sha dang sgog btsong dag_/bza' zhing btung bar mi bgyi ba/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog bshad du gsol/_/dri nga 'phags pa min pas bsnyen/_/mi snyan par yang byed pa ste/_/sha ni gcan gzan rnams kyi zas/_/bzar mi rung 
[\[157a.4\]]bar thub chen gsungs/_/zos na nyes pa gang yin dang /_/ma zos pa yi yon tan dag_/sha za de la gang yod pa/_/blo gros chen pos shes par gyis/_/'khrul ba dang ni gnyen bshes dang /_/khu chu khrag las byung ba'i phyir/_/'byung po rnams ni 
[\[157a.5\]]dngang 'gyur bas/_/rnal 'byor can gyis sha mi bza'/_/sha rnams dang ni sgog btsong dag_/chang dag rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/ke'u dang sgog skya de bzhin te/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu spang /_/'bru mar gyis kyang byug pa spang /_/khri la rten 
[\[157a.6\]]'cha'i sems can rnams/_/bu ga bu gar 'jig 'gyur phyir/_/khri la nyal bar mi bya'o/_/zas las dregs pa skye bar 'gyur/_/rtog pa dregs las byung ba ste/_/rtog pas 'dod chags rab tu bskyed/_/de yi phyir na bzar mi bya/_/rtog pa las ni 'dod 
[\[157a.7\]]chags bskyed/_/'dod chags kyis ni sems rmongs byed/_/rmongs pas 'du bar rab tu 'gyur/_/skye ste 'grol bar mi 'gyur ro/_/khe yi phyir ni sems can gsod/_/sha yi phyir ni nor sbyin byed/_/de dag gnyis ka sdig las can/_/'o dod 'bod la sogs 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]par btso/_/gang gis thub pa'i tshig 'das te/_/bsam pa ngan pa sha za na/_/'jig rten gnyis ni gzhig pa'i phyir/_/shAkya'i bstan las brtul zhugs blangs/_/shin tu mi bzad dmyal bar yang /_/sdig gi las can de dag 'dong /_/ma rungs 'o dod 'bod 
[\[157b.2\]]sogs su/_/sha za de dag btso bar 'gyur/_/rnam gsum dag pa'i sha rnams ni/_/ma brtags pa dang ma bslangs dang /_/ma bskul ba yang yod med pas/_/de bas sha ni mi bza'o/_/rnal 'byor can gyis sha mi bza'/_/nga dang sangs rgyas dag gis 
[\[157b.3\]]bshad/_/sems can gcig la gcig za ba/_/sha zan dag gi rigs su skye/_/dri mi zhim zhing smad pa dang /_/smyon pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/gdol pa sme sha can rigs dang /_/btso blag mkhan du yang yang skye/_/phra men rigs kyi skye gnas dang /_/sha 
[\[157b.4\]]za'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_/mi yi tha ma de dag ni/_/srin dang byi la'i mngal du skye/_/glang po'i rtsal dang sprin chen dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang sor phreng dang /_/lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang /_/ngas ni sha yang rnam par smad/_/sangs rgyas byang 
[\[157b.5\]]chub sems dpa' dang /_/nyan thos rnams kyis smad pa la/_/ngo mi tsha bar za ba ni/_/rtag tu smyon par skye bar 'gyur/_/sha la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir/_/bram ze'i rigs sam rnal 'byor can/_/shes rab can dang nor ldan par/_/de dag rnams ni skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[157b.6\]]mthong dang thos dang dogs pa yis/_/sha rnams thams cad rnam par smad/_/sha zan rigs su skyes pa yi/_/rtog ge pa rnams mi shes so/_/ji ltar 'dod chags thar pa las/_/bar chad byed par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/de ltar sha dang chang la sogs/_/bar chad 
[\[157b.7\]]byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/ma 'ongs pa yi dus na ni/_/sha za gti mug smra ba dag_/sha ni sdig med rung ba'o zhes/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad ces zer/_/zas la sman dang 'dra ba dang /_/bu yi sha dang mtshungs pa yang /_/ran pa dang ni mi 'phrod par/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]can gyis zas la spyod/_/seng ge dag dang stag rnams dang /_/wa la sogs dang 'grogs bya ba/_/ngas ni byams pas gnas pa la/_/rtag par rnam pa kun tu smad/_/thar pa'i chos dang 'gal ba'i phyir/_/mi rnams dngang bar 'gyur ba'i sha/_/de phyir 
[\[158a.2\]]bza' bar mi bya ste/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan no/_/lang kar gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rab kyi snying po las sha mi za ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen po la bka' stsal pa/_gang 
[\[158a.3\]]'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_'chad par 'gyur ba dang /_da ngas kyang chos smra ba rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bshad kyis/_lang kar gshegs pa'i sngags kyi tshig khyod 
[\[158a.4\]]kyis zung shig_/'di lta ste/_tud Te tud Te/_bud Te bud Te/_pad Te pad Te/_kad Te kad Te/_a ma le/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_bi ma le/_ni me ni me/_hi me hi me/_ba me ba me/_ka le ka le/_ka la ka le/_ad Te/_mad Te/_bad Te/_tud Te/_rnyad Te/_spud Te/_kad Te/_lad Te/_
[\[158a.5\]]pad Te/_hi me hi me/_di me di me/_tsa le tsa le/_pa tse pa tse/_b+han de b+han de/_an tshe man tse/_Tu DA re/_d+hu DA re/_pa DA re/_ag ke_/ag ke_/mag ke_/mag ke_/tsag kre/_tsag kre/_di me di me/_hi me hi me/_Tu Tu Tu Tu/_Thu Thu Thu Thu/_Du Du Du Du/_T+Tu T+Tu T+Tu T+Tu/_swA hA/_
[\[158a.6\]]blo gros chen po lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo'i sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag yin no/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba de las sus kyang skabs mi rnyed de/_
[\[158a.7\]]lha'am/_lha mo'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin mo'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_nam mkha' lding mo'am/_mi'am ci'am/_mi'am ci mo'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_lto 'phye chen po mo'am/_dri za'am/_dri 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]za mo'am/_'byung po'am/_'byung po mo'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_gnon po'am/_gnon mo'am/_brjed byed dam/_brjed byed mo'am/_srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_phra men pha'am/_phra men ma'am/_mdangs 'phrog pho'am/_mdangs 
[\[158b.2\]]'phrog mo'am/_lus srul po'am/_lus srul mo'am/_mi'am/_mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed de/_gal te gdon drag po zhig byung na de la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags pas ngu 'bod cing phyogs gcig tu blta ste 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po 
[\[158b.3\]]yang sngags kyi tshig gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_pad me/_pad ma/_de be/_he ne hi na hi ne/_tsu le tsu lA tsu le/_hu le hu la hu le/_yu le yu la yu le/_pa le pa la pa le/_mun tse/_tshin d+he/_b+hin d+he/_b+han tshe/_marde pra marde di na ka re swA hA/_blo gros chen po 
[\[158b.4\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed na/_lha'am/_lha mo'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin mo'am/_
[\[158b.5\]]nam mkha' lding ngam/_nam mkha' lding mo'am/_mi'am ci'am/_mi'am ci mo'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_lto 'phye chen mo'am/_dri za'am/_dri za mo'am/_'byung po'am/_'byung mo'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_
[\[158b.6\]]gnon po'am/_gnon mo'am/_brjed byed dam/_brjed byed mo'am/_srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_phra men pha'am/_phra men ma'am/_mdangs 'phrog pha'am/_mdangs 'phrog ma'am/_lus srul po'am/_lus srul mo'am/_mi'am mi ma yin pa de dag 
[\[158b.7\]]thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/gang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so//_//
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa bam po brgyad pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jig rten 'di ni skye 'jig bral/_/nam mkha'i me tog rab tu 'dra/_/khyod kyi 
[\[159a.2\]]shes rab thugs rje yis/_/yod dang med par ma dmigs so/_/'jig rten rtag dang chad spangs pa/_/khor zug rmi lam 'dra ba ste/_/khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yis/_/yod dang med par ma dmigs so/_/chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin/_/sems dang rnam par 
[\[159a.3\]]shes pa spangs/_/khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yis/_/khyod kyis yod dang med ma dmigs/_/chos dang gang zag bdag med dang /_/khyod kyi nyon mongs shes bya'i rnams/_/khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje dang /_/mtshan ma med pas rtag tu dag_/mya ngan mi 'da' 'da' 
[\[159a.4\]]la min/_/khyod la mya ngan 'da' mi gnas/_/blo dang rig par bgyi dang bral/_/yod dang med pa'i phyogs kyang spangs/_/de ltar skye 'jig spangs pa yi/_/thub pa zhi ba sus mthong ba/_/de dag 'di dang slad mar yang /_/chags med nyer len med par 'gyur/_/sems 
[\[159a.5\]]slu ba yi smig rgyu ba/_/ji ltar dpyid ka g.yo ba na/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams ni chur 'dzin te/_/de la dngos po yod pa min/_/de bzhin rnam shes sa bon yang /_/lta ba'i yul la rab tu g.yo/_/byis pa rnams ni skye bar 'dzin/_/rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin/_/bsam 
[\[159a.6\]]gtan bsam bya bsam gtan pa/_/spong dang bden pa mthong ba dang /_/de dag rtog pa tsam yin par/_/gang gis rtogs pa de 'grol lo/_/chos 'di dag ni snying po med/_/rlom sems las ni byung ba yin/_/gang gis stong zhes snyems pa yi/_/snyems pa de yang stong 
[\[159a.7\]]pa'o/_/phung po rnam par shes dang lnga/_/chu la shing gi grib ma bzhin/_/snang ba sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra/_/rnam par rig par ma rtog shig_/sgyu ma ro langs 'khrul 'khor dang /_/rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur/_/nam yang rgyud gsum rnam 'chad par/_/skye bos mthong na rnam 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]par 'thar/_/tshul bzhin ma yin rnam rtog pas/_/sna tshogs rnam pa brgyad dam dgur/_/rnam par shes pa 'jug 'gyur te/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin no/_/rtag tu bag chags dag gis bskyed/_/rtsa ba zug cing gnas kyang brtan/_/spyod yul dag tu sems 
[\[159b.2\]]'khyam ste/_/khab long gis ni lcags bzhin no/_/sems can kun la gnas pa ste/_/rigs kyi sa ni rtog pa spangs/_/shes rab shes bya rnam spangs shing /_/byed las grol na rnam par ldog_/sa bcu las ni rnam byung ba/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang /_/'du 
[\[159b.3\]]shes rnam shes spangs pa yi/_/sems kyi rgyal po blta bar bya/_/sems ni nam zhig gyur pa na/_/pad mo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang /_/sgyu ma'i spyod yul 'byung ba na/_/de yi tshe na ther zug gnas/_/de na gnas par gyur nas ni/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i spyod rig 
[\[159b.4\]]pas/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin/_/sems can kun gyi don byed do/_/rnam par rtog las gud na ni/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas med na/_/mo sham rmi lam bu bzhin no/_/byis pa phyogs bslad 'dzin par byed/_/rang bzhin med dang mi skye dang /_/gang 
[\[159b.5\]]zag dang ni phung po'i rgyud/_/rkyen dang khams dang shes bya dang /_/stong pa srid dang mi srid rnams/_/ngas ni thabs su bshad pa ste/_/nga ni mtshan nyid mi 'chad na/_/mtshan gyi gzhi dang mtshan nyid du/_/byis pa rnams ni dngos por 'dzin/_/thams cad mkhyen 
[\[159b.6\]]kyang thams cad mkhyen pa min/_/thams cad kyi yang dbus la thams cad med/_/byis pa 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'di zhes rtog_/shes par mi byed ston par yang mi byed/_/btags pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni med pa'o/_/gang la de ni rnam 
[\[159b.7\]]brtag pa'i/_/phung po skra shad 'dzings pa 'dra/_/med las 'byung ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/rkyen rnams kyis ni 'jig mi 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i me tog mo sham bu/_/de ltar 'dus byas nam mthong ba/_/de tshe gzung dang 'dzin pa ni/_/nor bar mthong nas ldog par 'gyur/_/
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]mtshan nyid dang ni bya ba dang /_/dngos por mya ngan nga mi 'das/_/rnam rtog rnam shes bzlog pa na/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das pa'o/_/ji ltar chu chen zad pa'i tshe/_/rlabs rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin 'gags par gyur na ni/_/rnam shes 
[\[160a.2\]]sna tshogs mi 'byung ngo /_/stong pa ngo bo nyid med pa/_/sgyu ma bzhin du ma skyes rnams/_/yod dang med pa ma yin te/_/dngos po 'di dag rmi lam bzhin/_/nga ni rang bzhin gcig 'chad pa/_/rtog ge mtshan ma rigs spangs pa/_/'phags pa'i lha yi spyod yul te/_/
[\[160a.3\]]rang bzhin rnam gnyis spangs pa'o/_/'dzin pa med cing gzung ba med/_/thar pa med cing 'ching ba med/_/sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu 'dra/_/rmi lam rab rib ji bzhin du/_/gang tshe yang dag don 'dod pa/_/rnam par mi rtog chags med pas/_/mthong ba de la rnal 'byor zhugs/_/
[\[160a.4\]]the tsom med par nga yang mthong /_/de la rnam rig gang yang med/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i smig rgyu bzhin/_/chos rnams de ltar shes na ni/_/ci yang shes pa med pa'o/_/khams rnams rab tu 'khrugs pa'i phyir/_/srin bu me khyer lta bu dag_/med kyang myos la sna tshogs snang /_/
[\[160a.5\]]de bzhin 'jig rten rang bzhin ni/_/rtswa dang shing dang gyo mo las/_/sgyu ma rnam par mdzes gyur kyang /_/sgyu ma de ni med pa ste/_/chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/_/rkyen rnams yod dang med pa las/_/chos rnams 'byung ba med pa ste/_/khams gsum na ni nor ba yi/_/de phyir sna 
[\[160a.6\]]tshogs snang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten rmi lam ngo bo nyid mtshungs te/_/de na sna tshogs kyi yang gzugs rnams snang /_/reg dang longs spyod lus kyi mthar 'gro dang /_/'jig rten gtso dang byed pa rnams mtshungs so/_/sems 'di khams gsum skye gnas gyur pa yin/_/sems 
[\[160a.7\]]'khrul 'di dang pha rol snang ba'o/_/'jig rten med phyir de la brtag mi bya/_/'jig rten de 'dra'i rang bzhin rtogs nas ni/_/mi gtsang gnas kyi tha mar phyin par 'gyur/_/byis pa rnams ni gti mug phyir/_/'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa mthong /_/shes rab ldan pa rnams dag ni/_/
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]'byung ba 'jig pa mthong ba med/_/lha yi pho brang 'og min no/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs par/_/rtag tu rnam par mi rtog ldan/_/sems dang sems las byung ba spangs/_/stobs dang mngon shes dbang thob pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin dbang rnyed nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[160b.2\]]der 'tshang rgya/_/sprul pa rnams ni 'dir 'tshang rgya/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa dag_/bye ba dpag med 'byung bar 'gyur/_/byis pa kun ni de dag las/_/brag ca 'dra chos bsam yas nyon/_/thog ma dbus dang mtha' las grol/_/dngos po dang ni dngos med spangs/_/khyab pa 
[\[160b.3\]]mi g.yo dag pa ste/_/sna tshogs med la sna tshogs 'byung /_/rnam par rig pa'i rigs kyis g.yogs/_/lus can kun la gnas pa ste/_/sgyu ma nor ba yod mod kyi/_/sgyu ma nor ba'i rgyu ma yin/_/'jig rten dag na sems slu ba/_/cung zad tsam ni gang yod pa/_/rang bzhin gnyis 
[\[160b.4\]]dang 'brel ba ste/_/kun gzhi rnam par shes pas sprul/_/rnam rig tsam gyi lta shwa dang /_/gang zag chos su spyod par yang /_/'jig rten de ltar rnam bsgoms nas/_/nam zhig shin tu gyur pa na/_/de tshe nga yi bu yin te/_/rdzogs pa'i chos rnams rab ston pa/_/drod dang 
[\[160b.5\]]gsher dang sra g.yo bar/_/chos rnams byis pas rnam par brtags/_/yang dag ma yin sgro btags te/_/mtshan nyid med cing mtshan gzhi med/_/rgyun rnams kyi ni lus 'di la/_/'di ni rdzas brgyad gzugs yin te/_/lus kyi dbyibs dang dbang por ni/_/byis pa nor ba 
[\[160b.6\]]rnams rtog go/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshogs pa las/_/byis pa 'byung bar rtog par byed/_/tshul 'di dag ni mi shes pas/_/srid pa gsum gyi gnas na 'khyam/_/dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste/_/rtog pa me yi tshig yin de yang med/_/srid pa rmi lam sprul bzhin 
[\[160b.7\]]brtags byas nas/_/'khor bar mi bya mya ngan 'das mi bya/_/sna tshogs sa bon zhes bya'i sems/_/sems kyi spyod yul la snang ste/_/snang nas rtog pa gnyis dag gi/_/byis pa rnams ni skye bar rtog_/mi shes pa dang sred dang las/_/sems dang sems las byung gnas te/_/
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]gang phyir de las 'byung bas na/_/de ni gzhan gyi dbang du 'dod/_/de dag gang dngos rtog pa ni/_/sems kyi spyod yul nor ba ste/_/rtog pas grub pa ma yin no/_/log par nor ba rnam par brtags/_/rkyen rnams dang ni 'brel pa las/_/lus can rnams 
[\[161a.2\]]kyi sems 'byung ngo /_/rkyen rnams las ni rnam grol zhing /_/rang gi mtshan nyid rnam spangs te/_/nam zhig lus la mi gnas na/_/de phyir nga yi spyod yul min/_/ji ltar rgyal po tshong dpon dag_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dra ba sna tshogs kyis/_/bu brid khyim na rtser bcug nas/_/
[\[161a.3\]]nags kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phrad pa bstan/_/de ltar ngas ni chos rnams kyi/_/gzugs brnyan tsam nyid sna tshogs kyis/_/so so rang rig yang dag mtha'/_/bu rnams la ni nga 'chad do/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs rnams ni/_/rlung gi rkyen gyis byung ba dag_/gar byed rab tu 'jug par 
[\[161a.4\]]'gyur/_/rgyun kyang chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin kun gzhi chu bo yang /_/rtag tu yul gyi rkyen gyis byung /_/rnam shes dba' rlabs sna tshogs kyis/_/gar byed rab tu 'dud par 'gyur/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por ni/_/lus can rnams kyi sems 'jug go/_/
[\[161a.5\]]ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/_/snang ba yi ni mtshan nyid med/_/kun gzhi rnam shes dam pa ni/_/rnam par rig ste kun gzhi yang /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin nyid du ngas bshad do/_/phung po rnams la bdag med de/_/srog kyang med cing 
[\[161a.6\]]gang zag med/_/rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur/_/rnam par shes ni 'gags par 'gyur/_/ji ltar ri mo mthon dman du/_/snang yang yod pa ma yin pa/_/de bzhin dngos po rnams la yang /_/dngos nyid snang yang yod pa min/_/ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/
[\[161a.7\]]ji lta bur ni smig rgyu dag_/de ltar snang ba rtag mthong yang /_/shes rab kyis ni yod ma yin/_/tshad ma dbang po rnam par log_/'bras bu med cing rgyu yang med/_/blo dang rig par bya dang bral/_/mtshan dang mtshan gyi gzhi yang spangs/_/phung por rten cing sangs rgyas pa/_/
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gang na'ang sus kyang ma mthong ste/_/gang na sus gang ma mthong ba/_/de la ji ltar rnam par bsgom/_/rkyen dang gtan tshigs dpe rnams dang /_/dam 'cha' ba dang rgyu rnams kyis/_/rmi lam dri za'i 'khor lo dang /_/smig rgyu nyi ma zla ba dang /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gu 'od sogs dpe rnams kyis/_/
[\[161b.2\]]skye ba de dag ngas bzlog go/_/'gro ba rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra/_/stong pa dang ni brtags pa ste/_/'jig rten gsum la mi gnas shing /_/phyi nang du yang de bzhin te/_/srid pa ma skyes mthong bas na/_/mi skye bzod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/_/lus kyang sgyu 
[\[161b.3\]]ma lta bu ste/_/mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams kyang /_/de yi sems la sna tshogs 'gyur/_/gang gi dngos po ma skyes pa/_/stong pa shin tu rang bzhin med/_/de dag la ni rkyen rnams kyis/_/nor ba skye zhing 'gag par 'gyur/_/phyi rol snang ba'i gzugs can gyis/_/sems 
[\[161b.4\]]dang sems ni snang bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/_/mthong bar bya ba gzhan med do/_/'brel ba rnams dang sangs rgyas gzugs/_/'byung ba rnams ni 'jig pa dang /_/shin tu bslabs pas rnam rig gis/_/'gro ba sna tshogs byin gyis rlob/_/lus dang gnas 
[\[161b.5\]]dang longs spyod rnams/_/gzung ba rnam rig gsum po ste/_/yid dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rig dang /_/rnam par rtog ni 'dzin pa gsum/_/rnam par rtog dang rnam brtag pa/_/ji srid yi ge'i spyod yul ba/_/rtog can rtog ges nor pa'i phyir/_/de srid yang dag mi mthong ngo /_/gang 
[\[161b.6\]]gi tshe na shes rab kyis/_/dngos po rang bzhin med par shes/_/de yi tshe na rnal 'byor can/_/mtshan med gnas shing ngal yang bso/_/bya gag snag tsas bskus pa la/_/de nyid thi bar mi shes 'dzin/_/mi shes pa yi byis pa dag_/theg pa gsum la'ang de bzhin no/_/'di la 
[\[161b.7\]]nyan thos gang yang med/_/rang rgyal ba dag de bzhin te/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba'i/_/gang gzugs 'di dag snang ba ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse can/_/de dag sprul pa ston pa'o/_/srid pa gsum ni rnam rig tsam/_/rang bzhin gnyis ni brtags pa ste/_/chos 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]dang gang zag 'phos pa'i phyir/_/de gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid/_/nyi ma zla ba mar me'i 'od/_/de bzhin 'byung ba nor bu rnams/_/rnam par mi rtog shin tu 'byung /_/de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid/_/ji ltar rab rib can dag gis/_/skra shad log par 'dzings
