[\[162a.2\]]pa ltar/_/de bzhin dngos por rtog pa 'di/_/byis pas log pa rnam par brtags/_/nyon mongs rnam byang dngos po rnams/_/skra shad 'dzings pa lta bu ste/_/gnas dang 'jig dang skye dang bral/_/rtag dang mi rtag spangs pa'o/_/ji ltar la las d+ha tur zos/_/gser lta 
[\[162a.3\]]bur ni 'gro ba mthong /_/de na gser yod ma yin yang /_/sa dag kyang ni gser du snang /_/thog ma med sems sems byung bas/_/de ltar byis pa nyams par byas/_/srid pa sgyu ma smig rgyu skyes/_/yang dag nyid du 'dzin par byed/_/sa bon gcig dang sa bon med/_/mnyam 
[\[162a.4\]]dang shas che sa bon can/_/sa bon kun kyang de bzhin no/_/sna tshogs gyur gyi sems la ltos/_/nam dag pa na sa bon gcig_/shin tu gyur pa sa bon med/_/mi rtog pas na mnyam pa'o/_/shas che bas na tshe rabs 'dres/_/sa bon sna tshogs 'debs pas na/_/de ni 
[\[162a.5\]]sa bon kun ces bya/_/'di la rkyen gyis mi skye ste/_/gang yang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/_/brtags pa yi ni rkyen rnams nyid/_/skye ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyur/_/srid pa gsum ni btags tsam ste/_/ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med/_/btags pa dngos po'i ngo bor ni/_/rtog ge 
[\[162a.6\]]pa dag rtog par 'gyur/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin shes 'dod la/_/nor pa dag ni mi rtogs so/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin mi skye ba/_/de ltar mthong nas rnam par 'grol/_/sgyu ma med dang chos mtshungs pas/_/dngos po rnams ni yod brjod bzhin/_/log pa glog ltar mgyogs 
[\[162a.7\]]pas na/_/de phyir sgyu ma lta bur rig_/bskyed pa med cing skyes pa med/_/rkyen rnams kyang ni gang na yang /_/gang yang yod pa ma yin te/_/kha cig gis ni spyod par brjod/_/rkyen gyi skye 'jig 'brel ba ni/_/bzlog par bya ba ma yin te/_/rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med/_/rkyen rnams 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]kyis ni byis pa dag_/gang la rtog pa de bzlog go/_/rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med/_/kun gzhi med cing dngos med na/_/byis pa ngan pa'i rtog ge pa/_/ro dang 'dra bas 'di dag brtags/_/nam zhig 'jig rten sems tsam du/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis mthong ba na/_/
[\[162b.2\]]de tshe ris su gtogs pa'i lus/_/byis pa'i 'du byed spangs pa ste/_/stobs dang mngon par shes pa dang /_/dbang dang ldan pa rab tu 'thob/_/thams cad gzugs su snang ba yi/_/sems de nam zhig byung ba na/_/'di la sems med gzugs med kyi/_/nor sems 
[\[162b.3\]]thog ma med ces pa/_/de tshe rnal 'byor can gyi rnams/_/shes pas 'gro ba snang med mthong /_/mtshan ma dngos po rnam rig dang /_/gang rig rnam par g.yos pa las/_/nga yi bu rnams 'das nas ni/_/de dag rnam par mi rtog spyod/_/sgyu ma dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/skra 
[\[162b.4\]]shad 'dzings pa'i smig rgyu dag_/med bzhin du ni yod par snang /_/de bzhin dngos po dngos nyid do/_/dngos po thams cad ma skyes te/_/nor ba tsam ni snang bar 'gyur/_/byis pa rtog gnyis dga' ba dang /_/nor pa las ni skyes par rtog_/sna tshogs bag chags las byung ba'i/_/
[\[162b.5\]]skye ba'i char ni gtogs pa'i sems/_/chu bo'i rlabs bzhin shin tu 'byung /_/de chad nas ni mi 'byung ngo /_/rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa'i sems/_/sna tshogs la ni 'jug pa bzhin/_/de bzhin nam mkha' rtsig pa la/_/ci yi phyir na 'jug mi 'gyur/_/mtshan ma zhig la dmigs nas ni/_/
[\[162b.6\]]gal te sems ni 'jug 'gyur na/_/sems kyang rkyen gyis bskyed 'gyur te/_/sems tsam du ni mi rung ngo /_/sems kyis su ni sems la gzung /_/rgyu dang bcas pa gang yang med/_/sems kyi chos nyid dag pa ste/_/nam mkha' la ni bag chags med/_/rang gi sems la mngon chags 
[\[162b.7\]]pas/_/sems ni shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/phyi rol snang ba yod med de/_/de yi phyir na sems tsam mo/_/sems ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/_/ngar sems nyid ni yid yin no/_/gang gis yul rnams 'dzin pa ni/_/de ni rnam par shes zhes bya/_/sems ni rtag tu lung ma bstan/_/
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]yid ni gnyi gar rgyu ba ste/_/rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yang /_/de ni dge dang mi dge'o/_/lus dang gnas dang longs spyod ni/_/gzung ba'i rnam rig gsum pa'o/_/yid dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rig dang /_/rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa gsum/_/rnam rig gnyis po spangs 
[\[163a.2\]]pa ni/_/dam pa'i don gyi sgo yin te/_/snang ba med la 'dug na ni/_/theg pa gsum gzhag ga la yod/_/sems tsam dang ni snang med dang /_/sangs rgyas sa dang gnas rnams ni/_/de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/_/'chad cing 'chang bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sa bdun dag ni 
[\[163a.3\]]sems yin te/_/snang ba med pa brgyad pa'o/_/'dir ni sa gnyis gnas yin te/_/sa gzhan nga yi rang bzhin no/_/ngag dang so so rang rig pa/_/sa 'di nga yi rang bzhin te/_/dbang phyug chen po'i gnas kyi mchog_/'og min shin tu rnam par mdzes/_/me yi ji lta de bzhin 
[\[163a.4\]]du/_/de yi 'od zer sna tshogs pa/_/yid 'ong zhi ba rab tu 'byung /_/de dag srid gsum sprul par byed/_/srid pa gsum po kha cig sprul/_/kha cig snga nas sprul pa ste/_/der ni theg pa rnams ston pa/_/de ni nga yi rang bzhin sa/_/zhing du 'pho dang rtogs pa la/_/sa rnams kyi 
[\[163a.5\]]ni dus med de/_/sems tsam las kyang 'das nas ni/_/snang med gnas pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa dang /_/med pa dag kyang snang bar 'gyur/_/byis pa 'dzin pas rnam bslad de/_/sna tshogs pa ni phyin ci log_/nam zhig mi rtog ye shes ni/_/dngos po yod 
[\[163a.6\]]par mi rung ngo /_/gang phyir sems ni gzugs min pas/_/de phyir de ni rnam mi rtog_/dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma bzhin/_/yul rnams kyang ni rmi lam 'dra/_/byed dang las dang bya ba 'di/_/rnam pa kun tu yod pa min/_/bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang /_/gzugs med pa dang ting 
[\[163a.7\]]'dzin dang /_/'du shes 'gog pa ma lus par/_/sems tsam la ni yod pa min/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_/lan cig phyir 'ong 'bras bu dang /_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_/dgra bcom nyid ni sems nor pa'o/_/byis pa rnams ni 'dus byas la/_/mi rtag skad cig 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]stong par rtog_/sa bon 'bab chu mar me dpes/_/skad cig pa yi don du rtog_/byed pa med cing skad cig pa/_/dben par bya ba spangs pa dang /_/chos rnams kyis ni mi skye ba/_/skad cig don du ngas bshad do/_/yod dang med las skyes par ni/_/khyad par pa dang grangs can shes/_/
[\[163b.2\]]lung du ma bstan thams cad kyang /_/de dag nyid kyis bshad pa'o/_/lung bstan pa ni rnam bzhi ste/_/mgo gcig dang ni dri ba dang /_/rnam par dbye dang gzhag pa rnams/_/mu stegs smra ba bzlog pa'o/_/kun rdzob tu ni thams cad yod/_/dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/_/chos rnams 
[\[163b.3\]]rang bzhin med pa la/_/dam pa'i don du 'dod na ni/_/dmigs pa rang bzhin med pa la/_/de phyir kun rdzob bstan pa yin/_/dngos po brjod pa'i rgyus byung ba/_/gal te rang bzhin yod na ni/_/brjod pa dag las byung ba yi/_/dngos po med ces bya ba med/_/brjod pa 'di na dngos med de/_/
[\[163b.4\]]kun rdzob tu yang yod ma yin/_/phyin ci log ni yod min pas/_/dmigs pa yod pa ma yin no/_/gal te phyin ci log yod na/_/ngo bo nyid med med par 'gyur/_/phyin ci log ni bzhi yi phyir/_/gang dang gang dag dmigs gyur pa/_/de ni rang bzhin med par 'gyur/_/thams cad du yang med pa 
[\[163b.5\]]yin/_/gang 'di sna tshogs snang ba ni/_/gnas ngan len gyis bsgos pa'i sems/_/gzugs su snang ba 'dzin pa ste/_/phyi rol dag ni sems 'khrul ba/_/rtog pa dang ni mi rtog pas/_/rnam rtog rab tu spong 'gyur te/_/mi rtog rnam par rtog pa'i sa/_/stong pa nyid ni yang dag mthong /_/sgyu ma 
[\[163b.6\]]glang po sna tshogs ltar/_/lo ma rnams dang gser bzhin du/_/mi shes pas ni sems bsgos pas/_/de bzhin mi la snang ba mngon/_/'phags pas nor ba mi mthong ste/_/yang dag nyid kyang skabs der min/_/gang phyir skabs der yang dag na/_/nor pa yang dag nyid du 'gyur/_/
[\[163b.7\]]nor ba thams cad spangs nas kyang /_/gal te mtshan ma skyer zin na/_/de nyid de yi nor ba ste/_/rab rib yongs su ma dag bzhin/_/rab rib can rnams bslad pa yis/_/skra shad mthong ba ji bzhin du/_/de bzhin byis pa rnams kyi yang /_/'dzin pa yul la shin tu 'jug_/
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]srid gsum 'di ni skra shad 'dra/_/smig rgyu chu ltar nor ba ste/_/rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur ni/_/rnam par bsgoms na grol bar 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog dang rnam brtag dang /_/rnam par rtog pa 'jug pa dang /_/'ching dang bcing bya bcings pa dang /_/drug po 'di dag thar 
[\[164a.2\]]pa'i rgyu/_/sa rnams med cing bden pa med/_/zhing rnams med cing sprul pa med/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang rang sangs rgyas/_/nyan thos rnams kyang brtags pa'o/_/gang zag rgyu dang phung po'i rnams/_/de bzhin rkyen dang rdul phran dang /_/gtso bo dbang phyug byed po rnams/_/
[\[164a.3\]]sems tsam la ni rnam par rtog_/sems ni thams cad thams cad du/_/thams cad lus la 'jug pa ste/_/rnam pa drug gis sna tshogs 'dzin/_/sems kyi rigs ni mtshan nyid med/_/phung po rnams la bdag med de/_/bdag kyang phung po rnams la med/_/de dag brtags 
[\[164a.4\]]pa bzhin du med/_/de dag med pa'ang ma yin no/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa bzhin/_/dngos po thams cad yod pa ste/_/de dag mthong bzhin yod na ni/_/thams cad yang dag mthong bar 'gyur/_/dngos po thams cad med pa'i phyir/_/kun nas nyon mongs dag 
[\[164a.5\]]pa med/_/ji ltar mthong bzhin de med de/_/de dag med pa'ang ma yin no/_/kun rtog nor ba'i mtshan ma ste/_/gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do/_/mtshan nyid de la ming btags pa/_/de ni rnam brtags mtshan nyid do/_/rkyen dang ming gi brda dag las/_/kun rtog nor 
[\[164a.6\]]ba'i mtshan ma dag_/nam zhig de la mi 'byung na/_/yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rnam par smin pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/sprul pa yi ni rgyal ba dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems can dang /_/phyogs phyogs kyi ni zhing rnams dang /_/sgyu 'dra'i chos dang 'phrul pa dang /_/
[\[164a.7\]]rgyal ba gang rnams sprul pa dag_/de kun snang ba mtha' yas kyi/_/bde ba can nas byung ba'o/_/gang yang sprul pas bshad pa dang /_/rnam smin skyes pas gang bshad pa/_/mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa'i tshul/_/de yi dgongs pa shes par gyis/_/gang yang rgyal ba'i bus bshad 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]dang /_/gang yang 'dren pa rnams kyis bshad/_/sprul pa dag gis gang bshad pa/_/rnam smin rgyal bas ma yin no/_/chos 'di rnams ni ma skyes pa/_/de dag pa yang ma yin te/_/dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dang /_/rmi lam sprul pa rnams dang 'dra/_/sna tshogs sems ni 'jug pa ste/_/
[\[164b.2\]]sems ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/'gog par 'gyur ba'ang sems nyid de/_/sems nyid skye yi gzhan ma yin/_/mi yi sna tshogs brtags pa'i sems/_/don du snang ba mngon pa ste/_/'di ni sems tsam don kyang med/_/rnam par mi rtog grol bar 'gyur/_/thog ma med 
[\[164b.3\]]dus spros pa yis/_/gnas ngan len rnams rab tu bsdus/_/rnam par rtog pa bsgos pas na/_/de phyir log par snang ba 'byung /_/don du snang la rnam shes te/_/ye shes yang dag spyod yul can/_/shin tu gyur pa snang med de/_/de ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/don rab 
[\[164b.4\]]'byed pa'i bsam gtan dang /_/byis pa nyer spyod bsam gtan dang /_/de bzhin nyid dmigs bsam gtan pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dge/_/kun brtags pa yi rang bzhin gyis/_/thams cad chos ni ma skyes pa/_/gzhan gyi dbang la gnas nas ni/_/
[\[164b.5\]]mi yi rnam rtog 'khyam pa yin/_/nam zhig gzhan gyi dbang dag nas/_/rnam par rtog dang bral ba na/_/shin tu gyur pa de bzhin nyid/_/rtog pa spangs par gnas pa'o/_/rnam rtog bden par yod min gyis/_/rnam par rtog pas ma rtog cig_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[164b.6\]]du/_/nor pa de dag rnam rtog na/_/phyi rol don mthong brtags pa ni/_/kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de dag thams cad spangs nas ni/_/nam zhig snang ba med gyur na/_/de tshe sangs rgyas lha yi phyag_/zhing rnams kun nas byung ba'i sa/_/de yi mgo la nyug mdzad de/_/
[\[164b.7\]]de bzhin nyid kyi rjes 'gro ltas/_/gang phyir blo yis rab gzhigs na/_/rang bzhin dag ni mi dmigs te/_/de phyir de dag brjod du med/_/ngo bo nyid kyang med par bshad/_/rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i don la ni/_/yod dang med pa yod ma yin/_/rkyen du gtogs pa'i dngos po la/_/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]yod dang med pa gang rtog par/_/mu stegs lta ba can dag ni/_/bstan las ring du gyur par shes/_/dngos po kun gyi smra ba la/_/rtag tu tshe rabs gzhan song tshe/_/phan tshun rnam par rtog pa yis/_/goms shing goms par byed pa'o/_/ming ni brjod par 
[\[165a.2\]]ma byas na/_/'jig rten thams cad rmongs par 'gyur/_/de bas rmongs pa bsal ba'i phyir/_/ming du gdags par bya ba yin/_/ming dang nor ba'i rnam rtog dang /_/rkyen rnams kyis ni bskyed pa yi/_/rnam par rtog pa gsum dag gis/_/byis pa rnams ni dngos por 
[\[165a.3\]]rtog/_/'gags pa med cing ma skyes te/_/rang bzhin gyis ni nam mkha' 'dra/_/dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gang /_/de dag rnam brtags mtshan nyid do/_/mig yor 'dra zhing sgyu ma bzhin/_/smig rgyu rmi lam mgal me bskor/_/dri za'i grong khyer brag ca 'dra/_/chos de rkyen 
[\[165a.4\]]las byung ma yin/_/de bzhin nyid dang gnyis su med/_/stong pa chos nyid yang dag mtha'/_/rnam par mi rtog bshad pa ni/_/gang de grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/lus dang ngag gi spyod yul [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_/shes rab mi rtog bden pa ste/_/sems ni gnyis kyi mthar lhung 
[\[165a.5\]]bas/_/de phyir shes rab rnam mi rtog_/ji srid sems kyi spyod yul ba/_/yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis yin/_/spyod yul spangs par gyur na ni/_/de tshe sems kyang yang dag 'gag_/rkyen las skyes pa'i rang bzhin la/_/rtog pa gang gis rtog byed pa/_/phyi rol 
[\[165a.6\]]don mthong log pa ste/_/don med sems ni 'ba' zhig go/_/rigs pas rnam par gzhigs na ni/_/gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa 'gag_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/_/phyi rol gyi ni don med do/_/bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems/_/don du snang ba shin tu 
[\[165a.7\]]'byung /_/rtog pa'i rnam pa gnyis 'gags na/_/yang dag spyod yul ye shes te/_/'phags pa'i spyod yul bsam mi khyab/_/snang ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ming dang mtshan ma kun rtog ni/_/rang bzhin gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do/_/yang dag ye shes de 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]bzhin nyid/_/yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/pha ma phrad par gyur pa'i phyir/_/kun gzhi yid dang ldan pa ni/_/mar gyi bum pa'i byi ba bzhin/_/khu chu dang ni lhan cig skyes/_/sla gar rman bu 'bras mi sdug_/las kyis rnam pa sna tshogs byas/_/
[\[165b.2\]]las rlung 'byung ba chen po yis/_/shing tog bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lnga dang lnga dang lnga nyid dang /_/rma yang dgu po nyid rnams dang /_/so dang sen mo spus g.yogs nas/_/'gul zhing rab tu skyes par 'gyur/_/mi gtsang srin bu skyes ma thag_/mi 
[\[165b.3\]]dag nyal las sad pa bzhin/_/mig ni gzugs las mched par byed/_/rtog pa dag kyang rnam par 'phel/_/mchu gnyis dang ni rkan tshogs las/_/rnam par rtog pas rig nas kyang /_/mi yi tshig gi rnam brtag pa/_/ne co bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/_/
[\[165b.4\]]mu stegs smra ba bsten pa ste/_/theg pa chen po mi gnas pa/_/de ni sems can bsam bzhin zhugs/_/ngan par lta ba'i gnas med de/_/so so rang rig theg pa ni/_/rtog ge pa yi spyod yul min/_/mgon po 'das pa'i 'og tu ni/_/'dzin par 
[\[165b.5\]]su 'gyur bshad du gsol/_/bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og_/tshul rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste/_/dus dag 'das nas 'byung ba ni/_/blo gros chen po khyod shes byos/_/lho phyogs be da'i yul du ni/_/dge slong dpal ldan cher grags pa/_/
[\[165b.6\]]de ming klu zhes bod pa ste/_/yod dang med pa'i phyogs 'jig pa/_/nga yi theg pa 'jig rten du/_/bla med theg chen rab bshad nas/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs te/_/bde ba can du de 'gro'o/_/'gro ba kun tu rab 'khor bas/_/srid pa 
[\[165b.7\]]las ni skyo ba'i yid/_/zhi ba zhi lam song nas kyang /_/rnal 'byor sna tshogs dag la brtson/_/rnal 'byor can gyis brtson byas na/_/nyi ma zla ba'i dbyibs dang 'dra/_/'od dang pad mo lta bu dang /_/ri mo nam mkha'i me 'dra 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]mthong /_/mtshan ma sna tshogs de dag ni/_/mu stegs can lam khrid par byed/_/nyan thos dag dang rang rgyal gyi/_/spyod yul du yang ltung bar byed/_/yul la 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/_/'gog pa med pa ma yin te/_/'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ltar/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dngos 
[\[166a.2\]]po yod/_/mkhas pa rnams la snang ba ltar/_/byis pa rnams la mi snang ste/_/ji ltar chos kun ma skyes shing /_/mtshan nyid med par snang ba'o/_/gser min gser ltar snang ba yi/_/ra gan spungs la byis pa rnams/_/gser du ji ltar rtog pa bzhin/_/ngan pa'i rtog ges chos de bzhin/_/rkyen 
[\[166a.3\]]gyis yod dang med pa las/_/gang gi ma byung skye ba dang /_/byung nas kyang ni 'jig ces pa/_/nga yi bstan la de mi gnas/_/yongs su gyur dang dus dang dbyibs/_/'byung ba'i dngos dang dbang po dang /_/bar ma do dag bsdu ba ni/_/gang rtog de dag mkhas ma yin/_/'jig rten rten cing 
[\[166a.4\]]'brel 'byung bar/_/rgyal ba dag ni mi gsung gi/_/'jig rten 'di na rkyen nyid de/_/dri za yi ni grong khyer 'dra/_/'di yod na ni 'di zhes bya/_/'di ni chos kyi brda yin te/_/brda las tha dad gyur pa ni/_/ma skyes 'gag par mi 'gyur ro/_/mig dang chu dang me long dang /_/snod rnams 
[\[166a.5\]]dang ni nor bu la/_/de dag la ni gzugs brnyan snang /_/gzugs brnyan gang na'ang yod pa min/_/ji ltar nam mkhar smig rgyu ba/_/dngos por snang sems de bzhin te/_/rmi lam mo sham bu bzhin te/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su snang /_/theg chen nga yi theg pa min/_/yi ge med 
[\[166a.6\]]cing sgra yang med/_/bden pa ma yin thar pa min/_/snang med spyod yul ma yin no/_/'on kyang theg chen theg pa ste/_/ting nge 'dzin la dbang byed pa/_/yid kyi lus ni sna tshogs pa/_/dbang gi me tog rnams kyis brgyan/_/dngos po dag ni rkyen rnams dang /_/gcig dang tha dad ma yin te/_/skye ba 
[\[166a.7\]]dag ni mdor bshad de/_/'gog pa dag ni rgyas par ro/_/ma skyes stong pa gcig yin te/_/skyes pa'i stong pa nyid kyang gcig_/ma skyes stong pa mchog yin te/_/skyes pa'i stong pa 'jig par 'gyur/_/stong pa de bzhin nyid dang mtha'/_/mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/_/yid kyi 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]lus ni sna tshogs pa/_/rnam grangs dag gis ngas bshad do/_/mdo sde 'dul ba chos mngon pas/_/don gyis ma yin tshig rnams kyis/_/rnam par dag pa gang rtog pa/_/bdag med pa la de mi gnas/_/nga dang sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/_/mu stegs can dag gang gis kyang /_/rkyen gyis yod pa nam 
[\[166b.2\]]bsgrubs na/_/ji lta bur ni yod par 'gyur/_/rkyen rnams kyis ni yod par yang /_/su yis bsgrubs na gang med bsgrubs/_/skye bar smra ba ngan lta bas/_/yod dang med par rnam par rtog_/gang gi ci yang mi skye la/_/ci yang 'gag par mi 'gyur ba/_/'gro ba dben par mthong bas na/_/
[\[166b.3\]]de la yod med nyer mi 'gro/_/snang ba ri bong rwa bzhin te/_/mi rnams kyi ni rnam rtog yod/_/smig rgyu la ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin/_/gang rnams rtog pa de dag nor/_/rnam rtog mngon par chags pa yis/_/rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung /_/skye ba dang ni 'jig las grol/_/snang ba med la rab tu 
[\[166b.4\]]spyod/_/zab yangs rgya che ye shes dang /_/phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing rnams ni/_/rgyal ba'i sras po rnams la bshad/_/nyan thos rnams la mi rtog pa/_/srid gsum mi rtag stong pa ste/_/bdag dang bdag gi rnam spangs dang /_/rgyu med pa yi rnam rtog ni/_/rnam par rtog ces byar mi rung /_/ji lta bur 
[\[166b.5\]]ni smig rgyu la/_/chu med par ni chur 'dzin 'gyur/_/de bzhin snang la byis pa rnams/_/'phags pa rnams ni bye brag tu/_/'phags pa'i lta ba dag pa ste/_/rnam par thar pa gsum las byung /_/rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid rnams/_/nyan thos rnams la rab tu bshad/_/thams cad chos la 
[\[166b.6\]]ma chags dang /_/gcig pu dben par spyod pa dang /_/ma brtags pa yi 'bras bu ni/_/rang rgyal sras po dag la bshad/_/phyi rol brtags pa'i rang bzhin te/_/gzhan dbang rang gi gzhi las skyes/_/bdag las skyes pa'i 'khrul ma mthong /_/de phyir sems rnams rab tu 'jug_/bcu po pa ni 
[\[166b.7\]]dang po yin/_/dang po pa ni brgyad po yin/_/dgu po yang ni bdun pa ste/_/bdun po pa yang brgyad po yin/_/gnyis po pa ni gsum pa yin/_/bzhi po yang ni lnga po yin/_/gsum po yang ni drug yin te/_/snang med pa la rim ci yod/_/dngos po rnams ni snang med tshe/_/rnal 'byor can la 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]dngos med med/_/dngos dang dngos med mnyam pas ni/_/'phags pa rnams ni 'bras bu skye/_/ji ltar dngos rnams dngos po med/_/ji ltar mnyam pa nyid du byed/_/gang gi tshe na phyi nang gi/_/g.yo ba yi ni sems mi shes/_/de tshe 'jig par byed pa ste/_/sems kyi mnyam pa 
[\[167a.2\]]nyid kyang mnyam/_/thog ma med ldan 'khor ba na/_/byis pa dngos 'dzin gyis g.yogs pa/_/gzer gyis gzer la ji bzhin du/_/brid nas 'dzin pa rnam par bzlog_/de yi rgyu can de la dmigs/_/yid kyi 'jug pa'i gnas yin te/_/sems kyi rgyu yang 'byin par byed/_/rnam 
[\[167a.3\]]par shes kyang de la gnas/_/rnam par smin skyes byin rlabs dang /_/ris dang 'gro ba rnams kyang 'byung /_/rmi lam du ni gang rnyed dang /_/mngon par shes pa rnam bzhi ste/_/gang yang rmi lam rnyed pa dang /_/gang yang sangs rgyas gnang ba dang /_/gang ris 'gro dang rigs kyi rnams/_/
[\[167a.4\]]mngon shes rnam smin skyes de min/_/bag chags kyis ni bsgos pa'i sems/_/dngos por snang ba shin tu 'jug_/byis pas gang tshe mi shes pa/_/de tshe skye bar bshad par bya/_/dngos po mtshan nyid ldan par ni/_/phyi rol ji srid rnam rtog cing /_/rang gi nor pa ma mthong na/_/de srid du ni 
[\[167a.5\]]sems rgyas byed/_/ci yi phyir ni skye brjod la/_/de yi phyir ni snang ba brjod/_/snang ba dag ni snang ba min/_/gang gi ci la ci zhig brjod/_/sems ni rang bzhin dang ba ste/_/rnyog par byed pa yid yin no/_/rnam par shes dang bcas pa'i yid/_/rtag tu bag chags 'debs 
[\[167a.6\]]par byed/_/kun gzhi yis ni 'dor bar byed/_/yid ni 'gro la smon par byed/_/rnam shes yul du snang ba yi/_/nor pa mthong nas rab tu chags/_/nga yi sems ni snang ba ste/_/phyi rol gyi ni don med par/_/nor pa la ni de ltar bsgoms/_/de bzhin nyid kyang dran 
[\[167a.7\]]par gyis/_/bsam gtan pa yi yul dang las/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi che ba nyid/_/de gsum bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/rnam shes spyod yul bsam mi khyab/_/ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang /_/nam mkha' gang zag mya ngan 'das/_/kun rdzob tu ni de dag bshad/_/dam pa'i 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]don du yi ge med/_/ris su gtogs dang mu stegs can/_/lta ba gcig la gnas pa ste/_/sems tsam la ni rmongs pas na/_/phyi rol gyi ni dngos la rtog_/rmi lam na ni dbang bskur dang /_/rang rgyal dang ni sangs rgyas dang /_/dgra bcom sangs rgyas mthong na ni/_/byang chub 
[\[167b.2\]]sa bon 'phel ba yin/_/gang na de dag ji lta bur/_/gang las ci yi phyir ba dang /_/sgyu ma'i sems kyi rnam pa zhi/_/yod med phyogs bshad bdag la gsungs/_/sems tsam la ni rmongs pa la/_/sgyu ma bzhin du yod med bshad/_/skye ba dang ni 'jig par ldan/_/mtshan dang 
[\[167b.3\]]mtshan gyi gzhir yang shes/_/yid ces bya ba rnam rtog pa/_/rnam shes lnga dang lhan cig tu/_/gzugs brnyan chu bo'i chu 'dra ba/_/sems kyi sa bon dag las 'byung /_/gang gi tshe na sems dang yid/_/rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa/_/de yi tshe na yid lus dang /_/sangs rgyas sa yang 
[\[167b.4\]]thob par 'gyur/_/rkyen dang khams dang phung po dang /_/chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin nyid/_/btags dang sems dang gang zag rnams/_/rmi lam skra shad 'dzings pa 'dra/_/'jig rten rmi lam sgyu ma ltar/_/mthong nas yang dag gnas par gyis/_/de bzhin nyid ni mtshan 
[\[167b.5\]]nyid bral/_/rig pa dang ni gtan tshigs spangs/_/'phags pa'i so so rang rig pa/_/spyod pa rtag tu dran par gyis/_/rigs pa dang ni rgyu rmongs pa'i/_/'jig rten de bzhin nyid la khod/_/spros pa thams cad zhi ba'i phyir/_/shes rab nor par mi 'jug ste/_/ji srid nor 
[\[167b.6\]]par rnam rtog pa/_/de srid rmongs pas sems 'jug go/_/rang bzhin med dang dngos po dang /_/stong pa rtag dang mi rtag rnams/_/skye bar smra ba'i lta ba ste/_/mi skye smra ba'i ma yin no/_/'gro gcig tha dad gnyis kar yang /_/dbang phyug dang ni 'dod rgyal dang /_/dus dang gtso dang 
[\[167b.7\]]rdul phran dang /_/rkyen rnams kyis ni brtag pa yin/_/'khor ba'i sa bon rnam par shes/_/sa bon yod na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rtsig pa yod na ri mo bzhin/_/yongs su shes nas 'gag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin/_/mi dag 'chi dang skye bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin byis pa 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]rmongs pa'i phyir/_/bcings dang thar pa shin tu 'byung /_/phyi dang nang gi rnam gnyis te/_/chos rnams dang ni rkyen rnams so/_/rnal 'byor de la rab bsgom zhing /_/snang ba med la gnas par bya/_/bag chags dag gis sems dbye ste/_/sems dang bag chags tha mi dad/_/
[\[168a.2\]]sems ni tha dad ma yin mtshan/_/bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris/_/yid kyi shes las byung ba yi/_/bag chags dri ma bzhin du ltos/_/sems ni ras yug dkar po 'dra/_/bag chags rnams kyis mi mdzes so/_/ji ltar ngas ni nam mkha' la/_/dngos dang dngos med ma yin bshad/_/
[\[168a.3\]]de bzhin lus la kun gzhi ni/_/dngos dang dngos po med pas spangs/_/rnyog pa spangs pa'i sems nyid ni/_/yid kyi rnam shes bzlog pa ste/_/chos rnams thams cad shes pa'i phyir/_/sems ni sangs rgyas shes nga 'chad/_/rgyud gsum rnam par 'chad pa ste/_/yod pa dang ni med pa spangs/_/
[\[168a.4\]]mtha' bzhi dag las rnam par grol/_/srid pa rtag tu sgyu ma bzhin/_/sems las byung ba'i sa bdun rnams/_/ngo bo nyid ni gnyis su 'gyur/_/sa gzhan dang ni sangs rgyas sa/_/de dag shin tu rdzogs pa yin/_/gzugs can dang ni gzugs med khams/_/'dod pa'i khams dang 
[\[168a.5\]]mya ngan 'das/_/sems kyi spyod yul thams cad kyang /_/lus 'di nyid du bshad pa yin/_/gang tshe ji srid dmigs gyur pa/_/de srid nor pa 'jug par 'gyur/_/nor pa rang gi sems rtogs na/_/'jug pa med cing ldog pa med/_/skye ba med la rgyu yang med/_/dngos pos 'khor ba 
[\[168a.6\]]kun 'dzin te/_/rgyu la sogs dang 'drar mthong na/_/mtshan nyid la ni mi brtag go/_/byis pa zhan pa'i blo can la/_/theg pa gcig dang theg gsum dang /_/theg pa med pa rang 'chad do/_/'phags pa rnams la dben pa nyid/_/mtshan nyid dang ni rtog pa de/_/nga yi skye ba rnam gnyis 
[\[168a.7\]]so/_/tshul bstan pa ni rnam bzhi ste/_/rigs pa bstan dang grub pa'i mtha'/_/dbyibs dang byad kyi khyad par gyis/_/nor ba mthong nas rnam par rtog_/ming dang dbyibs dang bral gyur nas/_/rang bzhin 'phags pa'i spyod yul gtsang /_/ji srid rnam par rtog pas rtog_/de 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]srid brtags pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/brtag bya rtog pa med pa'i phyir/_/rang bzhin 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/rtag pa ther zug yang dag nyid/_/rigs dang dngos po'i ngo bo nyid/_/de bzhin nyid ni sems las grol/_/rtog pa rnams kyang spangs pa'o/_/dngos po med na dag mi 'gyur/_/
[\[168b.2\]]nyon mongs pa yang su la'ang med/_/gang phyir sems ni dag gyur pas/_/kun nas nyon mongs snang bar 'gyur/_/de phyir rnam dag 'phags pa'i yul/_/yang dag nyid ni dngos por 'gyur/_/sems ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste/_/rtog pa dag gis rnam par spel/_/rmi lam sgyu ma la 
[\[168b.3\]]sogs ltar/_/mthong na rnam par 'tshang rgya 'gyur/_/bag chags sna tshogs gnas ngan len/_/sems dang lhan cig rab tu ldan/_/mi la phyi rol rnams snang ste/_/sems kyi chos nyid ma yin no/_/sems kyi chos nyid dag pa ste/_/sems ni nor las byung ba yin/_/nor pa gnas 
[\[168b.4\]]ngan len pa ste/_/de yi phyir na sems mi mthong /_/de bzhin nyid ni nor pa tsam/_de bzhin nyid ni gud na med/_/'du byed la min gud na'ang min/_/'on kyang 'du byed mthong bas so/_/nam zhig 'dus byas rnams la ni/_/mtshan dang mtshan gzhi bral mthong na/_/'gro ba rang 
[\[168b.5\]]gi sems mthong bas/_/de yi phyir ni spangs par 'gyur/_/sems tsam la ni gnas nas ni/_/phyi rol don la mi brtag go/_/yang dag dmigs la gnas nas ni/_/sems tsam las ni 'da' bar bya/_/sems tsam las ni 'das nas ni/_/snang ba med las 'da' bar bya/_/rnal 
[\[168b.6\]]'byor snang ba med gnas na/_/theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo /_/lhun gyis grub rtogs zhi ba ste/_/smon lam dag gis rnam par sbyangs/_/bdag med ye shes mchog yin te/_/snang ba med tshe mi mthong ngo /_/sems kyi spyod yul blta bar bya/_/ye shes kyi yang spyod yul blta/_/shes 
[\[168b.7\]]rab spyod yul mthong na ni/_/mtshan nyid la ni rmongs mi 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal bden pa sems kyi ste/_/kun 'byung ye shes spyod yul lo/_/bden pa gnyis dang sangs rgyas sa/_/de la shes rab shin tu 'jug_/'bras bu thob dang mya ngan 'das/_/de bzhin yan lag brgyad pa'i lam/_/
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rnam dag 'gyur/_/mig dang gzugs dang snang ba dang /_/yid dang nam mkha' de bzhin te/_/de dag gis ni mi rnams kyi/_/kun gzhi las byung rnam shes te/_/gzung dang 'dzin dang 'dzin byed pa/_/
[\[169a.2\]]ming dang dngos min med pa dang /_/rnam par rtog pa rgyu med par/_/gang sems de dag mkhas ma yin/_/don las ming ni ma byung ste/_/ming las don kyang de bzhin no/_/rgyu dang rgyu med las byung ba'i/_/rnam par rtog pa ma rtog cig_/dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med/_/
[\[169a.3\]]tshig kyang de bzhin med pa yin/_/stong pa dang ni stong pa'i don/_/byis pa ma mthong rnam par rgyug_/rlom sems bden dgod mthong bas ni/_/btags pa yi ni bshad pa'o/_/gcig po rnam pa lngar grub pas/_/bden pa po 'di spong bar 'gyur/_/spros pa bdud kyis bzung ba yin/_/
[\[169a.4\]]yod dang med las 'da' bar bya/_/log pa'i 'du shes bdag med par/_/mthong bas srid la 'dun mi bya/_/brtag pa byed dang bcas pa ni/_/rtsod pa tsam zhig 'jug pa ste/_/bden pa'i mchog ni smrar med pa/_/'gags na chos ni mthong ba yin/_/kun gzhi la ni rten bcas nas/_/yid 
[\[169a.5\]]kyang shin tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/sems dang yid la rten bcas nas/_/rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur/_/sgro btags pa dang sgro 'dogs pa/_/sems kyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid/_/rnal 'byor pas ni de bsgoms na/_/sems tsam shes pa thob par 'gyur/_/yid dang mtshan 
[\[169a.6\]]nyid dngos po la/_/rtag dang mi rtag rlom sems med/_/skye dang mi skyer rnal 'byor la/_/rnal 'byor pa ni rlom sems med/_/kun gzhi las byung rnam shes ni/_/don gnyis la ni rtog par byed/_/de las byung ba'i don gcig la/_/sems gnyis kyis ni mi shes 'gyur/_/smra ba med 
[\[169a.7\]]cing tshig med de/_/sems mthong phyir ni stong ma yin/_/rang gi sems ni ma mthong phyir/_/lta ba'i dra ba 'jug par 'gyur/_/rkyen rnams 'ong ba med pa ste/_/dngos po dag ni gang yang med/_/khams rnams med cing phung po med/_/'dod chags med cing 'dus byas med/_/las dang 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]me med sngon yang med/_/byas pa med cing 'dus byas med/_/mtha' yang med cing chags pa med/_/thar pa med cing bcings pa med/_/lung ma bstan la dngos po med/_/chos dang chos ma yin pa med/_/dus med mya ngan 'das pa med/_/chos nyid dag kyang med pa yin/_/sangs rgyas med cing bden rnams med/_/'bras 
[\[169b.2\]]bu med cing rgyu rnams med/_/log dang mya ngan 'das pa med/_/'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa med/_/yan lag bcu gnyis yod ma yin/_/mtha' dang mtha' med pa yang med/_/lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir/_/sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/_/lus dang nyon mongs las lam dang /_/
[\[169b.3\]]byed pa po dang 'bras bu rnams/_/rmi lam dang ni smig rgyu 'dra/_/dri za yi ni grong khyer bzhin/_/sems tsam du ni rnam bzhag pas/_/dngos po'i mtshan las rnam par ldog_/sems tsam la ni gnas pa'i phyir/_/rtag dang chad pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das la phung po med/_/
[\[169b.4\]]bdag kyang med cing mtshan nyid med/_/sems tsam la ni 'jug pa yis/_/thar pa 'dzin las log par 'gyur/_/sa snang rgyus byung nges pa ni/_/mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang /_/sems ni snang ba med las byung /_/de yi phyir na sems mi snang /_/mi rnams kyis ni bag chags rnams/_/lus 
[\[169b.5\]]dang longs spyod gnas ltar snang /_/sems ni dngos min dngos med min/_/bag chags dag gis mi mdzes so/_/dkar po la ni dri ma snang /_/dri ma la ni dkar mi snang /_/nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du/_/de bzhin sems kyang mi snang ngo /_/sems ni las kyang sogs par byed/_/ye shes kyis ni 
[\[169b.6\]]rnam par sel/_/shes rab kyis ni snang med dang /_/mthu yang rab tu thob par byed/_/sems ni yul dang 'brel pa ste/_/shes pa rtog ge dag la 'jug_/snang ba med dang khyad par la/_/shes rab dag la shin tu 'jug_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang /_/'du shes rtog pa spangs pa ste/_/
[\[169b.7\]]rnam par mi rtog chos thob pas/_/nyan thos dag ni rgyal sras min/_/zhi ba bzod pa'i khyad par la/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes dge/_/kun tu spyod pa spangs pa ni/_/khyad par phyir ni skye bar 'gyur/_/kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin yod/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni med pa ste/_/nor pa dag 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]gis brtags pa 'dzin/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni mi rtag go/_/thams cad 'byung 'gyur gzugs med de/_/'byung las ma gyur gzugs yod do/_/dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang /_/sgyu ma smig rgyu 'byung 'gyur min/_/nga yi shes rab rnam gsum ste/_/gang gis 'phags pa rab phye ba/_/gang gis yang dag mtshan 
[\[170a.2\]]nyid rtog_/gang gis dngos po 'byed pa'o/_/nyan thos shes rab snang spangs pa/_/theg pa gnyis dang bral ba ni/_/dngos po yod par chags pas na/_/shin tu 'jug par 'gyur ba yin/_/sems tsam la ni 'jug pa yin/_/bde gshegs shes rab dri ma med/_/yod pa dang ni med pa las/_/rkyen gyis 
[\[170a.3\]]gal te skyer zin na/_/gcig dang tha dad lta ba la/_/gdon mi za bar de dag gnas/_/yan lag mang pos bsgrubs pa yi/_/sgyu ma bsgrub par mi 'gyur bar/_/de bzhin mtshan ma sna tshogs kyang /_/brtags na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshan ma gnas ngan len pa yi/_/'ching ba sems las byung ba ste/_/kun 
[\[170a.4\]]tu brtags pa mi shes pas/_/gzhan gyi dbang zhes rtog par 'gyur/_/gang brtags pa yi dngos po 'di/_/gzhan gyi dbang yang de nyid do/_/brtags pa sna tshogs snang ba yang /_/gzhan gyi dbang gis rtog par byed/_/kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/_/rgyu las skyes pa gsum du med/_/brtags pa kun 
[\[170a.5\]]rdzob ces bya ste/_/de chad 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/rnal 'byor can gyi dngos po ltar/_/sna tshogs gcig tu rnam par mdzes/_/de la rnam pa sna tshogs med/_/brtags pa'i mtshan kyang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar rab rib can dag gis/_/gzugs mthong ba la sna tshogs rtog_/rab rib gzugs min 
[\[170a.6\]]gzugs med min/_/mkhas pas gzhan dbang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar gser ni dag pa dang /_/chu yang rnyog pa spangs pa dang /_/nam mkha' la ni sprin med ltar/_/rnam rtog dag pa de bzhin no/_/nga yi nyan thos rnam gsum ste/_/sprul dang smon lam las skyes pa/_/'dod chags zhe sdang spangs pa yi/_/chos 
[\[170a.7\]]las byung ba'i nyan thos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'ang rnam gsum ste/_/sangs rgyas la ni mtshan nyid med/_/sems can dag gi sems sems la/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu snang /_/brtags pa yi ni dngos po med/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni yod pa ste/_/sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa ni/_/rnam par 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]brtags na 'jig par 'gyur/_/gal te brtags pa'i dngos med la/_/gzhan gyi dbang gi dngos yod na/_/dngos po med par dngos por 'gyur/_/dngos po dngos med las byung 'gyur/_/kun tu brtags la gnas bcas te/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni dmigs par 'gyur/_/ming dang mtshan ma 'brel pa las/_/
[\[170b.2\]]kun tu brtags pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/brtags pa shin tu ma grub na/_/gzhan las byung ba ma yin no/_/dam pa'i don gyi ngo bo nyid/_/dag pa de tshe shes par 'gyur/_/kun tu rtog pa rnam pa bcu/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni rnam pa drug_/so so rang rig de bzhin nyid/_/de yi phyir na khyad med do/_/chos lnga de bzhin nyid 
[\[170b.3\]]yin te/_/rang bzhin gsum yang de bzhin no/_/rnal 'byor can gyis de bsgoms na/_/de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/skar ma dang ni sprin lta bur/_/nyi ma zla ba 'dra ba dang /_/bag chags las byung snang 'dra ba/_/mi rnams kyi ni sems snang ngo /_/'byung ba 'di dag lus ma red/_/mtshan nyid med cing mtshan 
[\[170b.4\]]gzhi med/_/ji ste 'byung ba'i 'byung yin la/_/gzugs ni 'byung las gyur yin na/_/'byung ba chen po yang dag min/_/'byung ba 'byung las gyur pa med/_/'byung ba chen po rgyu yin te/_/'bras bu sa dang chu la sogs/_/rdzas dang btags dang gzugs rnams dang /_/sgyu ma'i rnam byas de bzhin te/_/rmi lam dri za'i 
[\[170b.5\]]grong gi gzugs/_/smig rgyu ba dang lnga yin no/_/'dod pa can ni rnam lnga dang /_/rigs kyang de bzhin lnga yin te/_/theg pa lnga dang theg pa med/_/mya ngan 'das pa rnam drug yin/_/phung po tha dad nyi shu bzhi/_/gzugs kyang rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin/_/rgyal ba'i sras ni rnam 
[\[170b.6\]]pa gnyis/_/tshul yang brgya po rtsa brgyad de/_/de bzhin nyan thos rnam gsum mo/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing gcig ste/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas gcig tu 'gyur/_/rnam par grol ba de bzhin gsum/_/sems kyi rgyud ni rnam pa bzhi/_/nga yi bdag med rnam pa drug_/shes par bya ba'ang rnam pa bzhi/_/rgyu rnams 
[\[170b.7\]]dang ni bral gyur pa/_/lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs/_/so so rang rig mi g.yo ba/_/theg pa chen po bla na med/_/skye ba dang ni mi skye ba/_/rnam pa brgyad dang rnam dgur 'gyur/_/gcig dang rim gyis rtogs pa ste/_/grub pa'i mtha' yang gcig nyid do/_/gzugs med khams ni rnam pa brgyad/_/bsam 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]gtan tha dad rnam pa drug_/rang rgyal sras po rnams kyis ni/_/'byung ba rnam pa bdun du 'gyur/_/dus gsum po yang yod ma yin/_/rtag pa dang ni mi rtag med/_/byed dang las dang 'bras bu rnams/_/rmi lam gyi ni bya ba bzhin/_/sangs rgyas nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras/_/thog ma tha mar 'byung ba 
[\[171a.2\]]med/_/sems kyi snang dang bral ba ste/_/rtag tu sgyu ma'i chos dang 'dra/_/rum dang 'khor lo skye de bzhin/_/'byung dang dga' ldan gyi gnas dang /_/zhing kun tu ni gshegs par yang /_/snang yang mngal nas skye ba min/_/'pho dang rgyu dang sems can dang /_/de bzhin ston dang mya ngan 'das/_/bden pa 
[\[171a.3\]]dang ni zhing rtogs pa/_/rkyen rnams kyis ni 'phangs pa yin/_/'jig rten dang ni nags tshal gling /_/mu stegs 'pho dang bdag med dang /_/bsam gtan theg gnas thob pa dang /_/'bras bu'i spyod yul bsam mi khyab/_/zla ba skar ma'i rigs rnams dang /_/rgyal po'i rigs dang lha yi rnams/_/
[\[171a.4\]]gnod sbyin dri za'i rigs rnams ni/_/las las skyes shing srid las byung /_/bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur ba na/_/shi 'pho bag chags ldan pa ste/_/shi 'phor snang ba chad na ni/_/nyon mongs dra ba 'gag par 'gyur/_/ba lang lug dang bran rnams dang /_/de bzhin glang po rta la sogs/_/nor dang 'bru 
[\[171a.5\]]dang gser rnams dang /_/zhing gi dngos por rnam par rtog_/khri dag la yang nyal mi bya/_/sa la yang ni mi bsku'o/_/gser dang dngul dang khar ba dang /_/zangs kyi lhung bzed mi bcang ngo /_/snam bu sngon por btsos pa dang /_/ba lang lci ba ngur smrig dang /_/sa dang 'bras bu lo ma yis/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[171a.6\]]rtag tu dkar po bsgyur/_/lcags dang rdo dang kham pa dang /_/dung dang shel las byas pa yi/_/ma ga d+hA yi bre gang tshad/_/lhung bzed rnal 'byor can gyis bcang /_/dgu po gos dra'i gri yang ni/_/sor bzhi pa yi tshad du bya/_/rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_/bzo yi rig pa mi bslab bo/_/
[\[171a.7\]]rnal 'byor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/nyo dang btsong bar mi bya'o/_/kun dga'i khyim pas de byas te/_/de ni chos su ngas bshad do/_/dbang po bsdams shing don shes pas/_/mdo dang 'dul la de bzhin te/_/khyim pa dang ni ma 'dres par/_/rnal 'byor can la de ngas bshad/_/stong pa'i khyim 'am 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]dur khrod dam/_/shing gi drung dang phug rnams dang /_/bla gab med pa'am sog khrod du/_/rnal 'byor can gyis gnas bca'o/_/dur khrod du 'am gzhan gang du'ang /_/rtag par gos gsum bgo bar bya/_/gang yang bde bar byin pa dag_/gos kyi phyir ni sbyar bar bya/_/slongs mo'i zas la gzhol byas te/_/
[\[171b.2\]]gnya' shing gang du blta bar bya/_/me tog la ni bung ba ltar/_/de ltar bsod snyoms spyad par bya/_/mang po'i tshogs dang 'dres pa dang /_/dge slong ma dang gang 'dres pa/_/'dres par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba de/_/rnal 'byor can la rung ma yin/_/rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas/_/rgyal po dang ni rgyal 
[\[171b.3\]]po'i bu/_/de bzhin blon po tshong dpon la/_/zas kyi phyir ni bsten mi bya/_/shing dang btsas pa'i khyim zas dang /_/dga' dang mdza' dang ldan pa dang /_/dge slong dge slong ma dang 'dres/_/rnal 'byor can la de mi rung /_/du ba gar 'thul gtsug lag khang /_/cho ga bzhin du rtag 'tshed dang /_/bdag gi 
[\[171b.4\]]phyir ni gang byas pa/_/rnal 'byor can la de mi rung /_/'jig rten mtshan gzhi mtshan ldan la/_/skye dang 'jig las grol ba dang /_/yod dang med kyi phyogs spangs pa/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rnal 'byor bsgoms/_/gal te skye bar mi rtog na/_/ting nge 'dzin dang stobs rnams dang /_/mngon par shes 
[\[171b.5\]]dang dbang ldan gyis/_/rnal 'byor par ni myur du 'gyur/_/rdul phran dus dang gtso bo dang /_/byed pa las kyang mi brtag go/_/'jig rten rgyu rkyen las byung bar/_/rnal 'byor pas ni mi brtag go/_/'jig rten rang gi rtog pas brtags/_/sna tshogs bag chags dag las byung /_/srid pa sgyu ma rmi 'dra bar/_/
[\[171b.6\]]rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu ltos/_/sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa yis/_/spangs par lta ba rtag tu ste/_/zhi ba'i lam ni dger song nas/_/rnal 'byor sna tshogs rtsom par byed/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra bar/_/srid pa gsum la ma rtogs shig_/zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_/bsam pa med par 
[\[171b.7\]]lus bsrang nas/_/sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub la/_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/_/rnal 'byor shes pas mdo 'dul dang /_/'thad pas yang dag bsdus nas ni/_/chos lnga dang ni rang sems dang /_/bdag med pa la rnam par sgoms/_/so so rang rig chos nyid gtsang /_/sa rnams dang ni sangs rgyas sa/_/rnal 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]'byor can gyis de bsgoms na/_/pad mo che la dbang bskur 'gyur/_/'gro ba kun tu rab 'khyams pas/_/srid pa la ni skyo ba'i yid/_/rnal 'byor can gyis brtson byas na/_/nyi ma zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra dang /_/'od dang pad mo lta bu dang /_/ri mo nam mkha'i me 'dra mthong /_/
[\[172a.2\]]mtshan ma sna tshogs de dag ni/_/mu stegs can lam khrid par byed/_/nyan thos dag dang rang rgyal gyi/_/spyod yul du yang ltung bar byed/_/'di dag thams cad rnam spangs shing /_/snang ba med par nam gyur pa/_/de tshe sangs rgyas lha yi phyag_/thams cad zhing nas byung ba yis/_/de yi mgo la nyug mdzad 
[\[172a.3\]]de/_/yang dag rjes su 'gro ba'i ltas/_/rgyu med pa las dngos po ni/_/rtag dang chad pa spangs pa yi/_/yod med phyogs bral yod do zhes/_/dbu mar rnam par rtog par 'gyur/_/rgyu med par ni smra bas ni/_/rgyu med chad par lta bar rtog_/phyi rol dngos po ma rtogs phyir/_/dbu ma 'jig par byed 
[\[172a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur snyam pas/_/dngos po 'dzin pa mi gtong ste/_/skur pa dang ni sgro 'dogs pas/_/dbu ma dag ni ston par 'gyur/_/sems tsam du ni rtogs pa dang /_/phyi rol dngos po rnam bsal bas/_/rnam par rtog pa rnam ldog ste/_/lam de nyid ni dbu ma'o/_/sems tsam 
[\[172a.5\]]yin te snang ba med/_/snang ba med pas mi skye ste/_/dbu ma yi ni lam 'di yang /_/nga dang gzhan dag gis kyang bshad/_/skye ba dang ni mi skye dang /_/dngos dang dngos med stong pa dang /_/dngos po rang bzhin med pa ni/_/gnyis po de dag rnam mi brtag_/rnam par rtog pa 'jug med pas/_/byis pa rnams ni thar par 
[\[172a.6\]]rtog_/sems 'jug pa ni ma rtogs pas/_/'dzin pa gnyis ni spong mi 'gyur/_/rang gi sems snang rtogs pa'i phyir/_/'dzin pa rnam gnyis spong bar 'gyur/_/spong dang yongs su 'dzin pa ni/_/rnam rtog 'jig par byed ma yin/_/sems snang yongs su shes pa'i phyir/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go/_/
[\[172a.7\]]rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa/_/de bzhin nyid ni sems spangs pa'o/_/mu stegs can gyi nyes spangs pa/_/'jug pa gal te snang gyur na/_/ldog pa 'jug par mi byed pas/_/mkhas pa dag gis de bzung ngo /_/de rtogs phyir ni sangs rgyas su/_/nga dang sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad/_/rnam pa gzhan du rtog na ni/_/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]mu stegs can gyi smra bar 'gyur/_/mi skye ba la skye ba mang /_/shi 'phos med cing 'chi 'phor 'gyur/_/zhing rnams bye bar cig car yang /_/chu yi zla ba bzhin du snang /_/gcig dang mang por gyur nas ni/_/me yang 'bar zhing char yang 'bebs/_/sems la sems kyir gyur nas ni/_/de dag sems tsam du yang 
[\[172b.2\]]smra/_/sems rnams la ni sems tsam dang /_/sems med par ni sems las byung /_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang dbyibs/_/sems tsam du ni rtogs par rig_/thub dbang dang ni nyan thos gzugs/_/rang rgyal dang yang 'dra ba dang /_/rnam pa mang po'i gzugs gzhan gyis/_/sems tsam du ni de 
[\[172b.3\]]dag smra/_/gzugs med pas ni gzugs med gzugs/_/dmyal ba pa la dmyal ba'i gzugs/_/sems tsam gyi ni rgyu dag kyang /_/sems can rnams la ston par byed/_/de dag shin tu gyur nas ni/_/sgyu ma 'dra ba'i ting 'dzin dang /_/yid kyi lus kyang de bzhin te/_/dbang dang sa bcu rnams kyang 'thob/_/
[\[172b.4\]]rang gi rnam rtog phyin ci log_/spros pa dang ni g.yo ba dang /_/thos mthong shes dang rtogs pa dang /_/'du shes dag gis bus pa bcings/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni mtshan ma ste/_/gang ming de ni kun brtags pas/_/kun rtog pa dang mtshan ma ni/_/gzhan gyi dbang las shin tu 'byung /_/blo yis rab tu gzhig 
[\[172b.5\]]nas ni/_/brtag pa med cing dbang yang med/_/grub pa'i dngos po yod med na/_/ji ltar blo yis rnam par brtag_/yod dang med pa spangs pa yi/_/grub pa yi ni dngos po yod/_/dngos po yod med rnam grol ba'i/_/rang bzhin gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur/_/
[\[172b.6\]]kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin la/_/rang bzhin dag ni gnyis gnas te/_/brtags pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang /_/rnam dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/brtags pa sna tshogs snang ba la/_/gzhan gyi dbang zhes rtog byed de/_/rnam pa gzhan du 
[\[172b.7\]]rtog na ni/_/mu stegs smra la gnas par 'gyur/_/rtog pas brtags shes bshad pa ste/_/mthong phyir rgyu las byung ba yin/_/rnam rtog gnyis las grol ba ni/_/rdzogs pa nyid kyang de yin no/_/
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa/_bam po dgu pa ste tha ma/_zhing dang sangs rgyas sprul pa dang /_/theg pa gcig dang de bzhin gsum/_/mya ngan 'das dang nga med de/_/thams cad stong pa skye spangs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bye brag sum cu drug_/bye brag dag ni bcu po dang /_/
[\[173a.2\]]sems can so so'i sems rgyud rnams/_/de dag zhing gi snod yin no/_/ji ltar brtags pa'i dngos po ni/_/sna tshogs blta bar snang mod kyi/_/sna tshogs nyid ni de la med/_/'gro ba de bzhin chos sangs rgyas/_/chos kyi sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yin/_/lhag ma de yi sprul pa'o/_/sems can 
[\[173a.3\]]rang gi sa bon rgyud/_/sangs rgyas snang bar mthong ba'o/_/mtshan ma 'brel las nor ba yi/_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug_/_rtog las de bzhin nyid gzhan min/_/mtshan ma las kyang rnam rtog min/_/rang bzhin gyi dang rdzogs longs spyod/_/'phrul pa dang ni sprul pa gang /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[173a.4\]]mang po sum cu drug_/rang bzhin gyi ni sangs rgyas yin/_/sngon po dmar po lan tshwa dang /_/dung dang 'o ma kha ra dang /_/bska ba'i 'bras bu me tog sogs/_/ji ltar nyi las 'od zer dang /_/rgya mtsho rlabs dang ldan pa ni/_/mi gcig tha dad ma yin te/_/sems dang lhan cig ldan pa yi/_/rnam 
[\[173a.5\]]shes bdun po de bzhin no/_/rgya mtsho yongs su gyur pa ni/_/dba' rlabs sna tshogs de dag ste/_/rnam par shes zhes bya ba ste/_/kun gzhi de bzhin sna tshogs 'byung /_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes pa/_/mtshan nyid don du rab tu brtag_/brgyad po tha dad ma yin mtshan/_/mtshan gyi gzhi med 
[\[173a.6\]]mtshan nyid med/_/rgya mtsho dang ni dba' rlabs rnams/_/ji ltar khyad par med pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems la rnam shes dag_/yongs su gyur pa mi rnyed do/_/sems kyis las rnams sogs par byed/_/yid kyis kyang ni rnam par sogs/_/rnam par shes pas rnam par rig_/lnga pa 
[\[173a.7\]]snang la rtag par byed/_/sngon po dmar po'i rnam par ni/_/mi yi rnam par shes par gda'/_/dba' rlabs sems dang chos 'thun pa/_/ji srid thub chen bshad du gsol/_/sngon po dmar po'i rnam pa rnams/_/dba' rlabs dag la ma mchis la/_/mtshan nyid don du byis pa la/_/
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]sems kyi 'jug pa dag kyang bshad/_/de la 'jug pa med pa ste/_/rang gi sems ni gzung ba spangs/_/gzung ba yod na 'dzin pa yang /_/dba' rlabs 'thun par bsgrub par 'gyur/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas lta bur/_/mi yi rnam par shes pa snang /_/de phyir de yi 'jug pa ni/_/
[\[173b.2\]]dba' rlabs dag dang 'dra bar snang /_/dba' rlabs dngos por rgya mtsho ni/_/gar byed rnam par rig 'gyur na/_/kun gzhi 'jug pa de bzhin du/_/ci yi phyir ni blos mi rig_/byis pa blo dang mi ldan pas/_/kun gzhi rgya mtsho ji bzhin du/_/dba' rlabs 'byung ba'i chos 'thun phyir/_/
[\[173b.3\]]dpe yis nye bar sbyar ba yin/_/bzang ngan bar ma'i skye bo la/_/gdugs 'char 'gyur ba ji bzhin du/_/de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/_/byis pa rnams la yang dag ston/_/chos la rab tu zhugs mdzad cing /_/ji slad de bzhin nyid mi gsung /_/de ste de bzhin nyid gsung na/_/
[\[173b.4\]]sems la de bzhin nyid ma mchis/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs dang /_/me long rmi lam ji bzhin du/_/cig cha'i dus su snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin sems kyang rang yul la/_/yul rnams dang ni mi ldan pas/_/rim gyis 'jug pas rab tu 'byung /_/rnam par shes pas rnam par rig_/
[\[173b.5\]]yid kyis kyang ni rlom sems byed/_/lnga po rnams la snang bar mngon/_/mnyam par bzhag la rim pa med/_/ri mo'i mkhan po la la 'am/_/ri mo'i slob ma ji lta bur/_/ri mo'i don du tshon 'gyed pa/_/nga yi bshad pa de dang 'dra/_/tshon la ri mo yod pa min/_/pir la med cing snod la 
[\[173b.6\]]med/_/sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/_/tshon gyi ri mo rnam par brtag_/yang dag yi ge spangs pa ste/_/bshad pa dag ni 'khrul pa'o/_/chos rnams la ni gnas bcas shing /_/rnal 'byor can la yang dag bstan/_/so so rang rig yang dag nyid/_/rtog dang brtag bya spangs 
[\[173b.7\]]pa ni/_/rgyal sras rnams la bstan pa yi/_/byis pa rnams la rnam gzhan bshad/_/ji ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs dag_/snang yang yod pa ma yin pa/_/bshad pa sna tshogs 'khrul pa yang /_/de bzhin du na bshad pa yin/_/gzhan la gang zhig bstan pa de/_/gzhan la bshad pa 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]ma yin te/_/ji ltar nad pa nad pa la/_/sman pas sman rnams gtong ba ltar/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin sems can la/_/sems tsam du yang rab tu gsung /_/phyi rol bag chags sa bon gyis/_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'byung /_/gang gis 'dzin pa dbang yin te/_/gang bzung de 
[\[174a.2\]]ni brtags pa yin/_/phyi rol dmigs pa bzung byas shing /_/sems la'ang brten te skye bar 'gyur/_/nor pa rnam pa gnyis 'byung ste/_/gsum pa yi ni rgyu med do/_/gang las nor pa 'byung ba dang /_/gang la brten te 'byung ba ni/_/sems la bcu gnyis [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad drug_/de yi phyir 
[\[174a.3\]]ni ngas bshad do/_/bdag gi sa bon gzung 'brel las/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa rab tu 'byung /_/sems ni brtag byar 'jug pa yis/_/chos su 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur/_/kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las/_/rnam par shes pa gang 'byung ba/_/nang gi skye mched rnams yin te/_/snang 
[\[174a.4\]]ba gang yin phyi rol te/_/ji ltar mi mkhas pa rnams kyis/_/ska dang skrar gzung rmi lam gzugs/_/'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma byas/_/rtag par rtog ste de med do/_/ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu'i chu/_/med bzhin du ni snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin gzhan gyi dbang 
[\[174a.5\]]yin no/_/bdag dang dbang por gdags pa ni/_/ngas ni sems la mi bshad de/_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes pa/_/rang gi mtshan nyid bral ba'o/_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang /_/de bzhin bdag med rnam gnyis dang /_/chos lnga dag dang rang bzhin rnams/_/de ni 
[\[174a.6\]]sangs rgyas spyod yul yin/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni gsum du 'gyur/_/bag chags gcig gi rgyu las byung /_/ji ltar tshon rtsi gcig pu yang /_/rtsig pa la ni sna tshogs snang /_/sems dang bdag med gnyis po dang /_/yid dang rnam par shes pa dang /_/rang bzhin rnams dang chos 
[\[174a.7\]]lnga po/_/de dag nga yi rigs la med/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid bral ba dang /_/rnam par shes dang yid spangs shing /_/chos kyi rang bzhin med pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin no/_/lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/_/de la dge bar bya ba yin/_/de bzhin 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]gshegs rigs dag pa ste/_/kun tu rgyu ba spangs pa'o/_/mngon par shes dang dbang gis dag_/ting nge 'dzin dang stobs kyis brgyan/_/yid kyi lus ni sna tshogs pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rigs/_/so so rang rig dri ma med/_/rgyu yi mtshan nyid spangs pa ste/_/sa 
[\[174b.2\]]brgyad pa dang sangs rgyas sa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin no/_/legs pa'i blo gros ring du song /_/chos sprin de bzhin gshegs pa yang /_/de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs/_/lhag ma theg pa gnyis 'thob byed/_/sems can rgyud kyi bye brag dang /_/mtshan nyid 
[\[174b.3\]]phyir yang byis pa la/_/sems kyi dbang du 'gro ba'i sa/_/bdun po sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/_/ngag lus sems kyi gnas ngan len/_/sa bdun la ni mi 'jug ste/_/sa brgyad la ni de yi gnas/_/rmi lam chu bo mtshungs shing 'dra/_/sa brgyad dang ni lnga pa la/_/bzo dang rig dang sgyu rtsal 
[\[174b.4\]]rnams/_/rgyal sras rnams ni shes byed cing /_/srid pa'i gnas na rgyal po'ang byed/_/skye dang mi skye stong mi stong /_/blo ldan gyis ni brtag mi bya/_/rang bzhin nyid dang rang bzhin med/_/sems tsam la ni yod pa min/_/yang dag 'di 'o yang dag 'di/_/'di ni log ces brtag bya ba/_/
[\[174b.5\]]rang rgyal nyan thos rnams la bshad/_/rgyal ba'i sras la ma yin no/_/sems tsam la ni yod min te/_/yod dang med pa yod las min/_/skad cig pa dang mtshan nyid med/_/brtags pa dang ni rdzas kyang med/_/kun rdzob tu ni dngos rnams yod/_/don dam du ni rang bzhin med/_/
[\[174b.6\]]rang bzhin med la gang nor ba/_/de ni kun rdzob bden pa yin/_/chos rnams thams cad med pa la/_/nga yis rab tu gdags pa byas/_/byis pa rnams kyi brjod spyod ni/_/yang dag rnam par spangs pa yin/_/brjod pa las byung dngos po yi/_/don gyi spyod yul yod pa'o/_/brjod 
[\[174b.7\]]pa las byung dngos po dag_/lta bas yod pa ma yin no/_/rtsig pa med par ri mo dang /_/sdong dum la sogs spangs grib ltar/_/de bzhin kun gzhi dag pa ni/_/rlabs kyis rnam par mi mdzes so/_/sems ni gar mkhan bzhin du gnas/_/yid ni bzhad gad pa 'dra ste/_/
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]lnga dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes/_/snang ba tshon dang 'dra bar rtog_/chos bstan rgyu dang 'dra ba dang /_/rgyu dang 'dra bas gang sprul pa/_/de dag ngo bo'i sangs rgyas yin/_/lhag ma sprul pa'i sku yin no/_/snang ba rnam pa sna tshogs med/_/sems ni snang bas rab tu rmongs/_/
[\[175a.2\]]lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra bar/_/mi rnams la ni kun gzhi snang /_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang /_/rang bzhin dang ni chos lnga dang /_/bdag med gnyis po dag pa ni/_/rnam par 'dren pa rab tu 'chad/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'chad pa/_/so so rang rig spyod yul ni/_/
[\[175a.3\]]rtog ge can gyi yul ma yin/_/nyan thos rnams kyi'ang ma yin no/_/ring dang thung las sogs 'brel pa/_/gcig gis gcig ni rab tu 'jug_/yod par sgrub pa med pa ste/_/med par sgrub pa yod pa yin/_/rdul phran du ni rdzas gzhigs shing /_/gzugs la rnam par mi rtog go/_/sems 
[\[175a.4\]]tsam du ni rnam gzhag pa/_/lta ba ngan pas mi dad do/_/stong pa rnam par rtog tsam 'am/_/stong pa ma yin zhes pa ni/_/de nyid yod dang med rtog pa/_/brtag par bya ba'i don med do/_/yon tan rdul phran rdzas 'dus pas/_/byis pa rnams ni gzugs la rtog_/rdul phran re re yod pa min/_/de 
[\[175a.5\]]yi phyir yang don med do/_/rang gi sems ni snang ba'i dbyibs/_/mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang /_/phyi rol gyi ni snang ba med/_/de yi phyir yang don med do/_/sna tshogs skra shad 'dzings dang sgyu/_/rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/mgal me dang ni smig rgyu rnams/_/med kyang mig la rab tu snang /_/
[\[175a.6\]]rtag dang mi rtag de bzhin gcig_/gnyis dang gnyis min de bzhin te/_/thog ma med kyi nyes 'brel pa/_/byis pa gti mug rtog par byed/_/theg pa rnam par gzhag med de/_/theg pa gcig tu ngas bshad do/_/byis pa rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/_/theg pa tha dad ngas bshad do/_/de 
[\[175a.7\]]bzhin rnam par grol gsum dang /_/chos la bdag med pa nyid dang /_/mnyam nyid ye shes nyon mongs min/_/de dag rnam par grol bas spangs/_/ji ltar shing ni rgya mtsho la/_/rlabs kyis rnam par g.yeng ba ltar/_/de bzhin nyan thos rmongs pa yang /_/mtshan nyid kyis kyang rnam par 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]g.yengs/_/mthar phyin pa ni de la med/_/phyir yang ldog par mi 'gyur te/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi lus thob nas/_/bskal pa'i bar du mi sad do/_/bag chags nyon mongs pa dang 'brel/_/kun nas ldang dang rnam par bral/_/de dag ting 'dzin myos pas myos/_/zag med pa yi dbyings na 'khod/_/
[\[175b.2\]]ji ltar skyes bu ra ro ba/_/chang med nas ni sangs 'gyur ltar/_/nga yi sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/de dag de tshe 'thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar glang po 'dam bying ba/_/phan tshun du ni mi rgyug ltar/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dam bying ba'i/_/nyan thos rnams ni de bzhin 'khod/_/mi yi dbang po 
[\[175b.3\]]byin rlabs las/_/dbang bskur ting 'dzin dag la sogs/_/smon lam dag gis rnam sbyangs pa/_/dang po dang ni bcu por 'byung /_/ri bong rwa dang nam mkha' dang /_/mo sham bu yang de bzhin te/_/med bzhin tshig tu brjod pa ltar/_/dngos la rtog pa'ang de bzhin no/_/'jig rten 
[\[175b.4\]]bag chags rgyu las byung /_/gang na'ang med min yod med min/_/bdag med chos mkhas gang dag gis/_/mthong na rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/ming ni btags pa'i rang bzhin te/_/gzhan las byung ba dbang las skyes/_/de bzhin nyid ni grub par ngas/_/mdo dang mdo las rtag tu bshad/_/
[\[175b.5\]]tshig dang yi ge mang po dang /_/ming dag la yang bye brag tu/_/byis pa blo ngan chags pa ni/_/ji ltar 'dam la glang chen bzhin/_/lha yi theg pa tshangs theg dang /_/nyan thos kyi yang de bzhin du/_/rang rgyal de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/_/theg pa de rnams ngas bshad do/_/ji srid 
[\[175b.6\]]sems 'jug bar du ni/_/theg pa rnams la thug pa med/_/sems ni rab tu gyur pa ni/_/theg pa med cing 'gro ba'ang med/_/sems dang rnam rtog rnam rig dang /_/yid dang rnam shes nyid kyang ste/_/kun gzhi srid gsum g.yo ba rnams/_/de dag sems kyi rnam grangs yin/_/tshe dang 
[\[175b.7\]]drod dang rnam shes dang /_/kun gzhi srog gi dbang po dang /_/yid dang yid kyi rnam shes pa/_/rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag go/_/sems kyis su ni lus 'dzin te/_/yid ni rtag tu rlom sems byed/_/rnam par shes pa sems yul la/_/rnam shes bcas pas bye brag 'byed/_/sred 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]pa dag ni mar bshad de/_/ma rig pa yang phar shes so/_/rnam shes yul rnams rig pas na/_/sangs rgyas su ni de ngas bstan/_/bag la nyal ni dgra bcom ste/_/phung po lnga 'dus dge 'dun no/_/mtshams med par ni mtshams bcad pas/_/de ni mtshams med las yin 
[\[176a.2\]]no/_/bdag med gnyis dang nyon mongs rnams/_/de bzhin sgrib pa gnyis po dang /_/shi 'pho bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa yin/_/grub pa'i mtha' dang tshul rnams dang /_/so so rang rig bstan pa yang /_/bye brag shes pa sus mthong ba/_/de dag rtog pa'i dbang 
[\[176a.3\]]mi 'gro/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/_/dngos po la ni bden med na/_/dngos po med par mthar min par/_/rtog ge can dag cis mi 'dod/_/skye dang 'jig par 'brel pa yi/_/'dus byas rab tu mthong ba ni/_/lta ba gnyis po rgyas par byed/_/rkyen rnams shes pa ma yin no/_/mya 
[\[176a.4\]]ngan 'das pa yid spangs pa/_/gcig pu de ni bden pa yin/_/'jig rten brtags pa sgyu ma dang /_/chu skyes phung ltar blta bar bya/_/'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang /_/gti mug yod de gang zag med/_/phung po rnams ni srid las byung /_/rmi lam dag dang 'dra ba yod/_/gang gi nub mo thugs su chud/_/
[\[176a.5\]]gang la yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/ngas ni de yi bar du yang /_/cung zad bstan pa'ang ma yod do/_/so so rang chos lugs rnams la/_/dgongs nas rab tu ngas bshad de/_/nga dang sangs rgyas de dag gis/_/cung zad bye brag byas pa med/_/bdag ni rdzas dang 'dra bar yod/_/phung po rnams ni mtshan nyid 
[\[176a.6\]]spangs/_/dngos por phung po yod pa ste/_/de dag la ni bdag med do/_/nyon mongs bag la nyal bcas pas/_/so sor rnam par sgom pa dang /_/'gro ba rang gi sems mthong na/_/sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/gang gi rgyu dang rkyen rnams dang /_/mtha' bzhi yi ni rigs pa yis/_/
[\[176a.7\]]'jig rten rab du 'byung zhes pa/_/de dag nga yi tshul mi mkhas/_/'jig rten yod dang med mi skye/_/med min yod min gang na'ang med/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams dag gis kyang /_/byis pa rnams ni ji ltar rtog_/gang gi tshe na 'jig rten rnams/_/yod min med min yod med min/_/mthong na de tshe 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]sems ldog ste/_/bdag med pa yang rtogs par 'gyur/_/gang phyir rkyen las byung bas na/_/dngos po thams cad ma skyes pas/_/rkyen rnams thams cad 'bras bu ste/_/'bras bu la ni sred mi 'byung /_/'bras bu las ni gnyis 'gyur phyir/_/'bras bu las ni 'bras mi 'byung /_/gnyis su 
[\[176b.2\]]'gyur ba'i skyon gyi phyir/_/'bras bu las ni dngos mi dmigs/_/gang gi tshe na 'dus byas rnams/_/dmigs dang dmigs par bye bral zhing /_/sems med sems tsam mthong ba la/_/sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/_/sems ni ngo bo nyid kyi dbyibs/_/rkyen dang dngos po spangs pa ste/_/
[\[176b.3\]]mthar phyin ngo bo tshangs pa'i mchog_/de la ngas ni tsam zhes bshad/_/bdag ni brtags pa'i bden pa ste/_/rdzas su yod pa ma yin no/_/phung po phung po nyid de bzhin/_/brtags pas yin gyi rdzas su med/_/mnyam pa nyid ni rnam bzhi ste/_/mtshan nyid rgyu dang dngos las skyes/_/
[\[176b.4\]]bdag med pa yi mnyam nyid de/_/rnal 'byor zhugs pa'i bzhi pa'o/_/lta ba thams cad rnam bzlog pa/_/brtag par bya dang rtog pa spangs/_/dmigs pa med cing skye med la/_/sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/_/dngos min dngos po med pa'ang min/_/dngos dang dngos med spangs pa 
[\[176b.5\]]yi/_/de bzhin nyid ni sems bral ba/_/sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/_/stong pa mtha' dang de bzhin nyid/_/mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/_/yid kyi lus ni sna tshogs pa/_/sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/_/rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags 'brel/_/sems las byung ba sna 
[\[176b.6\]]tshogs pa/_/mi la phyi rol snang ba ni/_/'jig rten pa yi sems tsam mo/_/phyi rol gyi ni snang ba med/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas lta bur/_/sems ni sna tshogs par snang ba/_/sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/_/nyan thos zad pa'i ye shes dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye 'byung 
[\[176b.7\]]dang /_/rang rgyal sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/_/nyon mongs med pas shin tu 'byung /_/phyi rol gyi ni gzugs med de/_/rang gi sems ni phyi rol snang /_/sems ni khong du mi chud phyir/_/byis pa rnams ni 'dus byas rtog_/rang sems sna tshogs snang ba yi/_/phyi rol don rnams mi 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]shes pas/_/mtha' bzhin sbyar ba'i gtan tshigs kyis/_/blun po dag gis zlog par byed/_/gtan tshigs med de mtha' yang med/_/dpe dang yan lag rnams kyang med/_/rang gi sems ni don rgyud de/_/gal te shes na mkhas pa yin/_/gang zhig rtog 
[\[177a.2\]]pas brtag bya ba/_/de ni brtags pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/brtag pa la ni rten bcas te/_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug_/phan tshun ma gyes 'brel pa yi/_/bag chags gcig gi rgyu las byung /_/gnyis po blo bur byung ba'i phyir/_/mi rnams kyi ni sems mi skye/_/srid pa gsum na gnas pa 
[\[177a.3\]]yi/_/sems dang sems byung rnam rtog yin/_/gang zhig don snang 'jug pa ni/_/brtags pa'i rang bzhin de yin te/_/snang ba'i sa bon ldan pa'i phyir/_/skye mched rnams ni bcu gnyis so/_/gnas dang dmigs bya ldan pa'i phyir/_/lo rgyus su ni ngas bshad do/_/ji ltar me long gzugs 
[\[177a.4\]]brnyan dang /_/rab rib can la skra 'dzings pa/_/de bzhin bag chags kyis g.yogs sems/_/byis pa rnams kyis mthong ba yin/_/bdag gis rtog pas brtags don la/_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug_/mu stegs can gyis brtags pa ltar/_/phyi rol gyi ni don med de/_/ji ltar thag par ma 
[\[177a.5\]]shes nas/_/byis pa sbrul du 'dzin pa bzhin/_/rang gi sems don ma shes pas/_/phyi rol gyi ni don du rtog_/de ltar thag pa thag nyid du/_/gcig dang tha dad spangs mod kyi/_/gang gis thag par rnam rtog pa/_/de ni rang sems nyes pa yin/_/gang la gang gi dngos por yang /_/brtags na 
[\[177a.6\]]mi dmigs ma yin pa/_/de ni med par shes mi bya/_/chos kyi chos nyid de yin no/_/yod pa'i zla drangs med pa ste/_/med pa'i zla drangs yod pa yin/_/de phyir med par shes mi bya/_/yod pa nyid du'ang mi brtag go/_/gang 'di kun tu brtags pa la/_/brtags na de yi bdag nyid 
[\[177a.7\]]min/_/de yi bdag nyid min mthong zhing /_/ji ltar rnam par rtog pa 'jug_/gzugs ni gzugs kyi bdag nyid med/_/de bzhin bum pa ras la sogs/_/snang ba yod pa ma yin pas/_/khyod kyi rnam rtog mi 'byung ngo /_/thog ma med ldan 'dus byas la/_/gal te khyod kyi rtog nor na/_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]dngos po dngos nyid su zhig gis/_/'khor byas thub chen bdag la gsungs/_/dngos po dngos nyid med pa ste/_/sems tsam po ni snang ba yin/_/rang gi sems ni ma mthong bas/_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa yi/_/brtags pa gal te yod med cing /_/
[\[177b.2\]]de las rnam pa gzhan yod na/_/blos kyang rtog par mi rung ngo /_/'phags la gal te de yod na/_/de ni byis pas brtags ma yin/_/gal te 'phags las de log na/_/'phags dang byis pa mnyam par gyur/_/gang phyir sems ni rnam sbyangs pas/_/'phags pa rnams la nor pa med/_/
[\[177b.3\]]sems kyi rgyud ni ma dag pa'i/_/byis pa brtags la rtog par byed/_/ji ltar bu la ma zhig ni/_/mkha' la shing thog len byed cing /_/'di re bu gcig ma ngu bar/_/shing thog sna tshogs 'di yang long /_/de bzhin sems can kun la ngas/_/brtags pa'i 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis/_/bris 
[\[177b.4\]]nas yod dang med pa yi/_/phyogs spangs tshul ni rab tu bshad/_/gang gi ma byung rkyen rnams kyis/_/'byung ste 'brel las ma yin na/_/sngon ma skyes pa da skyes te/_/bdag nyid du yang red pa med/_/bdag nyid ma red skyes pa med/_/rkyen med par yang gang na'ang med/_/skyes pa'i dngos 
[\[177b.5\]]po de dag kyang /_/rkyen med par yang gang na'ang med/_/de lta bu yi mdor mthong na/_/gang na'ang med min yod min min/_/dngos po rkyen las skye bar ni/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis mi brtag go/_/mu stegs can rnams byis pa la/_/rkyen gyis gcig dang tha dad gtam/_/zer yang 'gro 
[\[177b.6\]]ba rmi lam dang /_/sgyu ma 'dra bar mi shes so/_/brjod pa'i yul gyi theg pa ni/_/theg pa chen po bla na med/_/ngas ni don kyang legs par bstan/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so/_/gang dag 'jungs pa'i nyan thos dang /_/mu stegs can gyis byas pa ni/_/gang phyir rtog gis bshad pas 
[\[177b.7\]]na/_/de dag don la 'khrul pa'o/_/mtshan nyid dang ni dngos dbyibs dang /_/ming ni rnam pa bzhi po yang /_/de dag la ni dmigs byas shing /_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug_/gang rnams gcig dang du ma dang /_/tshangs pa'i ris la dbang sgyur zhing /_/nyi ma zla ba'i 'od dag kyang /_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]gang 'jig byed pa sras ma yin/_/'phags pa'i mthong ba phun sum tshogs/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs rig cing /_/'du shes zlog la mkhas pa rnams/_/rnam par rtog pa'i mchog phyin cing /_/de ni nga yi bstan pa la/_/sras po grol ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/dngos dang dngos 
[\[178a.2\]]med rnam grol zhing /_/'ong dang 'gro ba rnam spangs pa'o/_/gzugs kyi rnam shes phyir ldog nas/_/gal te las ni 'jig 'gyur na/_/rtag dang mi rtag par mi 'gyur/_/'khor ba dag kyang med 'gyur ro/_/ldog pa'i tshe ni zhig gyur pa/_/gzugs kyi yul las phyir ldog ste/_/yod med nyes 
[\[178a.3\]]dang bral ba'i las/_/kun gzhi la ni rab tu gnas/_/srid pa'i gnas su rnam shes dang /_/gzugs lhung rab tu 'jig pa ste/_/gzugs dang rnam shes 'brel pa yi/_/las ni 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de dag dang 'brel pa'i/_/mi yi las ni 'jig 'gyur na/_/las kyi 'brel 
[\[178a.4\]]pa zhig pa'i phyir/_/'khor med mya ngan 'da' ba'ang med/_/zhig kyang de dang lhan cig tu/_/gal te 'khor bar skye 'gyur na/_/gzugs ni de dang 'brel pa'i phyir/_/tha mi dad pas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sems ni gzugs su rnam rtog las/_/gcig pa ma yin tha dad min/_/yod dang med 
[\[178a.5\]]pa'i phyogs spangs phyir/_/dngos po rnams la 'jig pa med/_/kun tu brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang /_/phan tshun mtshan nyid tha mi dad/_/gzugs kyi mi rtag nyid bzhin te/_/gcig la gcig kyang skyed byed pa'o/_/gcig dang tha dad rnam grol ba'i/_/brtags pa khong du mi chud na/_/yod dang 
[\[178a.6\]]med par ji ltar 'gyur/_/gzugs kyi mi rtag nyid bzhin no/_/brtags pa shin tu mthong 'gyur na/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni mi skye'o/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni rab mthong na/_/brtags pa de bzhin nyid du 'gyur/_/rtog pa rnam par 'jig pa na/_/nga yi tshul kyang rnam 'jig byed/_/nga yi bstan pa 'di 
[\[178a.7\]]la ni/_/sgro 'dogs skur pa 'debs pa yin/_/gang na gang tshe de 'dra ba/_/chos la sun 'byin yod pa'i rnams/_/nga yi tshul ni 'jig par byed/_/de dag kun dang 'grogs mi bya/_/gang zhig sgro 'dogs skur pa 'debs/_/brtags pa rnam par 'jig byed dang /_/mkhas pa dag tu gtam mi bya/_/
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]dge slong don la spang bar bya/_/skra shad 'dzings dang sgyu 'dra dang /_/rmi lam 'dra zhing dri za 'dra/_/rtog pa smig rgyu snang 'dra la/_/gang dag yod dang med lta ba/_/de dag sdud par su spyod pa/_/sangs rgyas kyi la de mi slob/_/de dag mtha' gnyis lhung ba ste/_/gzhan yang rnam 
[\[178b.2\]]par 'jig par byed/_/brtags pa'i dngos po rab dben zhing /_/dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba/_/rnal 'byor can ni sus mthong ba/_/de dag bsdu bar spyad par gyis/_/mu tig nor bu gser 'byung ba'i/_/'byung khungs 'jig rten na yod pa/_/sna tshogs las kyi rgyus ma byung /_/
[\[178b.3\]]bus pa rnams kyi 'tsho ba ltar/_/de bzhin sems can rigs rnams ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las kyis spangs/_/snang ba med phyir las med do/_/las las byung ba'i 'gro ba'ang med/_/ji ltar 'phags pas rnam sgom ltar/_/dngos po'i dngos nyid med mod kyi/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags 
[\[178b.4\]]pa ltar/_/dngos po dag ni yod pa'o/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/_/gal te dngos po med na ni/_/dngos po thams cad med pas na/_/su la'ang nyon mongs par 'gyur te/_/dngos po sna tshogs nyon mongs las/_/'khor ba dbang po nyer 'gro ba/_/mi shes pa dang srid 'brel 
[\[178b.5\]]ni/_/lus can rnams kyi 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/_/gang gi dngos po yod min pa/_/de dag dbang po 'jug pa med/_/rnal 'byor nyid kyang 'jug pa yin/_/bcom ldan gal te 'khor ba yi/_/rgyu yi dngos po ma mchis na/_/byis pa nan tan ma bgyis 
[\[178b.6\]]par/_/byed pa spangs pa'i thar par 'gyur/_/khyod kyi 'phags pa byis pa'i khyad/_/dngos po med na ji ltar mchis/_/rnam par thar pa gsum spyod pa'i/_/'phags pa dag la dngos po med/_/phung po gang zag chos rnams dang /_/rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid med/_/dbang po rnams 
[\[178b.7\]]dang rkyen gyi rnams/_/nyan thos dag la ngas bshad do/_/rgyu med pa dang sems tsam dang /_/'byor pa rnams dang sa rnams dang /_/so so rang gi de bzhin nyid/_/dag pa rgyal ba'i sras la bshad/_/nga yi bstan la sun 'byin pa/_/ngur smrig gi ni gos bgos shing /_/'bras bu yod dang 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]med smra ba/_/ma 'ongs pa yi dus na 'byung /_/dngos po med de rkyen rnams kyis/_/yod pa 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/brtags pa'i dngos po shin tu med/_/rtog ge pa rnams rtog par byed/_/ma 'ongs pa yi dus na ni/_/byis pa'i rang bzhin gzegs zan 'byung /_/
[\[179a.2\]]'bras bu med smra'i lta ngan pas/_/skye bo mang po rlag par byed/_/rdul phran las ni 'gro ba 'byung /_/rdul phran rnams ni rgyu med de/_/rdzas dgu rnams kyang rtag pa'o zhes/_/lta ba ngan pas ston par 'gyur/_/rdzas rnams kyis ni rdzas brtsams te/_/yon tan gyis kyang yon tan no/_/dngos po 
[\[179a.3\]]dag gi dngos nyid gzhan/_/yod pa dag ni 'jig par byed/_/gal te ma byung 'byung 'gyur na/_/'jig rten thog ma yod par 'gyur/_/'khor ba sngon gyi mtha' ma ni/_/ngas ni med par bshad pa yin/_/srid gsum thams cad bgrang ba dag_/de ste ma byung 'byung na ni/_/khyi dang rnga 
[\[179a.4\]]mo bong bu la'ang /_/rwa skyer 'gyur ba the tsom med/_/gal te gzugs dang rnam shes dang /_/mig ni ma skyes skye 'gyur na/_/cod pan re lde ras la sogs/_/'jim pa bsgongs las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ras la re lde yod pa min/_/rtsi skyang la yang ras med do/_/gcig po las ni 
[\[179a.5\]]gcig 'byung na/_/rkyen rnams kyis kyang cir mi 'byung /_/'tsho ba de dang lus de dang /_/gang yang ma byung skye ba ni/_/de dag thams cad gzhan smra ba/_/ngas kyang de dag shin tu bshad/_/snga ma'i phyogs ni brjod bya ste/_/de dag blo ni bzlog par bya/_/de dag blo ni bzlog byas nas/_/bdag gi 
[\[179a.6\]]phyogs ni ngas bshad do/_/nga yi slob ma rmongs pa'i sde/_/yod med phyogs la gnas 'ong zhes/_/de phyir mu stegs smra ba dag_/ngas ni brjod par byas pa yin/_/yan lag ser skya blo ngan pa'ang /_/'gro ba gtso las skyes pa dang /_/yon tan rnam par 'gyur ba yang /_/slob ma rnams la 
[\[179a.7\]]rab tu ston/_/rkyen gyis byung dang ma byung min/_/rkyen rnams yod pa ma yin te/_/rkyen rnams dngos po med pa'i phyir/_/ma byung ba ni mi 'byung ngo /_/yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral zhing /_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams spangs pa dang /_/skye dang 'jig pa med pa dang /_/rang gi phyogs te mtshan gzhi 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]spangs/_/sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba yi/_/'jig rten rgyu dang rkyen spangs pa/_/rtag tu rgyu med par mthong na/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go/_/dri za'i grong khyer smig rgyu 'dra/_/rtag par skra shad 'dzings pa bzhin/_/yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral zhing /_/rgyu dang rkyen gyis spangs pa yi/_/srid 
[\[179b.2\]]pa rgyu med par mthong na/_/sems kyi rgyu ni rnam par 'dag_/gang gi dngos po med pa dang /_/sems tsam po yang med 'gyur na/_/dngos po med par ji ltar sems/_/sems tsam du yang mi rung ngo /_/dngos po la ni dmigs byas shing /_/mi rnams sems kyang skye bar 'gyur/_/rgyu med par ni 
[\[179b.3\]]ji ltar sems/_/sems tsam du ni mi rung ngo /_/'phags pa'i dngos po'i tshul la ni/_/de bzhin nyid dang sems tsam yod/_/yod pa'ang min pa de dag ni/_/nga yi tshul la mi mkhas pa'o/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por ni/_/gal te sems ni 'jug 'gyur na/_/de ni 'jig rten pa 
[\[179b.4\]]yi sems/_/sems tsam du yang mi rung ngo /_/lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra dang /_/gal te rmi lam 'dra skye na/_/sems ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/_/sems la gnyis kyi mtshan nyid med/_/ji ltar ral gri rang so dang /_/ji ltar mdzub mo rang rtse la/_/mi gcod reg par mi 
[\[179b.5\]]'gyur ba/_/de bzhin sems kyis rang blta'o/_/gzhan dag med cing dbang yang med/_/brtags pa yi ni dngos po med/_/chos lnga rnams dang sems gnyis kyang /_/snang ba med la med pa'o/_/skye bar bya dang skye byed dang /_/dngos po'i mtshan nyid rnam gnyis te/_/skye bar byed las dgongs 
[\[179b.6\]]byas nas/_/rang bzhin med par ngas bshad do/_/rnam pa sna tshogs don dbyibs su/_/gal te rnam par rtog skye na/_/ri bong rwa dang nam mkha' yang /_/don du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gal te ma brtags don yod na/_/sems kyang don du snang bar 'gyur/_/sems dang tha dad brtags 
[\[179b.7\]]pa yi/_/don ni shin tu mi dmigs so/_/thog ma med ldan 'khor ba na/_/don ni gang na'ang med pa ste/_/sems ni rgyas par ma gyur na/_/ji ltar don du snang bar 'jug_/gal te med pas rgyas 'gyur na/_/ri bong rwa yang der 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med pas rgyas gyur pa'i/_/rnam 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]par rtog pa mi 'byung ngo /_/ji ltar de ltar med pa bzhin/_/sngon kyang de ni yod pa min/_/don med par ni don 'brel sems/_/ji lta bur na 'jug par 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid mtha'/_/mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/_/chos rnams skye ba med pa ni/_/don dam gyi 
[\[180a.2\]]ni rang bzhin no/_/rgyu dang rkyen la rtog pa yis/_/srid pa rgyu med ma byung bar/_/rab tu shes par ma gyur pas/_/byis pa yod dang med par lhung /_/snang ba med par sems mngon te/_/bye brag thog ma med rgyus 'byung /_/thog ma med nas don med na/_/bye brag ci yis skye bar 'gyur/_/gal 
[\[180a.3\]]te med pas rgyas 'gyur na/_/dbul po dag kyang nor ldan 'gyur/_/don med ji ltar sems skye ba/_/thub pas bdag la bshad du gsol/_/'di dag thams cad rgyu med de/_/sems kyang med cing spyod yul med/_/sems kyang rgyas par mi 'gyur te/_/srid pa gsum ni byed spangs pa'o/_/
[\[180a.4\]]skye ba rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/_/mi skye ba ni rab tu bsgrub/_/rgyu med smra ba bshad pa ni/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi rig go/_/'di dag thams cad ma skyes pa/_/dngos po med pa'ang ma yin te/_/rmi lam sgyu 'dra dri za'i grong /_/rgyu med pa yi dngos po yod/_/ma skyes rang bzhin med pa dang /_/ci 
[\[180a.5\]]phyir stong pa'ang bdag la gsungs/_/'dus pa dag ni ma gtogs par/_/nam zhig dngos po mi snang ba/_/de tshe ma skyes stong pa ste/_/rang bzhin med par ngas bshad do/_/rmi lam skra shad sgyu ma dang /_/dri za'i grong khyer smig rgyu rnams/_/rgyu med par yang snang gyur pa/_/'jig rten 
[\[180a.6\]]sna tshogs de bzhin no/_/de bzhin 'dus pa re rer yang /_/snang ba med pas yod ma yin/_/'dus pa mu stegs lta ba ltar/_/'jig pas rnam par 'gyur ba min/_/rgyu med smra bas brtsad byas te/_/ma skyes pa yang rab tu bsgrub/_/skye ba med pa rab bsgrubs na/_/nga yi tshul ni mi 'jig go/_/
[\[180a.7\]]rgyu med smra ba bstan na ni/_/ji ltar ci las ci dag gis/_/gang du rgyu med skyer 'gyur zhes/_/mu stegs can rnams 'jigs pa skye/_/rgyu las ma yin rgyu med par/_/nam zhig 'dus byas mthong ba na/_/de yi skye 'jig smra ba yi/_/lta ba rnam par ldog par 'gyur/_/dngos po med pa skye 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]med dam/_/de ste rkyen la brtags pa'am/_/'on te dngos po'i ming lags sam/_/don med pa yang bdag la gsungs/_/dngos med mi skye ma yin te/_/rkyen la brtag pa'ang ma yin no/_/dngos po'i ming yang de min te/_/don med pa yang ming ma yin/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang /_/sa bdun 
[\[180b.2\]]du ni phyin rnams dang /_/mu stegs spyod yul ma yin pa/_/de ni mi skye mtshan nyid do/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams bzlog pa dang /_/byed pa dag ni dgag pa dang /_/sems tsam du ni rnam gzhag pa/_/skye ba med par ngas bshad do/_/dngos po rgyu las 'byung med pa/_/rtog dang brtag pa spangs pa ste/_/
[\[180b.3\]]yod med phyogs las grol ba ni/_/skye ba med par ngas bshad do/_/sems ni snang dang rnam bral ba/_/rang bzhin gnyis kyang spangs pa ste/_/gnas rnams rab tu gyur pa ni/_/skye ba med par ngas bshad do/_/phyi rol dngos po dngos med min/_/sems kyang yongs su gzung ba med/_/lta ba 
[\[180b.4\]]thams cad rab spangs pa/_/de ni skye med mtshan nyid do/_/de bzhin stong pa rang bzhin med/_/de las bsags pa'i tshig kun brtag_/nam yang stong pas stong ma yin/_/skye ba med pa'i stong pa'o/_/rkyen gyi rnam pa 'dus pa las/_/rab tu 'jug cing ldog par 'gyur/_/'dus pa las ni logs 
[\[180b.5\]]shig na/_/skyes pa med cing 'gags pa'ang med/_/gcig pa dang ni tha dad du/_/ji ltar mu stegs can rtog bzhin/_/dngos po tha dad ma yin dang /_/'dus las gud na gang na'ang med/_/yod med dngos po mi skye ste/_/med min yod min gang na'ang med/_/de phyir gzhan du 'dus 
[\[180b.6\]]pa ni/_/rab tu 'jug cing ldog par 'gyur/_/'di ni brda tsam nyid yin te/_/phan tshun ltos pa 'brel ba yin/_/rkyen rnams 'brel las logs shig na/_/bskyed par bya ba'i don med do/_/bskyed pa med pas skye ba med/_/mu stegs can gyi skyon gyis spangs/_/'brel pa tsam du ngas bshad de/_/
[\[180b.7\]]byis pa rnams kyis mi rig go/_/gang na 'brel las logs shig na/_/dngos po bskyed pa yod ces pa/_/'brel pa rnam par 'jig pa ste/_/rgyu med smra bar shes par bya/_/gang na 'brel las logs shig na/_/dngos po su la yod na ni/_/mar me bzhin du rdzas rigs rnams/_/'brel 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]pa snang bar byed par 'gyur/_/'brel ba dag las logs shig tu/_/chos gang mi mkhas rtog pa ni/_/ma skyes ngo bo nyid med de/_/rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/'phags pas thob pa'i chos nyid ni/_/skye ba med pa gzhan yin te/_/gang de'i skye ba med pa ni/_/de ni 
[\[181a.2\]]mi skye bzod pa yin/_/nam zhig 'jig rten 'di dag kun/_/'di ni 'brel pa tsam mo zhes/_/'brel pa nyid du mthong ba na/_/de na sems kyang mnyam par 'jog_/mi shes sred pa las la sogs/_/'brel pa dag ni nang gi yin/_/'khor lo 'jim shing srub la sogs/_/sa bon 
[\[181a.3\]]'byung sogs phyi rol lo/_/'di ni 'brel ba tsam yin te/_/gang gi dngos po rkyen gzhan las/_/gang yang skye bar 'dod pa ni/_/'thad dang lung la de mi gnas/_/gal te bskyed bya'i dngos med na/_/blo yang gang gi rkyen las byung /_/'di dag phan tshun rkyen gyur pas/_/de phyir de 
[\[181a.4\]]dag rkyen du shes/_/drod gsher sra dang g.yo ba yi/_/chos rnams byis pas rnam brtags te/_/de ni 'dus pa chos ma yin/_/de phyir ngo bo nyid med do/_/nad pa'i dbang du sman pa dag_/bya ba tha dad ston mod kyi/_/de la gtsug lag tha dad med/_/nad kyis phye bas tha dad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[181a.5\]]ngas kyang sems can rgyud/_/nyon mongs nyes pa'i skyon chags pa/_/dbang po dag gi stobs shes nas/_/byis pa dag la tshul bshad do/_/nyon mongs dbang po tha dad pas/_/nga yi bstan pa dbyer mi phyed/_/yan lag brgyad ldan zhi ba yi/_/lam ni theg pa gcig yin no/_/rdza dang 
[\[181a.6\]]snam bu cod pan rwa/_/ri bong rwa ni med pa'i rgyu/_/gang rgyu tshogs las byung ba de/_/khyod kyis med par shes mi bya/_/yod pa'i rgyus ni med pa ste/_/med pa med par mi rung ngo /_/yod pa med pa'i zla las byung /_/phan tshun zla yi rgyu yin no/_/ci zhig la ni gnas bcas shing /_/ci zhig snang 
[\[181a.7\]]bar sus bsams pa/_/gang la rten pa ci zhig ni/_/rgyu med pa ste rgyu med min/_/gal te gzhan la de rten cing /_/de yang gzhan la snang gyur na/_/thug pa med par rab 'gyur te/_/ci zhig ci yang med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar lo ma shing sogs la/_/rten cing sgyu ma snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]dngos la brten byas shing /_/mi rnams la ni sna tshogs snang /_/sgyu ma'i dra ba lo ma min/_/gyo mo ma yin shing ma yin/_/byis pa rnams kyis sgyu mar mthong /_/sgyu ma byed pas gnas mthong ngo /_/de bzhin dngos la brten bcas te/_/ci zhig bye brag tu 'gyur na/_/snang ba'i tshe na 
[\[181b.2\]]gnyis med par/_/ci zhig tu ni ji ltar brtag_/rnam par rtog la rnam brtags med/_/rnam par rtog pa'ang med pa ste/_/rnam par rtog la med pas na/_/mya ngan 'das med 'khor ba med/_/rnam par rtog pa med pas na/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go/_/ma zhugs na ni ji ltar 
[\[181b.3\]]sems/_/sems tsam du ni mi rung ngo /_/bsam pa du ma tha dad phyir/_/bstan pa la ni snying po med/_/snying po med phyir thar pa med/_/'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs med/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa yi/_/phyi rol gyi ni snang ba med/_/sems ni gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang /_/bag 
[\[181b.4\]]chags kyis ni mgo yung bslang /_/yod med ma byung med pas na/_/dngos po thams cad ma skyes te/_/'di dag thams cad sems tsam mo/_/rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs/_/byis pa rkyen gyis dngos por 'chad/_/mkhas pa dag ni ma yin no/_/rang bzhin sems dang bral ba ste/_/sems ni 
[\[181b.5\]]'phags par nyer 'gro zhing /_/grangs can gcer bu khyad par can/_/de bzhin bram ze phyugs bdag rnams/_/yod dang med pa'i lta bar lhung /_/rnam par dben pa'i don gyis spangs/_/rang bzhin med dang ma skyes dang /_/stong pa sgyu ma dri med rnams/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang khyod kyis kyang /_/
[\[181b.6\]]su yi phyir ni de dag bshad/_/rnal 'byor can ni sems btsal la/_/lta ba rtog ge rnam spangs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnal 'byor bshad/_/ngas kyang rab tu bshad pa yin/_/gal te 'di kun sems yin na/_/'jig rten ci la rab tu gnas/_/ci phyir mi rnams 'ong 'gro bar/_/sa la 
[\[181b.7\]]rab tu snang bar gyur/_/ji ltar bya rnams nam mkha' la/_/rtog pas kun tu bskyod pas na/_/gnas med rten pa med bzhin du/_/sa yi steng bzhin de dag spyod/_/de bzhin lus can thams cad kyang /_/rnam par rtog pas bskyod pas na/_/de dag bdag gi sems la rgyu/_/nam mkha' 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]la ni bya bzhin no/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas snang ba'i/_/sems ni rab tu 'jug bshad pa/_/snang dang 'jug pa ji ltar cis/_/sems tsam po ni bdag la gsungs/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas rnams dang /_/snang dang 'jug pa bag chags dang /_/snang dang 'jug
