[\[182a.2\]]par rnam rtog pas/_/mi brtson rnams la skye bar 'gyur/_/dngos po rnam par brtags pa yul/_/sems ni yul las byung ba ste/_/snang ba'i sems ni yongs shes pas/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go/_/btags pa'i ming ni ming bral dang /_/blo dang rig bya spangs par ni/_/'dus 
[\[182a.3\]]byas nam zhig mthong gyur pa/_/de yi tshe na grol bar 'gyur/_/ming la ming ni rnam sgom par/_/shes par bya ba de tsam ste/_/gang dag gzhan du shes byed pa/_/de dag mi shes shes byed min/_/chos lnga rnams dang rang bzhin dang /_/rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams dang /_/bdag 
[\[182a.4\]]med gnyis kyi nang du ni/_/theg pa chen po thams cad 'dus/_/gang gi tshe na 'gro ba dag_/blo dang rig byas dben mthong ba/_/de tshe ming la ming rtog pa/_/mngon par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems mthong phyir ni bya ba dang /_/yi ge rtog pa phyir ldog go/_/rang gi sems ni ma 
[\[182a.5\]]mthong phyir/_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug_/gzugs med pa yi phung po bzhin/_/de dag las ni bgrang ba med/_/'byung ba tha dad mtshan gyi gzugs/_/ji ltar gzugs rnams mang por 'gyur/_mtshan nyid yongs su btang ba'i phyir/_/'byung las gyur min 'byung ba min/_/
[\[182a.6\]]'on te mtshan nyid gzhan gzugs na/_/phung po rnams kyis cir mi skye/_/phung po skye mched rnam grol ba/_/gang tshe mtshan nyid med mthong zhing /_/chos la bdag med mthong ba'i phyir/_/de tshe sems ni ldog par 'gyur/_/yul dang dbang po tha dad phyir/_/rnam par shes pa 
[\[182a.7\]]brgyad du skye/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni gsum yin te/_/snang ba med la ldog par 'gyur/_/kun gzhi yid kyi bdag yin te/_/shes pa nyid ni bdag gi yin/_/gnyis su 'dzin pas rab tu 'jug_/yongs su rtog na ldog par 'gyur/_/gcig dang tha dad rnam grol 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]zhing /_/rgyu ba med par nam mthong ba/_/de tshe bdag dang bdag gir yang /_/gnyis su rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma zhugs par ni rgyas mi 'gyur/_/rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yang min/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa yi/_/'gags pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci yi 
[\[182b.2\]]phyir na 'jig rten rnams/_/rnam rtog sems tsam bdag la gsungs/_/rgyu dang rnam par 'brel pa yi/_/mtshan dang mtshan gzhi rnam spangs pa/_/rang gi sems ni sna tshogs snang /_/mthong ba lta bur rnam par brtags/_/sems kyi snang ba shes pa dang /_/sems kyi don gzhan gzung 
[\[182b.3\]]ba'i phyir/_/blo yis gang tshe ma mthong na/_/med pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ni/_/sems su 'dzin par gyur pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar de yi yong mi 'byung /_/rnam rtog dngos min dngos med min/_/de phyir yod pa mi skye ste/_/sems snang yongs su shes pa'i phyir/_/rnam rtog 'jug par mi 'gyur 
[\[182b.4\]]ro/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa/_/rab tu gyur pa gnas med pa'o/_/bzhi yi phyogs rnams phyir bzlog cing /_/gal te dngos po rgyu can na/_/ming gi bye brag gzhan de byas/_/de ni bsgrubs pa ma yin no/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnams 'dus pa dang /_/rgyu ni bkag par gyur pa'i phyir/_/de 
[\[182b.5\]]dag don gyis dpog par 'gyur/_/yang na rgyu las byung bar 'gyur/_/gal te rkyen rnams mi rtag na/_/rtag pa'i nyes pa bzlog par 'gyur/_/byis pa rnams ni mi rtag phyir/_/'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med/_/gang yang 'jig par 'gyur bzhin du/_/rgyur gyur pa ni mi snang 
[\[182b.6\]]ngo /_/mi mthong ba ni ji ltar cis/_/mi rtag pa las srid mi 'byung /_/bsdu ba dag gis sems can gdul/_/tshul khrims kyis ni dbang du bya/_/shes rab dag gis lta ba gzhig_/rnam par thar pas shin tu spel/_/'di kun 'jig rten rgyang pan te/_/mu stegs can gyis 
[\[182b.7\]]gang bshad [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu yod lta bas/_/rang gi grub pa'i mtha' yang med/_/nga 'dra gcig pu rang grub mtha'/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par spangs/_/'jig rten rgyang pan rnam bral ba/_/slob ma'i sde la bshad par bya/_/sems tsam ste ni snang ba med/_/rtag dang 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]chad pa spangs pa yi/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ru/_/sems ni rnam pa gnyis su snang /_/ji srid sems ni 'jug pa'i bar/_/de srid 'jig rten rgyang pan yin/_/'jig rten rang gi sems mthong na/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go/_/'du ba 'bras bu don grub 
[\[183a.2\]]pa/_/zad pa 'bras bu ma mthong ba/_/'du dang zad pa yongs shes na/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go/_/rtag dang mi rtag byas pa dang /_/ma byas pa dang gzhan min gzhan/_/de la sogs pa thams cad ni/_/'jig rten rgyang pan tshul yin no/_/lha dang lha ma yin dang mi/_/
[\[183a.3\]]byol song [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gshin rje'i gnas/_/gang du lus can skye ba yi/_/'gro ba rnam pa drug tu bshad/_/rab 'bring tha ma'i las rnams kyis/_/de dag tu ni skye bar 'gyur/_/dge ba thams cad bsrungs na ni/_/khyad par du yang thar par 'gyur/_/khyod kyis dge slong sde rnams la/_/
[\[183a.4\]]skad cig skad cig dag la yang /_/tshe dang skye dang 'chi bshad pa/_/dgongs pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_/ji ltar gzugs las gzugs gzhan bzhin/_/sems kyang 'dus nas 'jig par 'gyur/_/de'i phyir slob ma rnams la ni/_/skad cig gcig nas gcig skye bshad/_/
[\[183a.5\]]gzugs dang gzugs la rnam rtog pa/_/'byung dang 'jug pa de bzhin no/_/rnam par rtog pa skye ba yin/_/rnam par rtog pa gzhan med do/_/skad cig skad cig gang ngas bshad/_/'di ni rkyen du bshad pa yin/_/gzugs su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/_/skye ba med cing 'jig 
[\[183a.6\]]pa med/_/rkyen dang rkyen las skyes pa rnams/_/ma rig de bzhin nyid la sogs/_/chos gnyis kyis ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/mi gnyis de bzhin yid gnyis so/_/rkyen dang rkyen las skyes pa yi/_/chos rnams gal te khyad med na/_/rtag la sogs pa 'bras bur 'gyur/_/rkyen 
[\[183a.7\]]rnams kyang ni rgyur 'gyur ro/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu bzang ba'i phyir/_/khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung /_/mu stegs can dang khyad med 'gyur/_/de phyir thub chen 'phags ma yin/_/'dom gang tsam gyi lus la ni/_/'jig rten kun 'byung 'jig rten dang /_/'gog par 'gro ba'i 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]lam gyi rnams/_/rgyal sras rnams la rab tu bshad/_/rang bzhin gsum la 'dzin pa yis/_/so so'i skye bo'i gzung 'dzin lta/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/chos rnams rnam par rtog par byed/_/de phyir sngon la blta bya ste/_/rang bzhin rnams ni smos par 
[\[183b.2\]]bya/_/lta ba rnams ni bzlog pa'i phyir/_/rang bzhin rnam par mi brtag go/_/nyams pa'i nyes phyir sdom pa med/_/sems kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnyis su 'dzin phyir 'jug par 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid ni gnyis med yin/_/mi shes pa dang sred pa las/_/rnam 
[\[183b.3\]]shes la sogs tshul ma skyes/_/mthar thug med dang byas pa dang /_/srid pa byas las mi skye'o/_/dngos po rnams kyi 'jig pa ni/_/mi mkhas rnams kyis rnam bzhir bshad/_/rnam par rtog pa gnyis 'jug phyir/_/dngos po yod dang dngos med med/_/mtha' bzhi dag las grol 
[\[183b.4\]]ba yi/_/lta ba gnyis po rnam spangs pa/_/mthong nas rnam rtog gnyis 'jug ni/_/mngon par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma skyes pa yi dngos po rnams/_/blo ni rnam par ldang ba'i phyir/_/skyes pa'i dngos po dag la yang /_/de dang 'dra phyir mi brtag go/_/ji ltar bdag dang gzhan 
[\[183b.5\]]rnams ni/_/rtag tu yod med ma 'dres par/_/lta ba rnam gnyis bzlog pa yi/_/rigs pa mgon po bdag la gsungs/_/mu stegs smra dang ma 'dres shing /_/rang rgyal nyan thos rnams spangs pa/_/rgyal sras rnams ni mi 'jig phyir/_/rgyal bas mngon rtogs spyod pa dag_/
[\[183b.6\]]rnam thar rgyu dang rgyu med kyang /_/skye ba med par mtshan nyid gcig_/rnam grangs gzhan gyis de dag slu/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu spang /_/sprin dang sprin gyi phung po 'ja' 'dra ba/_/smig rgyu skra shad 'dzings pa sgyu ma 'dra/_/dngos po thams cad rang gi rtog byung ba/_/mu 
[\[183b.7\]]stegs 'gro ba rang gi rgyu yis rtog_/skye ba med dang de bzhin te/_/yang dag mtha' dang stong pa nyid/_/de dag gzugs kyi ming yin te/_/dngos po med par mi rtog go/_/lag dang byed pa 'jig rten na/_/dbang po brgya byin grong 'jig ltar/_/de bzhin dngos po thams cad 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]kyi/_/rang bzhin brtag par mi bya'o/_/gzugs las stong pa gzhan ma yin/_/mi skye ba yang de bzhin te/_/gzhan ma yin phyir mi brtag go/_/lta ba'i nyes par rab tu 'gyur/_/dngos po'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir/_/kun rtog rnam par rtog pa'o/_/yongs su 
[\[184a.2\]]rtog pa bzung bas na/_/ring thung zlum la sogs pa'o/_/sems ni kun tu rtog pa yin/_/yid ni yongs su rtog pa ste/_/yid kyi rnam shes rnam rtog ni/_/mtshan dang mtshan gyi gzhi spangs pa/_/gang yang mu stegs mi skye dang /_/gang yang nga yi tshul blta bas/_/rtog pa de ni khyad par 
[\[184a.3\]]med/_/lta ba'i nyes par rab tu 'gyur/_/dgongs dang skye ba med pa dang /_/skye ba med pa'i don nyid de/_/rigs pa shes pa sus shes pa/_/de dag nga yi tshul shes so/_/dgos pa lta ba dgongs pa dang /_/mi skye ba ni gnas med pa/_/don gnyis yongs su shes pa ni/_/skye 
[\[184a.4\]]ba med par ngas bshad do/_/dngos po ma skye rnams mchis sam/_/'on tam lags sam thub chen gsungs/_/rgyu med smra dang mi mnyam dang /_/med dang chos rnams 'dres par 'gyur/_/rgyu med smra dang mi skye dang /_/mi mnyam mu stegs lta ba ste/_/yod dang med las 
[\[184a.5\]]rnam grol bas/_/sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/_/lta ba'i rgyu las byung ba yi/_/skye dang mi skye spang bar byos/_/rgyu med smra bas mi skye dang /_/skye bas rgyu yi gnas su 'gyur/_/lhun gyis grub la bya ba med/_/gal te bya yod lta 'dres 'gyur/_/thabs dang smon lam la sogs pas/_/
[\[184a.6\]]lta ba nyid ni bdag la gsungs/_/chos rnams thams cad med pa'i phyir/_/ji lta bur na dkyil 'khor skye/_/gzung dang 'dzin dang bral ba'i phyir/_/'jug pa med cing ldog pa med/_/dngos po las ni dngos gzhan mthong /_/sems kyang de las byung ba ste/_/chos rnams kyi 
[\[184a.7\]]ni skye med pa/_/de ni ji ltar bdag la gsungs/_/gal te sems tsam mi shes na/_/de yi phyir ni de bshad do/_/thub chen bshad pa thams cad la/_/snga ma dang ni phyi mar 'gal/_/mu stegs lta bas rnam grol ba/_/mi mnyam rgyu med spangs pa yi/_/'jug pa dang 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]ni ldog pa rnams/_/smra ba'i mchog gis bdag la gsungs/_/yod dang med las rnam grol zhing /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'jig pa'i/_/sa yi rim pa'i mtshams sbyor ba/_/pad mo'i spyan gyis bdag la gsungs/_/'jig rten mtha' gnyis lhung ba ni/_/lta bas rnam par dkrugs 
[\[184b.2\]]gyur pas/_/skye dang mi skye la sogs phyir/_/zhi ba yi ni rgyu mi rtogs/_/nga la dkyil 'khor gang yang med/_/nga ni chos nyid mi 'chad de/_/gnyis yod na ni nyes par 'gyur/_/gnyis ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs/_/stong pa skad cig dngos po rnams/_/rang bzhin med 
[\[184b.3\]]cing skye med pa/_/lta ngan smra bas g.yogs pa rtog_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis min/_/ji ltar rnam pa gang dag gis/_/yul la mngon sum 'gyur ba dang /_/rnam par rtog pa rab 'jug dang /_/ldog pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_/kha dog rgyas dang ldan pa'i 
[\[184b.4\]]phyir/_/spros pa rnams kyis bsdus pa'i gzugs/_/mthong nas phyi rol dag tu yang /_/rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug_/de nyid yongs su shes pa dang /_/yang dag ji bzhin don mthong phyir/_/'phags pa'i rigs dang 'thun pa yi/_/sems ni mngon par mi 'jug go/_/
[\[184b.5\]]'byung ba rnams ni ma gtogs par/_/dngos po skye ba med pa ste/_/rtag par 'byung ba 'dra ba'i sems/_/ma skyes par ni rnam par bsgom/_/rnam par rtog la ma rtog shig_/rnam par rtog med mkhas pa'o/_/rnam par rtog la brtags gyur na/_/gnyis min mya ngan 
[\[184b.6\]]'das ma yin/_/mi skye bar ni dam bcas pa'i/_/tshul ni sgyu ma bzhin du snang /_/sgyu ma rgyu med byung ba ste/_/grub mtha' 'das shing nyams par 'gyur/_/thog ma med nas bsgoms pa yi/_/sems ni gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang /_/don lta bu ste don med min/_/
[\[184b.7\]]yang dag ji bzhin rnam par bsgom/_/me long la ni ji ltar gzugs/_/gcig dang tha dad nyid spangs pa/_/snang ste de ni med pa'ang min/_/skye ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin no/_/dri za sgyu ma la sogs dag_/rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa ltar/_/de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi/_/'byung ba 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]yin te mi 'byung med/_/bdag dang chos su brtags pa yis/_/rnam par rtog pa skyes bu ltar/_/'jug pa rnam pa gnyis kyis 'jug_/byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so/_/ma tshang ba dang rkyen gyi dbang /_/de bzhin nyan thos dgra bcom 
[\[185a.2\]]pa/_/bdag mthu rag las rgyal ba yang /_/rag lus nyan thos lnga por bshad/_/dus gzhan du ni zhig pa dang /_/don dam du dang phan tshun dang /_/mi rtag pa ni rnam pa bzhi/_/byis pa mi mkhas rtog par byed/_/yon tan rdul phran rang bzhin rgyus/_/byis 
[\[185a.3\]]pa mtha' gnyis lhung ba dag_/yod dang med pa'i phyogs 'dzin phyir/_/thar pa yi ni thabs mi shes/_/ji ltar byis pa sor mo'i rtser/_/zla bar 'dzin te gzhan du min/_/ji ltar yi ger chags pa'i rnams/_/nga yi de bzhin nyid mi rtogs/_/'byung ba mtshan 
[\[185a.4\]]nyid mi 'thun pa/_/gzugs kyi dngos po bskyed pa ste/_/de ni 'byung ba gnas pa yin/_/'byung 'gyur 'byung bas ma byas so/_/me ni gzugs la sreg par byed/_/sprul pa'i rang bzhin chu yi khams/_/rlung ni gzugs la 'dor byed pa/_/'byung bas ji ltar skye 
[\[185a.5\]]bar 'gyur/_/rnam par shes dang gzugs phung po/_/de ni gnyis te lnga ma yin/_/phung po'i rnam grangs tha dad pa/_/ngas ni rnam pa brgyar yang bshad/_/sems dang sems byung bye brag ni/_/'jug pa rab tu 'jug pa yin/_/gzugs kyi rnam par 'dres pa ste/_/
[\[185a.6\]]'byung las gyur min sems gzugs so/_/sngo la sogs pa zla yis dkar/_/dkar la sogs pa'i zla yis sngo/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu bskyed pa dang /_/yod dang med pa stong pa nyid/_/grub byed grub dang bsgrub bya dang /_/grang dro mtshan dang mtshan gzhi dang /_/de la 
[\[185a.7\]]sogs pa thams cad ni/_/rtog ge can gyis ma bsgrubs so/_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes drug_/de dag bdag dang ldan pa ste/_/gcig dang tha dad bral ba yi/_/kun gzhi de ni rab tu 'jug_/grangs can gcer bu khyad par can/_/dbang phyug smras 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]pa'i rtog ge ba/_/yod dang med pa'i phyogs su lhung /_/dben pa'i don gyis rnam par spangs/_/dbyibs dang byad kyi bye brag dag_/'byung las skyes te 'byung ba min/_/mu stegs can ni 'byung 'gyur dang /_/'byung ba rnams kyang skye bar smra/_/de las gang gzhan mu 
[\[185b.2\]]stegs can/_/rgyu las ma skyes rtog par byed/_/yod med phyogs las rten pa'i rnams/_/rmongs pas khong du mi chud do/_/sems dang lhan cig ldan pa ste/_/yid la sogs dang bral ba yin/_/rnam dag mtshan nyid sems can ni/_/ye shes dang ni 
[\[185b.3\]]lhan cig gnas/_/gzugs dang las ni gang yod dang /_/phung po yul gyi rgyus byung dang /_/sems can rnams kyang nyer len med/_/gzugs med pa na mi gnas so/_/sems can med par gyur pa'i phyir/_/sems can smra la bdag med gyur/_/rnam 
[\[185b.4\]]par shes pa'ang mi 'byung phyir/_/bdag med smra ba chad par gyur/_/de yi gnas pa bzhi po rnams/_/gzugs med par ni ji ltar yod/_/phyi nang dngos po med pa'i phyir/_/rnam par shes pa mi 'jug go/_/srid pa bar ma'i phung po rnams/_/rtog ge can rnams 
[\[185b.5\]]'dod pa ltar/_/de bzhin gzugs med par skyes pa'i/_/srid pa'i gzugs ni med dam ci/_/sems can rnam shes med na ni/_/nan tan ma byas thar par 'gyur/_/mu stegs smra ba the tsom med/_/rtog ge can gyis mi shes so/_/de na gzugs kyang yod pa ste/_/
[\[185b.6\]]gzugs med pa la lta ba med/_/de med pas na grub mtha' med/_/theg pa med cing 'gro ba med/_/dbang po rnams dang ldan pa yi/_/bag chags las byung rnam shes pa/_/rnam pa brgyad las phyogs gcig ni/_/skad cig dus su mi 'dzin to/_/ji ltar 
[\[185b.7\]]gzugs ni mi 'jug ltar/_/dbang po rnams dang dbang mi 'jug_/de phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_/dbang po la sogs skad cig bshad/_/gzugs ni rtog par ma gyur par/_/rnam par shes par ji ltar 'jug_/rnam par shes par ma zhugs 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]na/_/ji ltar 'khor ba skyes par 'gyur/_/skyes ma thag tu 'jug par ni/_/rnam par 'dren pa mi 'chad do/_/dngos po rnams kyi rnam rtog pa/_/'gro bar bar chad med par g.yo/_/dbang po rnams dang dbang po'i don/_/mkhas la ma yin blun po la/_/
[\[186a.2\]]byis pa rnams ni ming gis 'dzin/_/'phags pa ming gis don la mkhas/_/drug po la ni nyer len med/_/nyer len bcas pa mi zin to/_/yod pa'i nyes dang rnam bral ba/_/bye brag mi 'byed 'phags pa smra/_/shes pa spangs pa'i rtog ge pa/_/rtag dang chad 
[\[186a.3\]]pas 'jigs pa dag_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas la bdag_/byis pa bye brag mi byed do/_/gcig pa la yang sbyin pa yod/_/tha dad pa la'ang yod pa min/_/sems dang lhan cig gcig pa ste/_/yid la sogs dang tha dad do/_/sems dang sems las byung bsgrags 
[\[186a.4\]]pa'i/_/sbyin pa gang tshe nyer len las/_/dbye na de la ji ltar na/_/gcig par khong du chud par bya/_/nyer len bcas pa'i dmigs pa ni/_/las dang tshe dang byed sogs pas/_/'dra dang mi 'dra tshul rnams kyis/_/med bzhin du ni sgrub par byed/_/ji ltar bsreg bya sreg 
[\[186a.5\]]byed la/_/me ni cig car sreg pa bzhin/_/de bzhin nyer len bcas pa'i bdag_/ci phyir rtog ge can mi ston/_/rtag tu skyes dang ma skyes kyang /_/sems ni shin tu 'od gsal na/_/bdag bsgrubs pa yi dpe dag dang /_/ci phyir rtog ge can mi byed/_/rtog ge 
[\[186a.6\]]can ni tshul spangs pa/_/rnam shes thibs por rmongs pa dag_/bdag tu smra bar byed 'dod pas/_/phan tshun dag tu rab tu rgyug_/so so rang rig rtogs bya ba/_/bdag ni rnam dag mtshan nyid de/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de/_/rtog 
[\[186a.7\]]ge can gyi spyod yul min/_/nyer len nyer bar len byed kyi/_/bye brag dang ni phung po yi/_/mtshan nyid gal te shes gyur na/_/tshul gyi ye shes skye bar 'gyur/_/mu stegs can gyis brjod pa ni/_/kun gzhi snying po lta bu bsam/_/bdag 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]dang lhan cig ldan pa'i chos/_/rab tu brjod pa ma byas so/_/de dag rab tu phye bas na/_/rnam par thar dang bden mthong na/_/sgom dang mthong bas spang ba yi/_/nyon mongs rnams kyang sbyang ba yi/_/sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal te/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[186b.2\]]pa'i snying po dge/_/sems can rnams kyi nyer len ni/_/mtha' dang mtha' med spangs pa'o/_/byi dor byas pas gser mdog dang /_/sa le sbram dang kha ra dag_/ji ltar mthong ba de bzhin du/_/phung po rnams la sems can no/_/gang zag med cing phung po med/_/
[\[186b.3\]]sangs rgyas ye shes zag med pa/_/rtag tu zhi ba rnams bsgoms te/_/de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/yid la sogs pa'i nyon mongs dang /_/bdag dang lhan cig ldan par ni/_/smra ba'i mchog gis rab tu bstan/_/sems 
[\[186b.4\]]ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/de las gzhan pa thog ma med/_/de dag gis ni bsags pa'i las/_/des ni de gnyis nyon mongs 'gyur/_/thog ma med pa'i blo bur gyi/_/nyon mongs rnams dang ldan pas na/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal bdag nyon mongs/_/ras 
[\[186b.5\]]dang 'dra bar dag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar gos sam gser yang rung /_/dri ma med phyir nyes spangs bzhin/_/gnas shing 'jig par mi 'gyur te/_/nyes med bdag nyid de bzhin no/_/rnga 'am dung ngam pi wang la/_/sgra snyan phun sum tshogs pa dag_/mi mkhas la la tshol bar 
[\[186b.6\]]byed/_/de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/_/sa la gter dang nor bu dang /_/de bzhin du ni chu rnams kyang /_/yod bzhin du yang mi snang ba/_/de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/_/sems dang sems las byung tshogs dang /_/bdag gi yon tan phung po ldan/_/mi mkhas 
[\[186b.7\]]pas ni mi shes te/_/de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/_/ji ltar sbrum par gyur pa'i bu/_/yod bzhin du yang mi snang ba/_/de bzhin bdag nyid phung po la/_/rig pa mi shes pas mi mthong /_/ji ltar sman gyi gsod pa dang /_/ji ltar me 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]ni shing rnams la/_/rigs pa mi shes pas mi mthong /_/de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/_/dngos po rnams la mi rtag dang /_/stong pa nyid kyang yod bzhin du/_/mi mkhas rnams kyis mi mthong ba/_/de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/_/sa 
[\[187a.2\]]dang dbang dang mngon shes dang /_/bla ma yi ni dbang bskur dang /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnams/_/bdag med na ni med pa yin/_/gang tshe 'jig byed song nas ni/_/gal te yod na ston ces zer/_/rang gi rnam rtog ston cig ces/_/de la mkhas 
[\[187a.3\]]pas bsgo bar bya/_/sangs rgyas chos la gnod byed pa/_/yod med phyogs la lta ba yi/_/bdag med smra dang smra mi bya/_/dge slong las la spang bar bya/_/bdag med nags tshal sreg byed cing /_/mu stegs nyes las rnam grol ba/_/dus mtha'i me ni 'bar ba 
[\[187a.4\]]bzhin/_/bdag tu smra 'di rab tu 'bar/_/kha 'da' sbrang rtsi kha ra dang /_/mar dang til la sogs pa dang /_/de dag rang gi ro yod kyang /_/ma myangs rab tu rtogs mi 'gyur/_/phung po mthong ba rnams la bdag_/rnam pa lngar ni gzung byas kyang /_/
[\[187a.5\]]mi mkhas rnams kyis mi mthong ste/_/mkhas pas mthong nas rnam par 'grol/_/rig sngags la sogs dpe rnams kyis/_/sems ni rtogs par mi nus te/_/gang la gang phyir gang don du/_/'dus pa rnams ni mi rtogs so/_/chos rnams mtshan 
[\[187a.6\]]nyid mi 'dra ste/_/sems gcig po ni mi gzung ngo /_/rgyu med pa dang mi 'jug par/_/rtog ge pa la nyes par 'gyur/_/sems kyi rjes lta rnal 'byor pa/_/sems rnams kyis ni sems mi mthong /_/mthong byed snang las byung ba na/_/snang ba ci yi rgyu 
[\[187a.7\]]las 'byung /_/nga ni kA t+yA ya na'i rigs/_/gtsang ma'i gnas nas byung ba ste/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong 'gro ba'i/_/chos ni sems can rnams la ston/_/'di ni sngon gyi lam yin te/_/nga dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/stong phrag gsum 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gyi mdo rnams kyis/_/mya ngan 'das pa shin tu bshad/_/'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs med du/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'tshang mi rgya/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi 'og min du/_/'dod chags bral khyod 'tshang rgya'o/_/'chi ba'i rgyu ni yul ma yin/_/rgyu ni 
[\[187b.2\]]yul la 'ching ba ste/_/ye shes kyis ni nyon mongs bsad/_/'di ni brtul zhugs ral gri'i so/_/bdag med sgyu ma la sogs pa'i/_/chos rnams ji ltar yod med 'gyur/_/byis pa rnams la yang dag snang /_/bdag med nyid ni ji ltar med/_/
[\[187b.3\]]byas pa dang ni ma byas phyir/_/rgyu ni 'jug par byed pa med/_/'di dag thams cad ma skyes te/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so/_/rgyu yi rnams ni ma skyes te/_/rkyen rnams de dag byas pa'o/_/de gnyis bskyed pa ma yin na/_/rgyu rnams kyis na ji ltar brtag_/
[\[187b.4\]]snga phyi dang ni cig car yang /_/rtog ge rnams kyang rgyur ston to/_/snang dang slob ma rdzas sogs kyis/_/dngos po rnams kyi skye ba 'chad/_/mngon par 'du byed mtshan rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ldan ma yin te/_/de dag 'khor los sgyur yon tan/_/des ni sangs 
[\[187b.5\]]rgyas mi brjod do/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ni ye shes te/_/lta ba'i nyes pas rnam spangs pa/_/so so rang rig lta bas rtogs/_/nyes pa thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o/_/'on lkugs long ba zhar ba dang /_/rgan pa dag ni shar gnyer dang /_/byis pa rnams la bye 
[\[187b.6\]]brag tu/_/tshangs par spyod pa med pa'o/_/bsgribs dang gsal dang lha yi ni/_/mtshan rnams kyis ni 'khor los sgyur/_/gsal ba la la rab tu 'byung /_/gnyis po gzhan ni bag med pa'o/_/rgyas dang gzegs zan khyu mchog dang /_/ser skya shAkya'i gtso bo 
[\[187b.7\]]rnams/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/de la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mya ngan nga 'das lo brgya na/_/rgyas dang khur 'phel de bzhin du/_/pan Da ba dang ko'u ra ba/_/dga' bo'i 'og tu mo'u ri 'byung /_/mo'u r+ya dga' bo skyabs 'og tu/_/kla klo 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]rgyal po'i tha shal rnams/_/kla klo'i rjes la mtshon gyis 'khrug_/mtshon gyi rjes la rtsod dus so/_/rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/_/'jig rten dam chos mi sgom mo/_/de la sogs pa 'das pa dag_/'gro ba 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor/_/me 
[\[188a.2\]]dang nyi mar phrad pa'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i khams ni bsregs nas kyang /_/gang la 'jig rten gnas gyur par/_/phyi nas lha rdzas gnas su 'gyur/_/rigs bzhi mi mgon dbang po dang /_/drang srong rnams dang chos kyang ste/_/rig byed chos sbyin mchod 
[\[188a.3\]]sbyin dang /_/chos kyi rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gtam dang srung la sogs pa dang /_/rkyang ba rtogs byed 'grel pa dang /_/'di skad bdag gis thos sogs pas/_/'jig rten shin tu rmongs par 'gyur/_/shin tu bcos shing bcag byas nas/_/
[\[188a.4\]]steng nas kha dog sbyar bar bya/_/sngo dang lci ba 'dam sogs pas/_/snam bu shin tu bri bar bya/_/lus ni gos rnams kyis bkra ba/_/mu stegs mtshan ma spangs pa yi/_/rnal 'byor can gyis bstan pa bshad/_/de ni sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan no/_/
[\[188a.5\]]tshags kyis btsags pa'i chu yang btung /_/rked pa'i srad bu bcing bar bya/_/dus su 'os par gyur pa dang /_/dma' ba spangs pa'i slongs mo zas/_/mtho ris nas ni lha rdzas 'byung /_/gnyis po gzhan ni mi las 'byung /_/rin chen mtshan rnams phun sum 
[\[188a.6\]]tshogs/_/lhar skyes pa yi 'gro ba'i dbang /_/mtho ris phan byed chos ston pa/_/gling bzhi rnams la rab tu spyod/_/shin tu yun ring gling spyad nas/_/sred pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/byis pa'i dus dang skyabs byung dus/_/gnyis po 
[\[188a.7\]]bzhin dang rtsod pa ste/_/nga dang gzhan ni byas dus la/_/shAkya seng ge rtsod pa'i dus/_/don grub pa dang shAkya'i sras/_/'jug sel rgyas dang dbang phyug dang /_/de la sogs pa'i mu stegs can/_/mya ngan nga 'das 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'di skad 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bdag gis thos la sogs/_/shAkya seng ge'i bshad pa yin/_/sgrung dang sngan chad byung ba dag_/de dag rgyas pa'i yin par 'gyur/_/'jug sel dang ni dbang phyug kyang /_/'byin par byed pa 'chad par 'gyur/_/mya ngan nga 'das phyin chad ni/_/de lta bu 
[\[188b.2\]]la sogs par 'byung /_/nga yi ma ni nor ldan te/_/pha ni bram ze skye dgu'i bdag_/nga ni kA t+yA ya na'i rigs/_/ming ni rdul med rgyal ba'o/_/yab dang mes dang nga bdag kyang /_/yul ni tsam par skyes pa ste/_/mtshan ni zla ba skyabs zhes bya/_/zla ba'i 
[\[188b.3\]]rigs las de skyes so/_/thar par zhugs shing brtul zhugs spyad/_/tshul yang rnam pa stong bshad nas/_/blo gros chen po dbang bskur te/_/lung bstan byas nas mya ngan 'da'/_/chos la blo ni sbyin par bya/_/chos kyis me khal la la sbyin/_/me khal slob ma zhan pas na/_/
[\[188b.4\]]bskal pa'i mthar ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/'od srung dang ni log dad sel/_/'dren pa gser thub rnam dag dang /_/rdul med nga dang gzhan dag dang /_/de dag thams cad byas dus rgyal/_/de yi 'og tu byas dus la/_/'dren pa blo gros zhes bya ba/_/shes bya 
[\[188b.5\]]lnga rnams ston pa'o/_/dpa' bo chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnyis gzhan la min skyob byung min/_/rtsod dus phyi ma'i tshe la yang /_/'jig rten mgon po 'byung mi 'gyur/_/byas dus la ni rdzogs 'tshang rgya/_/mi phrog pa dang ngo shes bya/_/ma dras kha tshar bcas 
[\[188b.6\]]pa ste/_/rma bya'i mdongs su 'dra ba yis/_/steng yog ri mo bri bar bya/_/mdongs dang mdongs kyi bar du ni/_/sor gnyis sor gsum tshad du bya/_/de las gzhan du bris na ni/_/byis pa rnams kyang chags par 'gyur/_/rtag par 'dod chags me zhi bya/_/
[\[188b.7\]]ye shes chus ni khrus kyang bya/_/rnal 'byor gyis ni nan tan du/_/dus mtshams gsum dang sdom gsum byas/_/mda' dang rdo dang shing la sogs/_/'phen la sogs pas bskyod pa dang /_/gcig 'phags na ni gcig lhung 'gyur/_/dge dang mi dge de bzhin no/_/
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]gcig pu mang po ma yin te/_/mi 'dra'i mtshan phyir gang na'ang med/_/len pa kun ni rlung dang 'dra/_/sbyin pa byed pa zhing bzhin no/_/gal te gcig po mang 'gyur na/_/thams cad ma byas par 'gyur ro/_/byas na rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/
[\[189a.2\]]'di ni rtog ge can gyi tshul/_/de ni mar me sa bon 'dra/_/'dra phyir mang du ga la 'gyur/_/de lta bur na mang du 'gyur/_/de ni rtog ge pa yi tshul/_/til las bal sran skye mi 'gyur/_/'bras ni nas kyi rgyu las min/_/gro dang 'bru yi rnam pa dag_/gcig ni 
[\[189a.3\]]ji ltar mang por 'gyur/_/sgra byed pa ni pa Ni ni/_/rkang pa'i mig dang che dbang dang /_/tshangs pa dang ni gar ga dang /_/'jig rten rgyang phan byed pa 'byung /_/kA t+yA ya na mdo byed pa/_/mchod sbyin bal ka de bzhin te/_/b+hu d+hu ka dang skar mkhan dag_/rtsod 
[\[189a.4\]]pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams byas pa'i 'jig rten gyi/_/skye dgu'i dpal gyi stobs can 'byung /_/chos kun la ni srung byed pa/_/rgyal po stobs can sa gtong ba'o/_/grog ma'i mkhar dang sran chung mig_/gya gyu can dang rta 'dzin bu/_/
[\[189a.5\]]khyu mchog dpal chen rnam dag kyang /_/ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/don grub pa dang shAkya'i bu/_/yang dag mtha' dang phud bu lnga/_/tshig stobs can dang yid gzhungs pa/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nags kyi gnas na 'dug pa'i tshe/_/dbyu 
[\[189a.6\]]gu shing dang pags pa dang /_/rked chings dang ni ril ba rnams/_/nga la tshangs pa sbyin par byed/_/rnal 'byor ldan pa chen po ste/_/thub pa rdul med ces bya ba'i/_/thar pa 'chad pa'i ston par 'gyur/_/'di ni thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes/_/tshangs pa tshangs pa 
[\[189a.7\]]brgya rnams dang /_/lha rnams mang por bcas pa yis/_/nga la mkha' las 'phags bor nas/_/dbang ldan de nyid mi snang 'gyur/_/dbang po lha dang bcas pa dang /_/'phags skyes po la sogs pa yi/_/sna tshogs gos dang slong snod kun/_/nags kyi gnas su 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]nga la 'bul/_/mi skye smra ba'i rgyur 'dod pa/_/skyes sam skyes par 'gyur yang rung /_/ma skyes pa ni sgrub par 'gyur/_/tshig tsam du ni brjod pa yin/_/sems de 'byung bar byed pa yi/_/rgyu ni ma rig de yin te/_/ji srid gzugs dag mi shes pa/_/de srid bar du de 
[\[189b.2\]]gnas ci/_/zhig par gyur ma thag tu ni/_/sems ni gzhan rnams rab 'byung ste/_/gzugs ni dus su mi gnas na/_/ci la dmigs te 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang las gang du 'jug pa yi/_/sems ni log pa'i rgyu las byung /_/de ni rab tu ma grub na/_/ji ltar 
[\[189b.3\]]skad cig 'jig par rig_/rnal 'byor can gyi snyoms 'jug dang /_/gser dang rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dang /_/'od snang gnas kyi gzhal med khang /_/'jig rten rgyu yis 'jig par med/_/gnas pa rnams dang thob pa'i chos/_/sangs rgyas ye shes phun sum 
[\[189b.4\]]tshogs/_/dge slong nyid dang shes thob rnams/_/skad cig mar ni ji ltar mthong /_/sgyu ma dri za'i grong sogs kyi/_/gzugs rnams ji ltar skad cig pa/_/'byung ba rnams ni 'byung 'gyur min/_/'gro bar 'byung bcang mi byed/_/sems ni ma rig rgyu las byung /_/
[\[189b.5\]]thog ma med nas bsags pa yin/_/skye bar 'jig dang kun 'brel bar/_/rtog ge pa dag rab tu rtog_/grangs can smra ba rnam gnyis te/_/gtso bo las ni 'gyur ba dag_/gtso bo yod na 'bras bu yod/_/'bras bu bdag nyid rab tu sgrub/_/gtso bo dang ni dngos 
[\[189b.6\]]'jug par/_/yon tan bye brag rab tu bsgrags/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa/_/'gyur ba la ni med pa yin/_/ji ltar dngul chu dag pa la/_/dri ma rnams kyis mi chags pa/_/de bzhin lus can thams cad kyi/_/kun gzhi gnas kyang dag pa'o/_/
[\[189b.7\]]shing kun dri dang sgog pa dang /_/sbrum ma'i bur ni mthong ba dang /_/lan tshwa la sogs ro yod dang /_/ci phyir sa bon bzhin mi 'gyur/_/de nyid dang ni tha dad dang /_/de bzhin gnyis ka gnyis ma yin/_/yod pa yi ni rgyu med de/_/'dus byas la med med pa min/_
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bdag ni rta dang 'dra bar yod/_/phung po ba lang ngo bo spangs/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa la/_/smrar med brjod med rang bzhin no/_/lung dang rigs pas ngan par mthong /_/rtog ge'i lta bas dri mar byas/_/phye ba med par bdag tu smra/_/
[\[190a.2\]]rgyu med ma yin gzhan na med/_/de dag gi ni nyes bsags pa/_/phung po bdag tu mi bsgom ste/_/gcig pa dang ni de las gzhan/_/rtog ge can gyis mi shes so/_/me long chu dang mig rnams la/_/ji ltar gzugs brnyan snang 'gyur ba/_/gcig dang tha dad bral ba 
[\[190a.3\]]bzhin/_/de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/_/bsgom dang rnam bsgom bsam gtan pa/_/lam dang bden dang mthong ba ste/_/de rnams gsum ni rnam bsgoms na/_/lta ba ngan las grol bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar mthong na zhig pa'i glog_/khyim gyi bu ga'i 'khor lo ltar/_/
[\[190a.4\]]de bzhin chos kun 'gyur ba la/_/byis pa bzhin du ma rtog shig_/dngos po med pas mya ngan 'das/_/byis pa'i sems ni rmongs par byed/_/ji ltar 'dug bzhin mthong ba dang /_/'phags pas mthong ba yod pa'i phyir/_/skye ba dang ni 'jig bral zhing /_/dngos po 
[\[190a.5\]]yod dang med spangs pa/_/mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bral ba yi/_/'gyur ba rnam par bsgom par bya/_/mu stegs can gyi smra dang bral/_/ming dang dbyibs ni spangs gyur pa/_/nang gi lta ba'i gnas rnams kyi/_/'gyur ba rnam par bsgom par gyis/_/reg pa dang 
[\[190a.6\]]ni gzir ba yis/_/lha dang sems can dmyal ba'i lus/_/bar ma do yi srid med de/_/rnam par shes pas bskyed pa yin/_/mngal sgong drod gsher la sogs pa'i/_/srid pa bar mar 'byung ba dag_/sems can mang po sna tshogs bzhin/_/'gro dang 'gro bar 
[\[190a.7\]]rnam par bsgoms/_/lung dang rigs par bral gyur pa/_/nyon mongs phyogs dang zad 'thob byed/_/mu stegs lta ba'i smra ba la/_/blo gros can gyis mi spyad do/_/thog mar nye bar len pa las/_/bdag ni phye bas bye brag dbye/_/ma phye bye brag 'byed 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]pa ni/_/mo sham bu la bye brag 'byed/_/'phrul gyis mthong ba sems can rnams/_/sha'i dang shes rab rnam par spangs/_/lus can kun gyi gzugs yod pa/_/'du byed phung por spangs gyur pa'o/_/kha dog bzang dang ngan gyur cing /_/grol dang ma grol khyad gyur pa/_/
[\[190b.2\]]lha rdzas 'du byed gtogs pa yi/_/'du byed gnas pa rab tu mthong /_/'gro ba'i mtshams su gzugs ldan rnams/_/rtog ge can gyi spyod yul min/_/mi yi yul las nga 'das te/_/ngan pa'i rtog ge can gzhan min/_/bdag med yin la sems 'byung na/_/ci las 
[\[190b.3\]]de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'bab chu me mar sa bon bzhin/_/ci phyir de yi 'byung mi bshad/_/rnam par shes pa ma skyes la/_/mi shes la sogs med pa ste/_/de med par ni rnam shes pa/_/rgyud kyi skye bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/dus gsum dang ni dus med dang /_/
[\[190b.4\]]brjod pa med dang rnam pa lnga/_/de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya bar/_/rtog ge can rnams rab tu brjod/_/shes pa 'du byed rgyus 'byung ba/_/'du byed rnams kyis mi brjod de/_/'du byed bsgrubs pa'i shes pa ni/_/'du byed du ni gtogs par 'dzin/_/'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung ste/_/rkyen rnams 
[\[190b.5\]]la ni rgyu med pa/_/gsal bar byed par rab tu ston/_/de med pas na byed pa med/_/rlung ni me dang sprin dag la/_/skyod pa yin te 'byin pa min/_/bskyod nas des ni zhir 'gyur na/_/ji ltar sems can rab tu bsgrubs/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa ni/_/nyer 
[\[190b.6\]]len rnam par spangs par brjod/_/me ni de la bsgrubs par yang /_/ji ltar byis pa rtog par byed/_/phan tshun stobs dang mthu yi phyir/_/mi rnams kyi ni me 'byung na/_/gang phyir me bzhin brtag bya ba'i/_/sems can gang gis rab tu phyung /_/phung po 
[\[190b.7\]]skye mched tshogs rnams kyi/_/rgyu ni yid la sogs pa ste/_/bdag med rtag tu 'dron mang bzhin/_/sems dang bcas te rab tu 'jug_/'di gnyis rtag tu 'od gsal ba/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa'o/_/de dag sgrub pa me ma yin/_/rtog ge 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]can gyis mi shes so/_/sems dang sems can mya ngan 'das/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal te/_/yid la sogs pa'i nyes pa yis/_/nyon mongs mkha' bzhin tha dad min/_/glang po'i mal sogs bzhin sngon yod/_/mu stegs lta bas dri mar byas/_/yid kyi rnam 
[\[191a.2\]]par shes pas g.yogs/_/me la sogs pas rnam par sbyangs/_/de yis yang dag ji bzhin mthong /_/mthong nas nyon mongs rnams kyang bshig_/thibs po'i dpe rnams rab spangs te/_/de dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul dong /_/shes dang shes bya'i bye brag gis/_/de 
[\[191a.3\]]gnyis gzhan du mi brtag pa/_/blo ngan rnams kyis mi rtogs te/_/brjod du med pa smra bar byed/_/ji ltar tsan dan byas pa'i rnga/_/byis pa dag ni gzhan du byed/_/de bzhin tsan dan a gar 'dra'i/_/shes pa rtog ge ngan pas so/_/langs nas kha zas phyis mi 
[\[191a.4\]]len/_/lhung bzed gnas dang phying pa can/_/gdong 'gyur la sogs nyes pa can/_/dag pas zas la spyad par bya/_/su zhig tshul 'di rigs pas dpog byed pa/_/dad ldan rnal 'byor brtson zhing mi rtog pa/_/mi gnas don la rten par gyur pa de/_/chos kyi rnam 
[\[191a.5\]]par gser bzhin spyad par bya/_/blun pas srid dang mi srid rkyen rtog pa/_/de ni lta ngan dra ba dri mar bcas/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bcas pa ldog_/chags med sangs rgyas phyag gis dbang bskur 'gyur/_/mu stegs rgyu yi phyogs kyis bslad/_/gzhan 
[\[191a.6\]]yang rkyen gyis rnam par rmongs/_/gzhan dag rgyu med de 'byung bas/_/don med pa ni chad pa'o/_/yid dang rnam par shes pa dang /_/rnam par smin pa gyur pa ste/_/yid ni kun gzhi las byung ba/_/rnam par shes pa yid las byung /_/kun gzhi las ni 
[\[191a.7\]]sems kun kyang /_/dba' rlabs bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/thams cad bag chags rgyu las byung /_/rkyen bzhin du ni 'byung ba'o/_/skad cig tha dad 'brel bas sbrel/_/rang gi sems ni don la 'dzin/_/dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag_/yid dang 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]mig la sogs las byung /_/thog ma med nas rnam par 'brel/_/don snang bag chags rnams las byung /_/ji ltar snang ba sems snang ste/_/mu stegs lta ba bzlog pa yi/_/de yi rgyus byung gzhan nyid kyang /_/de la dmigs nas 'jug par 'gyur/_/de las lta ba shes pa dag_/
[\[191b.2\]]'khor bar rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/dngos po rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra/_/dri za'i grong khyer rnams bzhin te/_/smig rgyu ba dang chu zla ltar/_/rang gi rnam rtog rnam par sgoms/_/'jug pa'i rnam pas de bzhin nyid/_/yang dag ye shes de yi gnas/_/sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs/_/
[\[191b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin ni gzhan rnams dang /_/mngon par shes dang dbang rnams dang /_/ye shes sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba/_/sa la zhugs nas thob par 'gyur/_/gang tshe 'gro ba rnam rtog mthong /_/de tshe sems ni ldog par 'gyur/_/sa ni rab tu dga' ba 
[\[191b.4\]]dang /_/sangs rgyas sa dang sa rnams 'thob/_/gnas ni rab tu gyur pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar sna tshogs nor bu bzhin/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed de/_/chu la gzugs brnyan ji bzhin no/_/yod dang med pa'i phyogs rnams dang /_/gnyis dang gnyis med pa dang bral/_/nyan thos rang 
[\[191b.5\]]rgyal 'das gyur na/_/sa bdun por ni 'gyur ba yin/_/so so rang chos mthong bas ni/_/yang dag pa yi sa sbyangs te/_/phyi rol mu stegs rnams spangs pa'i/_/theg pa chen po bshad par bya/_/rnam par rtog par rab gyur na/_/shi 'phos 'jig pa rnams spangs pa/_/ri bong spu yi nor bu 
[\[191b.6\]]bzhin/_/grol ba rnams la tshul yang bshad/_/ji ltar tshig la tshig gnas pa/_/gal te rigs la rigs de bzhin/_/de phyir rigs pa'i rigs pa yin/_/de las gzhan du ma rtog cig_/mig dang las dang sred pa dang /_/ma rig de bzhin tshul bzhin min/_/ming dang gzugs dang yid rnams 
[\[191b.7\]]dang /_/rnyog pa'i yid kyang de bzhin no/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ji snyed pa rdzogs so//_//bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa 'gos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//_//
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]{D108}]@#/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa rin po che'i mdo las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po zhes bya ba'i le'u/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[192a.2\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram lang ka'i ri'i rtse mo rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis bkod pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pa 
[\[192a.3\]]nas 'dus pa dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang tshad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa sha stag la/_byang chub sems 
[\[192a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po ni gtso bor gyur te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag gis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/_rang gi sems snang ba'i spyod yul gyi don la rab tu mkhas pa/_sems can sna tshogs kyi sems dang /_gzugs 
[\[192a.5\]]sna tshogs dang /_'dul ba'i sgo tshad med pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du kun du ston pa/_chos lnga dang /_rang bzhin dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_bdag med pa gnyis rtogs par khong du chud pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen po/_byang 
[\[192a.6\]]chub sems dpa' blo gros dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rgyu ba dag dang lhan cig tu/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal 
[\[192a.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/'jig rten skye 'jig yongs bral te/_/nam mkha'i me tog rab tu 'dra/_/ye shes yod med mi dmigs kyang /_/thugs rje chen po rab tu skye/_/chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]bzhin/_/sems dang rnam shes yongs su spangs/_/ye shes yod med mi dmigs kyang /_/thugs rje chen po rab tu skye/_/rtag dang chad pa yongs spangs pa/_/'jig rten khor zug rmi lam 'dra/_/ye shes yod med mi dmigs kyang /_/thugs rje chen po rab tu skye/_/
[\[192b.2\]]gang zag chos la bdag med dang /_/nyon mongs shes bya rab mkhyen cing /_/rtag tu dag cing mtshan med kyang /_/thugs rje chen po rab tu skye/_/kun las mya ngan mi 'da' ste/_/mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas mi dmigs/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' mi dmigs/_/blo dang 
[\[192b.3\]]rig par bgyi dang bral/_/yod pa dang ni med pa'i phyogs/_/gnyis po de dag shin tu spangs/_/thub pa zhi ba'i rnal 'byor pa/_/skye ba dag ni rab spangs pas/_/de ni len mi mnga' zhes bgyi/_/'di dang gzhan du rnam par dag_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen 
[\[192b.4\]]pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas rang gi rigs dang ming brjod de gsol pa/_bdag ming blo gros chen po ste/_/thos chen khong du chud par rtogs/_/deng 'dir brgya rtsa brgyad kyi don/_/bla ma'i mchog la zhu bar bgyi/_/'jig 
[\[192b.5\]]rten mkhyen pa'i skyes mchog gis/_/tshigs bcad de ni gsan pa dang /_/'khor rnams la ni rnam gzigs nas/_/rgyal sras rnams la bka' stsal pa/_/khyod la sogs pa rgyal sras rnams/_/ci dang ci 'dod dris shig dang /_/so so rang gi spyod yul ni/_/
[\[192b.6\]]ngas ni khyed la bshad par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/_ji ltar dran pa rnam dag 'gyur/_/ji ltar 
[\[192b.7\]]dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lta rmongs nor pa ji lta bu/_/nor pa ji ltar 'phel bar 'gyur/_/zhing du sprul rnams ci slad du/_/mtshan nyid dang ni mu stegs kyang /_/mtshan med rim pa ji lta bu/_/ci slad mtshan ma med pas bgyi/_/ci slad rgyal ba'i sras zhes 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]bgyi/_/rnam grol gang du mchi bar 'gyur/_/gang la 'ching zhing gang dag dgrol/_/bsam gtan spyod yul ji lta bu/_/ji slad theg pa gsum po mchis/_/bdag la bstan cing bshad du gsol/_/rkyen rnams gang las skye ba lags/_/byed 
[\[193a.2\]]dang byas pa ji lta bu/_/gnyi ga tha dad ci slad bshad/_/ji lta bur na 'phel ba lags/_/gzugs med snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_/'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug ji lta bu/_/'du shes 'gog pa ji lta bu/_/ting nge 'dzin las ji ltar sad/_/ci yi slad du byas pa 
[\[193a.3\]]'byung /_/'gro ba dang ni lus 'dzin ci/_/ji ltar rnam rtog snang bar 'gyur/_/sa rnams ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/_/srid gsum 'jig pa de su zhig_/gnas ni gang lags lus ni ci/_/skye gnas gang du bgrod par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sras su ji ltar 'gyur/_/
[\[193a.4\]]mngon par shes dang dbang rnams dang /_/ting 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar 'thob/_/ting 'dzin sems ni ji lta bu/_/rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol/_/ci slad kun gzhi zhes bgyi lags/_/yid dang rnam shes ji lta bu/_/skye dang 'jig pa ji lta bu/_/ji ltar 
[\[193a.5\]]mthong nas slar yang ldog_/ji lta bur na rigs su 'gyur/_/rigs ma mchis dang sems tsam dang /_/sgro 'dogs mtshan nyid ji lta bu/_/bdag med don du ji ltar 'gyur/_/sems can ma mchis ji lta bu/_/kun rdzob bshad pa ji lta bu/_/ji ltar rtag dang chad 
[\[193a.6\]]pa yi/_/lta ba rab tu 'byung mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas mu stegs dag_/mtshan nyid rnams kyis 'gal mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar ma 'ongs dus dag na/_/sde pa tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar stong nyid rgyu ci yis/_/ji ltar skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/_/
[\[193a.7\]]mngal gyi snying por ji ltar skye/_/ji ltar 'jig rten gyis mi g.yos/_/ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra/_/de bzhin dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/'jig rten smig rgyu lta bu dang /_/chu zla dang ni 'od dag dang /_/byang chub yan lag ci slad gsungs/_/de bzhin byang chub phyogs 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]rnams kyang /_/yul rnams ci slad 'khrug par 'gyur/_/ci slad srid par lta bar bgyid/_/ji ltar skye 'gag ma mchis shing /_/'jig rten nam mkha' me tog 'dra/_/'jig rten ji ltar thugs su chud/_/ci slad yi ge bral bar gsung /_/rnam rtog spangs pa de su 
[\[193b.2\]]lags/_/ji ltar nam mkha' 'dra ba lags/_/de kho na la du zhig mchis/_/pha rol phyin sems rnam pa du/_/rgyu gang gis ni sa rnams sgrol/_/len ma mchis par su zhig mchi/_/bdag med rnam gnyis gang zhig lags/_/shes bya ji ltar rnam par 'dag_/ye 
[\[193b.3\]]shes dag ni rnam pa du/_/tshul khrims sems can nyid ni du/_/nor bu mu tig la sogs pa'i/_/rigs rnams su yis rab tu bskyed/_/sems can rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/brjod pa dag ni su yis bskyed/_/rig pa'i gnas dang bzo yi rnams/_/su yis 
[\[193b.4\]]ji ltar rab tu bstan/_/tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa du/_/tshigs bcad ring thung ji lta bu/_/rigs pa rnam pa du zhig mchis/_/ci yi slad du smra zhes bgyi/_/skom dang zas rnams ji ltar 'byung /_/ji ltar sred pa'i 'dod pa 'byung /_/ci slad rgyal po zhes bgyi lags/_/
[\[193b.5\]]'khor los sgyur dang rgyal phran ci/_/yul ni ji ltar bsrung bar bgyi/_/lha yi ris la rnam pa du/_/ci yi slad du sa zhes bgyi/_/gza' skar nyi zla ji lta bu/_/thar pa dang ni rnal 'byor pa/_/de dag rnam pa du zhig mchis/_/slob ma rnam pa du zhig mchis/_/slob 
[\[193b.6\]]dpon du yang ji ltar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnam pa du zhig lags/_/skyes pa'i rabs la rnam pa du/_/bdud dang slob pa'i bye brag rnams/_/de dag la ni rnam pa du/_/rang bzhin dang ni sems rnams kyang /_/de dag la ni du zhig mchis/_/btags pa tsam 
[\[193b.7\]]yang ji lta bu/_/rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol/_/nam mkha' sprin rlung ji lta bu/_/dran dang yid gzhungs gsal ba ci/_/nags tshal shing ni ji lta bu/_/'khri shing dag ni ci las gyur/_/glang po rta dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams/_/ji ltar gzung du rung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ngan pa'i mi rnams ji lta bu/_/rgyu gang gis ni ngan par 'gyur/_/tshig drug gis ni ji ltar bsdus/_/'dod chen par yang ji ltar 'gyur/_/skyes pa bud med ma ning rnams/_/de dag thams cad ci slad 'byung /_/rnal 'byor las ni ji ltar ldog_/
[\[194a.2\]]rnal 'byor ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pas ni chos gang gis/_/ci 'dra'i gang zag rnam par 'jog_/sems can 'gro bar skye ba rnams/_/mtshan nyid mtshan ma'i rnam pa ci/_/phyug por gyur pa ji lta bu/_/rgyu gang gis ni phyug por 'gyur/_/shAkya'i rigs 
[\[194a.3\]]ni ji lta bu/_/ci yi rgyu yis shAkya byung /_/bu ram shing pa ji ltar byung /_/bla med gtso bos bshad du gsol/_/yun ring dka' thub drang srong gang /_/des ni ji ltar rjes su ston/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhing rnams su/_/mtshan dang de bzhin gzugs sna tshogs/_/rgyal 
[\[194a.4\]]ba'i sras kyis bskor ba yang /_/ci yi slad du kun na gda'/_/ci slad sha rnams gsol mi mdzad/_/ci slad sha ni rab tu bkag_/sha za'i rigs su skyes pa rnams/_/rgyu gang gis ni sha 'tshal lags/_/nyi zla'i dbyibs shing ji lta bu/_/ri rab pad+ma 'dra ba dang /_/seng ge 
[\[194a.5\]]mtshan mchog zhing dag dang /_/'jig rten gzur gnas spyi'u tshugs dang /_/dbang po'i dra ba 'dra ba dang /_/kha cig rin chen kun gyi zhing /_/dgu po rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rnga 'dra dang /_/me tog sna tshogs dbyibs 'dra dang /_/kha cig nyi zla'i 'od dang bral/_/'dri la sogs pa tshad ma 
[\[194a.6\]]mchis/_/sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta bu/_/rnam smin las byung sangs rgyas dang /_/de bzhin nyid kyi sangs rgyas ci/_/ye shes sangs rgyas ji lta bu/_/ci slad 'dod pa'i khams rnams su/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/_/ci yi slad du 'og min pa/_/chags bral 
[\[194a.7\]]khrod du byang chub brnyes/_/bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas ni/_/yang dag bstan pa su zhig 'dzin/_/lha yi ston pa ji srid bzhugs/_/yang dag chos ni ji srid gnas/_/grub mtha' dang ni lta ba yang /_/de dag la ni rnam pa du/_/'dul ba dang ni dge slong ris/_/ci slad rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ni gang /_/rgyal ba'i sras ni de dag dang /_/rang rgyal dang ni nyan thos dag_/rgyu gang gis na 'gyur brgyar 'gyur/_/rgyu gang gis ni snang med brgya/_/'jig rten mngon shes ji lta bu/_/'jig rten 'das kyi'ang ji lta bu/_/sems ni sa rnams bdun por yang /_/ci ltar ci slad bdag la 
[\[194b.2\]]gsungs/_/dge 'dun la ni rnam pa du/_/ji ltar dge 'dun dben du 'gyur/_/sems can gso ba'i bstan bcos rnams/_/de dag rgyu rkyen gang gis lags/_/ci slad thub pa chen po yis/_/'od srung 'khor ba 'jig dang ni/_/gser thub kyang ni nga yin zhes/_/de 
[\[194b.3\]]skad du ni bka' yang stsal/_/ci slad rtag dang chad pa dang /_/de bzhin bdag dang bdag med gsungs/_/ci slad du ni thams cad du/_/yang dag don ni gsung mi mdzad/_/sems can dag gi slad du yang /_/sems tsam du ni dbye ba mdzad/_/ci slad skyes bu na chung tshal/_/
[\[194b.4\]]a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/ke la sa dang khor yug ri/_/rdo rje la sogs ri bo rnams/_/rin chen sna tshogs rab brgyan cing /_/drang srong dri zas kun gang ba/_/ji ltar ci slad bdag la gsungs/_/bla med 'jig rten mkhyen pa yis/_/theg chen sgrol ba'i sgo rnams dang /_/
[\[194b.5\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po mchog_/de yi tshigs bcad gsan pa dang /_/legs so dris pa rab tu legs/_/blo gros chen po legs par nyon/_/ngas ni deng 'dir rim bzhin du/_/khyod kyis gang dris bshad par bya/_/skye dang skye ba med pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[194b.6\]]stong skad cig ma/_/rang bzhin med la 'jug par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas pha rol phyin rnams dang /_/rgyal sras dang ni nyan thos dang /_/rang rgyal mu stegs can rnams dang /_/gzugs med pa yi spyod rnams dang /_/de bzhin dngos po sna tshogs rnams/_/ri rab mtsho 
[\[194b.7\]]bran ri rnams dang /_/gling dang zhing dang sa rnams dang /_/gza' skar nyi ma zla ba dang /_/mu stegs lha dang lha ma yin/_/rnam thar dbang dang mngon shes dang /_/stobs dang bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin/_/'gog dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang /_/byang chub yan lag lam gyi phyogs/_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang /_/phung po lus rnams 'gro 'ong dang /_/snyoms par 'jug dang 'gog pa dang /_/ting 'dzin ldang sems bshad pa dang /_/sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang /_/bdag med pa dang chos lnga dang /_/rang bzhin rtog dang 
[\[195a.2\]]brtag pa dang /_/snang dang lta ba gnyis po dang /_/theg pa dang ni rigs rnams dang /_/gser dngul nor bu la sogs dang /_/'dod chen pa dang 'byung chen dang /_/dkrugs ma dag dang sangs rgyas gcig_/shes dang shes bya 'jug thob dang /_/sems can srid dang mi srid dang /_/glang 
[\[195a.3\]]po rta dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams/_/ci yi phyir na gzung du rung /_/dpe dang rgyu dang grub mtha' dang /_/byed pa dang ni byas pa rnams/_/nags tshal nor pa mngon shes dang /_/sems can de ni snang ba med/_/sa rnams rim gyis 'pho ba med/_/'gyur ba brgya po snang med brgya/_/gso ba'i 
[\[195a.4\]]bstan bcos bzo rnams dang /_/sgyu rtsal dang ni rig pa'i gnas/_/ri bo ri rab sa dag dang /_/rgya mtsho nyi ma zla ba'i tshad/_/sems can rab 'bring tha ma yi/_/lus la rdul ni du zhig yod/_/zhing dang zhing la rdul du zhig_/gzhu dang gzhu la ji snyed yod/_/khru dang gom pa rgyang 
[\[195a.5\]]grags dang /_/dpag tshad phyed dang dpag tshad la/_/ri bong nyi zer sro ma dang /_/lug gi dang ni nas kyang du/_/bre gang la ni nas 'bru du/_/bre phyed la yang nas 'bru du/_/bre bo gang dang bcu dag la/_/grangs 'bum dang ni bye ba dang /_/de bzhin du ni shu rdog la/_/de dag 
[\[195a.6\]]grangs ni du zhig yod/_/rdul phran dag ni du zhig yod/_/rdul phran dag ni du zhig la/_/yungs kar 'bru ni gcig tu 'gyur/_/yungs kar 'bru ni du zhig gis/_/'ol ma se ni gcig tu 'gyur/_/'ol ma se ni du zhig la/_/ma sha 'bru ni gcig tu 'gyur/_/ma sha du la nam 
[\[195a.7\]]ni gcig_/nam du la ni srang du 'gyur/_/srang gcig la yang zho du yod/_/rtsis kyi rtsis mgo 'di lta bur/_/ri rab srang ni du yod ces/_/'di la sogs pa'i dri ba'i rigs/_/ci yi phyir na dngos gzhan 'dri/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]kyi/_/sku la rdul phran du yod ces/_/de skad ci'i phyir 'dri mi byed/_/me lce la ni rdul phran du/_/rlung la yang ni rdul phran du/_/dbang po gcig cing rdul phran du/_/smin ma spu yi bu ga du/_/nor srung dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang /_/rgyal srid dag 
[\[195b.2\]]ni ji ltar bsrung /_/de dag ji ltar thar pa 'gyur/_/tshigs bcad rkyang pa ji ltar smra/_/khyod kyis ji ltar zhus pa bzhin/_/sems can 'khrig pa sna tshogs dang /_/zas skom rnam pa mang po dang /_/ji ltar skyes bu na chung tshal/_/rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i ri/_/ji ltar sgyu ma rmi 
[\[195b.3\]]lam 'dra/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skom gyis gdungs pa ltar/_/ji ltar ri bo drang srong lha/_/dri zas rab tu brgyan pa dang /_/grol ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bcings pa su zhig gang gis 'grol/_/bsam gtan pa yi yul ni gang /_/sprul pa dang ni mu stegs kyang /_/ci phyir med pa'i 
[\[195b.4\]]rgyu las byed/_/ci'i phyir yod pa'i rgyu las byed/_/yod med rgyu las byed pa dang /_/de bzhin yod med min pa'i rgyu/_/snang ba las ni ji ltar ldog_/rtog ge ji ltar yongs su 'dag_/rtog ge ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur/_/byed pa ci yis 'jug par 'gyur/_/ji ltar 
[\[195b.5\]]'du shes gcad par bya/_/ji ltar ting nge 'dzin las ldang /_/srid gsum bcom pa de su zhig_/gnas gang de yi lus kyang ci/_/ci phyir sems can med bzhin du/_/bdag yod par ni rjod par byed/_/kun rdzob bstan pa ji lta bu/_/rgya cher rab tu dbyer gsol zhes/_/
[\[195b.6\]]mtshan nyid 'dri ba ci yi phyir/_/bdag med 'dri ba ji lta bu/_/ji ltar mngal gyi snying por skye/_/lus ni tha dad sna tshogs dang /_/rtag chad lta ba ji lta bu/_/ji ltar sems ni mnyam par 'jog_/brjod dang de bzhin ye shes dang /_/tshul khrims rigs dang rgyal ba'i sras/_/
[\[195b.7\]]rigs pa dang ni smra ba'ang ci/_/slob dpon slob ma ji lta bu/_/sems can rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'di la sogs pa ji lta bu/_/zas dang skom ni ji lta bu/_/yid gzhungs bdud dang btags pa tsam/_/shing dang 'khri shing ci phyir zhes/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis dri ba'i rigs/_/
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]zhing rnams sna tshogs ci yi phyir/_/drang srong yun ring dka' thub dang /_/rigs zhes bya ba ji lta bu/_/bla ma gang las bslab pa blang /_/ci yi phyir na mi dag ngan/_/ci yi phyir na rnal 'byor pa/_/'dod pa'i khams su 'tshang mi rgya/_/'og min du ni grub 
[\[196a.2\]]pa'i mtha'/_/ci phyir mngon shes 'jig rten pa/_/ci phyir dge slong zhes ni brjod/_/sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta bu/_/rnam smin sangs rgyas ji lta bu/_/de bzhin nyid kyi sangs rgyas gang /_/mnyam nyid ye shes sangs rgyas dang /_/dge 'dun rnams kyang ji lta bu/_/rgyal sras de bzhin 
[\[196a.3\]]dri ba'i rigs/_/dgu po rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]me tog rnga/_/zhing dang snang ba spangs pa dang /_/sems tsam sa ni bdun po dag_/dris pa rnams ni yang dag nyid/_/'di dang gzhan yang rab mang ba'i/_/dri ba dag ni rgyal sras dris/_/re re mtshan nyid rab ldan zhing /_/lta ba'i nyes pa rnam spangs pa/_/grub 
[\[196a.4\]]mtha'i brjod dang bral ba ste/_/ngas ni da 'dir bstan par bya/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]rnam par gzhag pa'i tshig_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis legs par nyon/_/tshig brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs bzhin bshad/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo 
[\[196a.5\]]gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshig brgya po dag gang lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye ba'i tshig dang /_mi skye ba'i tshig dang /_rtag pa'i tshig dang /_mi rtag pa'i tshig dang /_mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang /_
[\[196a.6\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i tshig dang /_gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshig dang /_gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_skad cig pa'i tshig dang /_skad cig ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rang bzhin gyi tshig dang /_rang bzhin dang bral ba'i tshig dang /_stong pa nyid kyi tshig dang /_
[\[196a.7\]]stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_chad pa'i tshig dang /_chad pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_sems kyi tshig dang /_sems ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_mtha'i tshig dang /_mtha' ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_dbu ma'i tshig dang /_dbu ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_ther zug gi tshig dang /_ther 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]zug ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rkyen gyi tshig dang /_rkyen ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rgyu'i tshig dang /_rgyu ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_nyon mongs pa'i tshig dang /_nyon mongs pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_sred pa'i tshig dang /_sred pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_thabs kyi tshig dang /_thabs 
[\[196b.2\]]ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_mkhas pa'i tshig dang /_mkhas pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_dag pa'i tshig dang /_dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rigs pa'i tshig dang /_rigs pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_dpe'i tshig dang /_dpe ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_slob ma'i tshig dang /_
[\[196b.3\]]slob ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_bla ma'i tshig dang /_bla ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rigs kyi tshig dang /_rigs ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_theg pa gsum gyi tshig dang /_theg pa gsum ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_srid pa'i tshig dang /_srid pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_smon pa'i 
[\[196b.4\]]tshig dang /_smon pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'khor lo gsum gyi tshig dang /_'khor lo gsum ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_mtshan ma'i tshig dang /_mtshan ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_yod pa'i phyogs kyi tshig dang /_yod pa'i phyogs ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_gnyi ga'i tshig 
[\[196b.5\]]dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i tshig dang /_mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_zhing gi tshig dang /_zhing ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rdul gyi tshig 
[\[196b.6\]]dang /_rdul ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_chu'i tshig dang /_chu ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_gzhu'i tshig dang /_gzhu ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_yang dag pa'i tshig dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_grangs kyi tshig dang /_grangs ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rtsis kyi tshig dang /_
[\[196b.7\]]rtsis ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_mngon par gsal ba'i tshig dang /_mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_nam mkha'i tshig dang /_nam mkha' ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_sprin gyi tshig dang /_sprin ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_bzo dang sgyu rtsal dang rig pa'i gnas kyi tshig 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]dang /_bzo dang sgyu rtsal dang rig pa'i gnas ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rlung gi tshig dang /_rlung ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_sa'i tshig dang /_sa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_sems kyi tshig dang /_sems ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_gdags pa'i tshig dang /_
[\[197a.2\]]gdags pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rang bzhin gyi tshig dang /_rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_phung po'i tshig dang /_phung po ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_sems can gyi tshig dang /_sems can ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_blo'i tshig dang /_blo ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_mya ngan las 
[\[197a.3\]]'das pa'i tshig dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_shes bya'i tshig dang /_shes bya ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_mu stegs can gyi tshig dang /_mu stegs can ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_khrag khrug gi tshig dang /_khrag khrug ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_sgyu ma'i tshig 
[\[197a.4\]]dang /_sgyu ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rmi lam gyi tshig dang /_rmi lam ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_smig rgyu'i tshig dang /_smig rgyu ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_gzugs brnyan gyi tshig dang /_gzugs brnyan ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'khor lo'i tshig dang /_'khor lo ma yin pa'i tshig 
[\[197a.5\]]dang /_dri za'i tshig dang /_dri za ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_lha'i tshig dang /_lha ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_zas skom gyi tshig dang /_zas skom ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'khrig pa'i tshig dang /_'khrig pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_lta ba'i tshig dang /_lta ba ma yin pa'i tshig 
[\[197a.6\]]dang /_pha rol du phyin pa'i tshig dang /_pha rol du phyin pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_tshul khrims kyi tshig dang /_tshul khrims ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_nyi zla skar ma'i tshig dang /_nyi zla skar ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_bden pa'i tshig dang /_bden pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'bras bu'i 
[\[197a.7\]]tshig dang /_'bras bu ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'gog pa las ldang ba'i tshig dang /_'gog pa las ldang ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_gso ba'i tshig dang /_gso ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang /_mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_yan lag gi tshig dang /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]yan lag ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa'i tshig dang /_rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshig dang /_bsam gtan ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_nor pa'i tshig dang /_nor pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_snang ba'i tshig dang /_
[\[197b.2\]]snang ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_bsrung ba'i tshig dang /_bsrung ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rus kyi tshig dang /_rus ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_drang srong gi tshig dang /_drang srong ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rgyal po'i tshig dang /_rgyal po ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_yongs su gzung ba'i tshig 
[\[197b.3\]]dang /_yongs su gzung ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rin po che'i tshig dang /_rin po che ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_lung bstan pa'i tshig dang /_lung bstan pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'dod chen pa'i tshig dang /_'dod chen pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_pho mo dang ma ning gi tshig dang /_
[\[197b.4\]]pho mo dang ma ning ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_bro ba'i tshig dang /_bro ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_dngos po'i tshig dang /_dngos po ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_lus kyi tshig dang /_lus ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rtog ge'i tshig dang /_rtog ge ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_g.yo ba'i 
[\[197b.5\]]tshig dang /_g.yo ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_dbang po'i tshig dang /_dbang po ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'dus byas kyi tshig dang /_'dus byas ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'dus ma byas kyi tshig dang /_'dus ma byas ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshig dang /_rgyu dang 
[\[197b.6\]]'bras bu ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'og min gyi tshig dang /_'og min ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_dus tshigs kyi tshig dang /_dus tshigs ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_shing dang shing gel pa dang 'khri shing gi tshig dang /_shing dang shing gel pa dang 'khri shing ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_
[\[197b.7\]]sna tshogs kyi tshig dang /_sna tshogs ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_bstan pas gzung ba'i tshig dang /_bstan pas gzung ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_'dul ba'i tshig dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_dge slong gi tshig dang /_dge slong ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_gnas 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]kyi tshig dang /_gnas ma yin pa'i tshig dang /_yi ge'i tshig dang /_yi ge ma yin pa'i tshig ste/_blo gros chen po tshig brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis brjod pa yin te/_khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[198a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gag pa rnam 
[\[198a.3\]]pa du mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gag pa la rnam pa gnyis gnyis yod de/_rtog ge pa rnams kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skye ba 
[\[198a.4\]]yang rnam pa gnyis te/_'di lta ste/_rgyun skye ba dang /_mtshan nyid skye ba'o/_/gnas pa yang rnam pa gnyis te/_'di lta ste/_rgyun gnas pa dang /_mtshan nyid gnas pa'o/_/'gag pa yang rnam pa gnyis te/_'di lta ste/_rgyun 'gag pa dang /_mtshan nyid 
[\[198a.5\]]'gag pa'o/_/de la rnam par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'di lta ste/_'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_las kyi mtshan nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/blo gros chen po mdor bsdu na ni rnam par shes pa gsum yod do/_/rgyas par 
[\[198a.6\]]bshad na ni mtshan nyid rnam pa brgyad yod de/_rnam pa gsum po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i rnam par shes pa dang /_snang ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_dngos po so sor rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/_/blo gros chen po dper na me 
[\[198a.7\]]long rab tu gsal bas gzugs brnyan rnams 'dzin par byed pa de bzhin du snang ba'i rnam par shes pa snang ba yang de bzhin no/_/blo gros chen po snang ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_dngos po so sor rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa de gnyis ni 'jig pa dang /_
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]mi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid de gcig gi rgyu gcig go/_/blo gros chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bag chags yongs su bsgos pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba ni snang ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'o/_/blo gros chen po yul sna tshogs len pa dang /_
[\[198b.2\]]thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su bsgos pa ni dngos po so sor rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'o/_/blo gros chen po yang dag pa'i rnam par shes pa de la sgrib par byed pa yang dag pa ma yin pa sna tshogs dang /_spros pa rnams 'gags pas 
[\[198b.3\]]dbang po'i rnam par shes pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur te/_blo gros chen po 'di ni mtshan nyid 'gag pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po de la rgyun 'gag pa ni mtshams sbyor ba'i rgyu 'gag pa na rgyun 'gag par 'gyur te/_gang las 'byung ba 'gags pa 
[\[198b.4\]]dang /_gang la dmigs par bya ba 'gags na des rgyun 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de la gnas zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i rnam par rtog pa srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal 'gags pa/_mi 
[\[198b.5\]]shes pa dang /_sred pa dang /_las dang /_rkyen rnam par log pa/_rang gi sems snang ba sgyu ma'i yul dang /_rjes su lta ba rnams bshad par bya'o/_/blo gros chen po dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze la la ni sa bon med pa'am/_sa bon yod pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu snang ba dang /_
[\[198b.6\]]dngos po'i dus dang /_gnas pa dang /_rkyen rnams las phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams skye ba dang /_gnas pa'am/_yang na skyes nas kyang 'jig par 'gyur bar 'dod de/_blo gros chen po de dag ni rgyun nam/_bya ba'am/_skye ba'am/_srid 
[\[198b.7\]]pa'am/_mya ngan las 'das pa'am/_lam mam/_las sam/_'bras bu'am/_bden pa rnam par 'jig pa'am/_chad par smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang 'di mngon sum du mi dmigs shing thog ma mi mthong ste/_de'i cha ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/blo 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]gros chen po dper na rdza ma chag nas gyo mor gyur pa ni rdza ma'i bya ba mi byed do/_/sa bon tshig pa yang myu gu'i bya ba mi byed de/_de bzhin du blo gros chen po phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi dngos po dag 'gags pa dang /_'gag pa dang /_
[\[199a.2\]]'gag par 'gyur ba ni rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pas mthong ste/_rgyu med pa'i phyir de dag ni rim gyis skye ba med do/_/blo gros chen po gal te sa bon med pa'am/_sa bon yod pa las rnam par shes pa rnams rkyen gsum dang phrad pa las skye ba zhig yin na ni rus sbal las 
[\[199a.3\]]spu skye ba dang /_bye ma las kyang 'bru mar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs te/_'o na ni khyod kyi dam bcas pa las nyams shing nges pa'i don dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/sa bon yod pa dang /_sa bon med par bshad pa la nyes pa de lta bu yod pas bya ba dang las byas 
[\[199a.4\]]pa rnams don med par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po mu stegs can de dag rkyen gsum phrad pa las skye zhes bya ba yang bya ba dang /_snang ba 'dus pa las skye ba ma yin gyi/_gud na tha dad pa'i rgyu yod do zhes smra'o/_/blo gros chen po rgyu de ni gtso bo dang /_mchog dang /_skyes 
[\[199a.5\]]bu dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dus dang /_rdul phra mo rnams so/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po rang bzhin rnam pa bdun yod de/_'di lta ste/_'du ba dngos po'i rang bzhin dang /_mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /_'byung ba chen po'i dngos po'i rang bzhin dang /_rgyu'i rang bzhin dang /_
[\[199a.6\]]rkyen gyi rang bzhin dang /_mngon par grub pa'i rang bzhin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po don dam pa rnam pa bdun yod de/_'di lta ste/_sems kyi spyod yul dang /_shes rab kyi spyod yul dang /_ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /_lta ba'i spyod yul dang /_lta ba gnyis las 
[\[199a.7\]]'das pa'i spyod yul dang /_sras kyi sa las 'das pa'i spyod yul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byon pa'i spyod yul te/_blo gros chen po 'di dag 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin don dam pa'i snying po'o/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin don dam pa'i snying po de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa mchog gi chos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi spyan yongs su 
[\[199b.2\]]rdzogs nas rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dgod pa la 'jug cing ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dgod pas mu stegs can gyi smra ba dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang thun mong du mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na mu stegs can gyi smra ba dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang /_thun mong 
[\[199b.3\]]ma yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang gi yul la rnam par rtog pa'i lta bar khong du ma chud pa dang /_rang gi rnam par shes pa'i sems snang ba tsam du ma rtogs pas/_blo gros chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dngos po dang /_dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin don dam pa la lta 
[\[199b.4\]]ba gnyis su smra bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po dus kyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su bsgos pa'o/_/dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par shes pa'i yul du rnam par rtog pa'o/_/blo gros chen po dper na 'jim pa'i gong bu dang /_
[\[199b.5\]]rdul phra rab ni tha dad pa yang ma yin/_tha mi dad pa yang ma yin no/_/gser dang rgyan yang de bzhin te/_/blo gros chen po gal te 'jim pa'i gong bu dang /_rdul phra rab gnyis tha dad pa zhig yin na ni de dag las brtsams pa ma yin par 'gyur na/_de ni yang dag par 
[\[199b.6\]]de dag las brtsams pas na de'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no/_/ci ste tha mi dad na ni 'jim pa'i gong bu dang /_rdul phra rab bye brag med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du blo gros chen po 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[199b.7\]]dang /_gal te tha dad pa zhig yin na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgyu ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/de ste tha dad pa ma yin na ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gags na/_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang 'gag par 'gyur ba zhig na/_'di ltar rang gi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]ni nges par 'gag par mi 'gyur te/_de'i blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rang gi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid 'gag pa ma yin gyi/_las kyi mtshan nyid 'gag go/_/gal te rang gi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gag pa yin na ni/_kun 
[\[200a.2\]]gzhi rnam par shes pa yang 'gag par 'gyur te/_blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'gag par 'gyur ba yin na ni/_mu stegs can chad par smra ba dang /_tha mi dad par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po mu stegs can de dag ni 'di skad du smra ste/_'di lta ste/_'di ltar 
[\[200a.3\]]yul rnams la 'dzin pa 'gags par gyur na/_rnam par shes pa'i rgyun 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/_gal te rnam par shes pa'i rgyun 'gags pa yin na ni/_thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rgyun kyang chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/blo gros chen po mu stegs can rnams 
[\[200a.4\]]rgyun skye ba'i rgyu ni mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs dang /_thabs ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang gi mtshan nyid du yod la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba ni sa bon yod pa dang /_sa bon med pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes zer te/_de ni sngon gcig nas gcig tu rigs pa'i 
[\[200a.5\]]dngos po brgyud de 'ongs pa rtog ge pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rang gi lta ba'i nyes pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pas de skad du ston te/_blo gros chen po de ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ba ngan pas zin pa log pa'i gya gyus rab tu rmongs pa dang myos pa'i mi shes pa rnams [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du 'di 
[\[200a.6\]]ni thams cad mkhyen pas bstan to zhes zer ro/_/blo gros chen po gal te yang dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze gang la la chos thams cad rang bzhin dang bral ba sprin dang mgal me'i 'khor lo dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang mtshungs pa dang /_ma skyes pa sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu'i 
[\[200a.7\]]zla ba dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_nang dang phyi rol du sems snang ba rnam par rtog pa dang /_thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rnam par spros pa rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa las logs shig na med pa dang /_rgyu dang rkyen 'gags shing zad par gyur na/_rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]mthong ba dang /_rjod pa dang /_brjod par bya ba dang /_brtag pa dang /_brtag par bya ba dang bral ba/_longs spyod dang /_lus su kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rnam par gzhag pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yul gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_mi 'thun pa dang /_snang ba med pa'i 
[\[200b.2\]]spyod yul skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'jig pa spong ba dang /_rang gi sems las byung ba tsam du rjes su 'jug cing rnam par 'byed na/_blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni ring por mi thogs par 'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_
[\[200b.3\]]snying rje chen po dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_rtsol ba med pa'i sbyor ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po sems can gyi khams de dag thams cad sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa dang /_rgyu dang rkyen la mi brtson pa dang /_phyi nang gi yul las rnam par dben pa dang /_sems 
[\[200b.4\]]las phyi rol du mi mthong bas rim gyis mtshan ma med pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /_rim gyis sa nas sar ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la 'jug pa dang /_khams gsum sgyu ma lta bur shin tu mos shing so sor rab tu rtog pas sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[200b.5\]]rang gi sems snang ba las 'das shing snang ba med pa la 'jug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa rjes su thob par byed pa dang /_de dag gi sbyor ba skyed pa rab tu spangs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[200b.6\]]de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i sprul pa mngon par shes pa dang /_dbang dang /_snying rje dang /_thabs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du cig car 'jug pa/_mu stegs can gyi gnas su nye bar 'gro ba/_sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[200b.7\]]pa dang bral bas byang chub sems dpa' de gnas gyur pa'i rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sku'ang 'thob par 'dod pa rnams kyis phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]sems dang /_rgyu dang /_rkyen dang /_bya ba dang /_sbyor ba dang /_skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/sems tsam gyis drang por rtsol bas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa'i nyes pa 
[\[201a.2\]]la so sor rtog cing /_rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu dang /_srid pa gsum po dag snang ba med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis skye ba med par mjal bas rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i bgrod par phyin pa dang /_rang gi sems la dbang sgyur zhing rtsol ba med pa'i spyod pa rtogs par 
[\[201a.3\]]khong du chud pa/_gzugs sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu dang mtshungs pa dang /_sems can gyi sems shin tu phra ba'i rjes su 'jug cing sprul pa'i lus kyis sems kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su dgrol bar byed pas sa rnams rim gyis mtshams sbyor ba rnam par 
[\[201a.4\]]gzhag par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen po rang gi grub pa'i mtha' la mkhas pa rab tu bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[201a.5\]]dang /_chos lnga dang /_rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol/_'di ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bgrod par bgyi ba/_rang gi sems kyis mthong ba la sogs pas dmigs par bgyi ba'i spyod yul dang 'phrod pa ma lags pa/_brjod pa'am/_
[\[201a.6\]]rigs pa dang /_de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu ston pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lang ka'i grong rdal dang /_ma la ya'i ri dang /_rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du de 
[\[201a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa/_rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs lta bu'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul dang /_chos kyi sku bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]chen po rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa 'jug ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang gi sems snang ba 'dzin par khong du ma chud pa dang /_thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa'i gnas ngan len gyi gzugs kyi bag chags la mngon par zhen pa 
[\[201b.2\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid dang /_gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid mthong bar 'dun pa'o/_/blo gros chen po 'di ni rgyu rkyen bzhi po chu klung gi gnas dang /_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rlabs 'byung ba 
[\[201b.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po mig gi rnam par shes pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbang po thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang /_spu'i khung bu lhan cig skye ba dang /_rim gyis yul gyi rjes su skye ba yang de bzhin te/_ji ltar me long rab tu gsal ba'i nang du gzugs brnyan snang ba 
[\[201b.4\]]bzhin no/_/blo gros chen po dper na/_rlung rab tu drag pos rgya mtsho chen po'i chu rab tu skyod par byed pa de bzhin du/_phyi rol gyi yul gyi rlung gis kyang sems kyi rgya mtsho bsgul bas rnam par shes pa'i rlabs rnams rgyun mi 'chad de/_rgyu dang bya ba'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang /_
[\[201b.5\]]tha dad ma yin pa gcig tu 'dres pa/_las dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid la shin tu mngon par zhen pa dang /_gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid mi rtogs pas de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga 'jug go/_/blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag dang lhan 
[\[201b.6\]]cig pa'i rgyu la bye brag gis rnam pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par byed pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ni de'i lus kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni phan tshun gcig gi rgyu gcig byed do snyam du mi sems te/_'on kyang 
[\[201b.7\]]rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par rtog pas mngon par zhen pa 'jug cing de dag so so nas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dang lhan cig tu 'jug go/_/yul gyi rnam pa'i bye brag 'byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_de dag 'jug pa'o/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar rnal 'byor pa dag 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa bag chags shin du phra rab 'jug pa rnams mi shes pa de dag 'di snyam du/_bdag cag rnam par shes pa bkag nas snyoms par zhugs so snyam du sems kyang yang dag par rnam par shes pa 
[\[202a.2\]]bkag nas snyoms par zhugs pa ma yin te/_'di ltar bag chags kyi sa bon shin tu phra ba ma 'gags pa'i phyir ma 'gags pa'o/_/yul la 'jug cing 'dzin pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ni 'gags pa'o/_/blo gros chen po de ltar shin tu phra ba'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de mthar 
[\[202a.3\]]thug par rtogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi stobs kyis kyang 
[\[202a.4\]]rtogs par mi nus so/_/gzhan du na sa'i mtshan nyid dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_thabs la mkhas pa rnam par 'byed pa dag tshig gi don rab tu dbye ba la rnam par gdon mi za ba rgyal ba mtha' yas pa rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsags pa dang /_rang gi sems 
[\[202a.5\]]snang ba la rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa dang bral ba ri dang nags tshal stug po dang /_shing khrod na gnas shing rnal 'byor tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab tu bsgoms pa rnams kyis rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rgyud mthong ba dang /_zhing tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang 
[\[202a.6\]]bskur ba dang /_dbang dang stobs dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi sras kyi 'khor rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/_des sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_rang gi sems snang ba'i rang 
[\[202a.7\]]bzhin gyi spyod yul spros pa'i mtshan nyid rig cing 'khor ba srid pa'i rgya mtsho dang /_las dang /_sred pa dang /_mi shes pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las rgyal bar nus so/_/de lta bas na/_blo gros chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyal ba rnams la 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bsten par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/dper na rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs rnams/_/de dag rlung drag dbang gis byung /_/rlabs chen rgya mtsho rab bskyod pas/_/rgyun ni rnam par chad 
[\[202b.2\]]pa med/_/kun gzhi rgya mtsho rtag gnas pa/_/yul gyi rlung gis rab bskyod nas/_/sna tshogs rnam shes dba' rlabs rnams/_/gar cing rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/sngon po dmar po sna tshogs gzugs/_/dung dang 'o ma kha ra dang /_/bska ba me tog 'bras bu dang /_/nyi zla dang 
[\[202b.3\]]ni 'od zer dang /_/gcig pa ma yin tha dad min/_/rgya mtsho rlabs rnams rab tu bskyed/_/de bzhin rnam shes bdun po yang /_/sems dang lhan cig rab tu skye/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho yongs gyur nas/_/dba' rlabs sna tshogs 'jug pa ltar/_/rnam shes bdun po de bzhin te/_/sems dang lhan 
[\[202b.4\]]cig rab tu skye/_/kun gzhi rnam shes gnas las ni/_/rnam shes sna tshogs rab 'jug ste/_/'di ltar yid dang rnam shes des/_/mtshan nyid don la rab tu sems/_/mi 'jigs mtshan nyid brgyad yod de/_/mtshan ma med pa'ang mtshan ma med/_/rgya mtsho dang ni dba' 
[\[202b.5\]]rlabs rnams/_/ji ltar bye brag med pa bzhin/_/rnam shes sems dang de bzhin du/_/tha dad pa yang mi dmigs so/_/sems ni las sogs byed ces bya/_/yid kyi rgya cher sogs pa ste/_/rnam shes dag ni rnam par rig_/snang ba'i yul ltos sngar bshad do/_/de nas byang 
[\[202b.6\]]chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/_sngon po dmar po'i gzugs rnams ni/_/sems can rnam shes skyed par bgyid/_/rlabs dang mtshungs pa'i sna tshogs chos/_/ci slad bdag la bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[202b.7\]]tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_/sngon po dmar po sna tshogs gzugs/_/dba' rlabs dag ni yod ma yin/_/las sogs sems su bshad pa yang /_/skye bo rtogs par bya phyir ro/_/las de yang ni yod ma yin/_/rang gi sems ni gzung dang bral/_/gzung ba 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]med pas 'dzin pa'ang med/_/dba' rlabs de dang rab tu mtshungs/_/longs spyod lus dag rnam gzhag pa/_/sems can snang ba'i rnam shes yin/_/de las las rnams snang bar byed/_/dper na rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang mtshungs/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[203a.2\]]sems dpa' blo gros chen pos yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs dngos po ni/_/gar bgyid g.yo bas rig 'gyur la/_/kun gzhi las kyang de ltar na/_/ci yi slad du blos mi rig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_
