[\[223a.2\]]par mi byed do/_/dper na chu'i nang du shing gi grib ma snang yang de ni grib ma yang ma yin/_grib ma ma yin pa yang ma yin/_shing gi dbyibs kyang ma yin/_shing gi dbyibs ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du mu stegs can gyi lta ba'i bag chags kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa 
[\[223a.3\]]rnams kyang gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag par 'du shes pa la brten pas rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du mi chud do/_/dper na me long rab tu phyis pa'i nang du rkyen ji 
[\[223a.4\]]lta ba bzhin du rnam par rtog pa med par gzugs brnyan thams cad snang ste/_de dag ni gzugs kyang ma yin/_gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin/_yang gzugs dang gzugs ma yin par mthong bar rnam par rtog pa'i byis pa rnams gzugs kyi 'du shes su byed do/_/de bzhin du mu stegs can lta ba ngan pa pa rang 
[\[223a.5\]]gi sems snang ba'i gzugs la rnam par rtog pas mngon par zhen pa rnams kyang gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin/_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag par lta ba la rab tu rten to/_/dper na rlung dang 'bab chu phrad pa las 
[\[223a.6\]]sgra 'byung yang de ni dngos po yang ma yin/_dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du mu stegs can gyi lta ba ngan pa'i rtog ge pa rnams kyang gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa 
[\[223a.7\]]dang /_mi rtag par lta ba la rab tu rten to/_/dper na rtswa dang /_shing med pa'i sa phyogs chen por nyi ma shin tu tsha ba'i 'od kyis smig rgyu'i dba' rlabs rab tu g.yo yang de ni dngos po yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa yang ma yin te/_chags pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bo thog ma med pa'i dus kyis rnam par spros pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa/_rnam par rtog pas skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyang gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin 
[\[223b.2\]]pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa la rab tu brten pas so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i dngos po'i sgo la dmigs pa yang smig rgyu'i dba' rlabs de dag ji lta ba bzhin no/_/dper na la la zhig gis sngags dang /_'khrul 'khor gyis sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa ston pa 'dre dang sbyor bar ldan na g.yo ba'i las byed de/_
[\[223b.3\]]byis pa rnams kyis rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba nyid du mngon par zhen to/_/de bzhin du mu stegs byed lta ba ngan pa'i bsam pa can dag kyang /_gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_
[\[223b.4\]]rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i lta ba la rten cing spros pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa ma yin par sgro 'dogs so/_/blo gros chen po de bas na so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po 'dod pa dag gis skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_
[\[223b.5\]]gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i lta ba ngan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[223b.6\]]gsungs so/_/sgyu ma rmi lam chu grib shing /_/skra shad 'dzings dang smig rgyu ltar/_/srid gsum dag ni rab rtogs na/_/mthar ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skom pa'i 'du shes kyi/_/g.yo bas sems ni bslus pas na/_/smig rgyu la ni chur rtog kyang /_/chu yi dngos po yang dag med/_/de bzhin 
[\[223b.7\]]rnam shes sa bon pa/_/g.yo zhing gyur pas yul du snang /_/byis pa rnam rtog gang skyes pa/_/rab rib can gyi rab rib bzhin/_/thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba la/_/dngos por 'dzin cing mngon zhen pa/_/mi 'thun khye'us khye'u dbyung bzhin/_/'dod rgyu 'dzin pa rab tu spongs/_/sgyu ma ro langs 'khrul 'khor dang /_/
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sprin dang rmi lam glog lta bur/_/rab tu rtog na rnam grol zhing /_/rgyun gsum dag ni gtan du spongs/_/'di la byed pa gang yang med/_/smig rgyu nam mkha' ji bzhin te/_/de ltar chos rnams rab shes na/_/shes par bya ba ci yang med/_/bstan pa dag ni ming tsam ste/_/de la mtshan 
[\[224a.2\]]nyid yod ma yin/_/gang la rnam rtog skyed pa yi/_/phung po'i 'du byed skra shad 'dra/_/ri mo skra shad 'dzings pa dang /_/sgyu ma rmi lam dri za'i grong /_/mgal me'i 'khor lo'i smig rgyu dag_/_med kyang sems can rnams la snang /_/rtag dang mi rtag gcig tha dad/_/gnyi ga gnyis min de bzhin te/_/thog ma med kyi nyes 
[\[224a.3\]]'brel bas/_/byis pa mos pas rab tu rtog_/me long chu dang mig rnams dang /_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/de na gzugs brnyan snang mod kyi/_/de ni yang dag yod pa min/_/dngos por snang ba thams cad ni/_/ri mo dang ni smig rgyu bzhin/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs snang yang /_/rmi lam 'dra ste yod ma yin/_/gzhan 
[\[224a.4\]]yang blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa'i chos ni mu bzhi dang bral ba yin te/_'di lta ste/_gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa spangs pa/_yod pa dang /_
[\[224a.5\]]med pa'i sgro 'dogs pa dang /_skur pa las rnam par grol ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ni yang dag pa'i bden pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_lam dang /_'gog pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rab tu 'byed cing sdud par byed pas de dag sngon du btang ba yin gyi/_ngo bo nyid dang /_dbang 
[\[224a.6\]]phyug dang /_rgyu med pa dang /_rdul phra mo dang /_dus dang /_rang bzhin dang 'brel bar chos ston pa ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po nyon mongs pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir ded dpon ltar tshig brgya rtsa brgyad dang /_snang ba med pa dang /_theg pa dang /_sa rnams shin tu rnam par 
[\[224a.7\]]'byed pa'i mtshan nyid la mthar gyis rab tu 'jug go/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po bsam gtan rnam pa bzhi yod de rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byis pa nye bar spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang /_don rab tu 'byed pa'i bsam gtan dang /_de bzhin nyid dmigs pa'i bsam gtan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bsam gtan no/_/de la byis pa nye bar spyod pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams gang zag la bdag med pa dang /_dngos po'i rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid keng rus dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_mi sdug 
[\[224b.2\]]pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa sngon du btang ste/_'di ni mtshan nyid 'di lta bu yin te/_gzhan du ma yin no zhes brtags nas snga ma las gong nas gong du khyad par can du 'gyur te/_'du shes mi 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni byis pa nye bar spyod pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o/_/don rab tu 'byed pa'i 
[\[224b.3\]]bsam gtan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang zag la bdag med pa dang /_rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang /_mu stegs can gyi bdag dang /_gzhan dang /_gnyi ga dngos po med par gyur pa la chos bdag med par brtags nas/_sa de dag gi mtshan nyid kyi don gong nas gong du khyad par can du 'gyur ba ni 
[\[224b.4\]]don rab tu 'byed pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par rtog pas bdag med pa gnyis su rnam par rtog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas la rnam par rtog pa mi skyed pa ni de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan zhes 
[\[224b.5\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid gsum gyi bde ba la gnas nas/_sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bya ba byed pa ni de bzhin 
[\[224b.6\]]gshegs pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/byis pa nye spyod bsam gtan dang /_/don gyi mtshan nyid 'byed bsam gtan/_/de bzhin nyid dmigs bsam gtan dang /_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[224b.7\]]pa'i dge bsam gtan/_/rnal 'byor can gyis brtson byas na/_/nyi ma zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra dang /_/pad ma dang ni g.yang sa dang /_/nam mkha' dang ni me zad ltar/_/rnal 'byor pas ni gang rtog pa/_/mtshan ma sna tshogs de dag ni/_/mu stegs lam 'byed bsam gtan te/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]gyi/_/spyod yul du yang ltung bar byed/_/'di dag thams cad rab spangs na/_/de ni snang ba med pa yin/_/zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi/_/bsam gyis mi khyab phyag gis ni/_/de yi mgo la nyug mdzad de/_/de bzhin nyid kyi rjes zhugs brtags/_/de 
[\[225a.2\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba chos ji lta bu zhig la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen 
[\[225a.3\]]po rang bzhin thams cad kyi bag chags kyi kun gzhi dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_lta ba'i bag chags rab tu gyur pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nga'i mya ngan las 'das pa rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi dngos po'i spyod yul lo/_/gzhan 
[\[225a.4\]]yang blo gros chen po mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/_rtag pa dang /_chad par rnam par rtog pa dang /_dngos po dang /_dngos po med par rnam par spangs pa'o/_/ji ltar rtag pa ma yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid du rnam 
[\[225a.5\]]par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir/_rtag pa ma yin no/_/ji ltar chad pa ma yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'phags pa thams cad kyis so so rang gis rig pa thob pa'i phyir chad pa ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po mya ngan las 'das pa ni mi 'jig mi 'chi 
[\[225a.6\]]ste/_gal te mya ngan las 'das pa 'chi ba zhig yin na ni yang skye ba'i rgyun len par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 'jig pa zhig yin na ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du ltung bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa dang /_'chi ba dang /_bral bas na rnal 'byor pa rnams skabs su 
[\[225a.7\]]'gro ba yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po mya ngan las 'das pa ni spangs pa ma yin pa dang /_thob pa ma yin pa dang /_chad pa ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa ma yin pa dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don sna tshogs ma yin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang blo 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]gros chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pa dang /_yul gyi 'du 'dzi med pa dang /_phyin ci log par mthong bas rnam par rtog pa mi skye ba ste/_de dag gis de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i blor 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang blo 
[\[225b.2\]]gros chen po rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brjod pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa dang /_dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa'o/_/de la brjod pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa ni thog ma 
[\[225b.3\]]med pa'i dus kyi tshig tu spros pa'i bag chags la mngon par zhen pa las byung ngo /_/dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa ni rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du ma chud pa las 'byung ngo /_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byin gyi rlabs rnam pa gnyis 
[\[225b.4\]]rnam par gzhag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtug cing dri ba yongs su 'dri'o/_/byin gyi rlabs rnam pa gnyis rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sku dang /_zhal dang /_gsung 
[\[225b.5\]]thams cad rab tu ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_phyag gis dbang bskur ba'i byin gyi rlabs so/_/de la blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la rab tu gnas te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen 
[\[225b.6\]]po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing /_ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus kun du sku dang /_zhal dang /_gsung thams cad rab tu ston te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[225b.7\]]dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_yon tan de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la ji lta ba bzhin no/_/blo gros chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]byin gyis brlabs pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ste/_bskal pa brgya stong du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa las mngon par grub pa'o/_/rim gyis sa rnams kyi gnyen po dang mi 'thun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du chud pas sa chos kyi sprin la 'jug ste/_pad 
[\[226a.2\]]ma chen po'i gzhal med khang khyad par can na gnas shing pad ma chen po rin po che'i seng ge'i stan la 'dug nas/_skal ba mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba la rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng bas lus rab tu brgyan pas gser btso ma dang /_me 
[\[226a.3\]]tog tsam pa ka dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i 'od zer ji lta ba bzhin no/_/phyogs bcu nas gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams pad ma chen po'i gzhal med khang na stan la 'dug pa de la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar mdzad de/_ji ltar dbang phyug dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_lha'i 
[\[226a.4\]]dbang po'i bu bzhin du spyi bor dbang bskur ba mdzad pas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag gis dbang bskur ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[226a.5\]]chen po gal te byin gyi rlabs rnam pa gnyis la gnas na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar nus kyi/_de lta ma yin na ni mthong bar mi nus so/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji tsam du ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_chos ston pa'i spyod 
[\[226a.6\]]pa rab tu dbye ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnam pa gnyis la gnas pas so/_/blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gal te sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang yongs su bral bas kyang spobs pas chos ston par nus 
[\[226a.7\]]na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis kyang chos ston nus par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byin gyi rlabs la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros chen po ri dang /_rdo dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_shing dang /_rol mo'i chos cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_grong khyer 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]dang /_grong rdal dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa grong khyer du byon pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag thams cad las rol mo'i sgra rang byung na sems yod pa dag lta ci smos/_'on pa dang /_long ba dang /_lkugs pa dag kyang sdug bsngal rnam pa 
[\[226b.2\]]sna tshogs las rnam par 'grol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs tshad med pas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis de 
[\[226b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus dang /_khyad par gyi dbang bskur ba'i dus la gnas pa dag la byin gyis rlob par mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[226b.4\]]stsal pa/_blo gros chen po bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir dang /_nyan thos kyi sa dang bsam gtan du mi ltung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa so so rang gis rig pa'i sa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /_thob par bya ba'i chos rnam par 'phel zhing khyad par can du bya ba'i phyir te/_des 
[\[226b.5\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byin gyi rlabs rnam par gzhag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/_/gal te byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis ma brlabs na mu stegs can gyi lta ba ngan 
[\[226b.6\]]pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_bdud kyi bsam par ltung zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_de ltar de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[226b.7\]]rjes su bzung ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/byin rlabs ldan pa mi yi gtso/_/smon lam chen po rnam dag pa/_/ting nge 'dzin dang dbang bskur dag_/dang por dang ni sa bcur 'byung //_//
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa rin po che'i mdo las/_bam po bzhi pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bka' stsal 
[\[227a.2\]]pas/_rgyu dang rkyen rnam par brjod pa nyid mdzad kyi/_rang gi tshul gyi gtam ni ma gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bshad de/_'di lta ste/_gtso bo dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dus dang /_rdul phra mo las dngos po rnams skye bar 
[\[227a.3\]]brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang rkyen las dngos po rnams skye bar gsungs shing brjod pa la yang bar du chod pa dang bcas pa'i grub pa'i mtha' dang /_bar du chod pa ma mchis pa'i grub pa'i mtha' mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can dag kyang mchis pa dang ma mchis pa 
[\[227a.4\]]las skye bar brjod/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma mchis pa las 'byung la byung nas kyang 'jig par gsungs te/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed nas rga shi'i bar du gsungs pa 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu ma mchis par smra ba rnam par brjod 
[\[227a.5\]]pa gsungs kyi rgyur smra ba gsungs pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di yod pas 'di byung ngo zhes rnam par gzhag pa gsum pa 'di ni rim gyis 'byung bar gzhag pa ma lags par mu stegs can gyis rnam par brjod pa nyid bzung gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni de de lta 
[\[227a.6\]]ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma lags pa'i rgyus 'bras bu mngon par sgrub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni rgyu yang dngos po la ltos/_dngos po yang rgyu la ltos pas rgyu dang rkyen yang 'chol par 
[\[227a.7\]]'gyur zhing de bzhin du phan tshun du thug pa ma mchis par yang 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po nga ni rgyu med par smra ba dang /_rgyu dang rkyen chol por smra ba ma yin te/_'di yod par 'di 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ngo bo nyid med 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]pa dang /_rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros chen po gang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /_phyi rol gyi yul gyi dngos po dngos po med pa dang /_rang gi sems snang ba tsam khong du ma chud pa de dag la ni 'di lta bu'i nyes par 'gyur 
[\[227b.2\]]gyi nga'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen pos yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das brjod pa dngos po ma mchis pa lags na dngos po thams cad kyang mchis pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po dag ma mchis su lags na ni brjod pa 
[\[227b.3\]]yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du brjod pa dngos po mchis pas dngos po thams cad kyang mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po dngos po med pa dag kyang brjod pa yod de/_'di lta ste/_ri bong gi rwa dang /_rus 
[\[227b.4\]]sbal gyi spu la sogs pa 'jig rten na brjod par snang mod kyi blo gros chen po de dag ni dngos po yang ma yin dngos po med pa ma yin te brjod pa tsam du zad do/_/ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa ltar brjod pa rang bzhin yod pas dngos po thams cad kyang yod na ni de lta na khyod kyi smra ba de ni 
[\[227b.5\]]nyams par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po brjod pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing thams cad ni yod pa ma yin te brjod pa ni byas pa'o/_/blo gros chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na mig mi 'dzums pas/_la la na mtshan ma bstan pas/_la la na smin ma bskyod pas/_la la na 
[\[227b.6\]]mig rig rig byas pas/_la la na dgod pas/_la la na glal bas/_la la na se gol gyi sgras/_la la na zhing dran pas/_la la na bskyod pas chos ston te/_blo gros chen po dper na/_'jig rten gyi khams mig mi 'dzums pa dang /_spos brtsegs dang /_de bzhin 
[\[227b.7\]]gshegs pa kun du bzang po'i zhing khams na spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /_khyad par gyi ting 'dzin gzhan dag kyang rab tu 'thob par mdzad do/_/blo gros chen po de'i phyir brjod pa yod pas dngos po thams cad 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]yod pa ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po de ni 'jig rten 'di na yang snang ste/_srin bu dang /_sbrang ma la sogs pa'i sems can dag kyang brjod pa med par rang gi bya ba byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[228a.2\]]gsungs so/_/nam mkha' ri bong rwa dag dang /_/mo sham gyi ni bu dag kyang /_/med kyang tshig tu brjod pa ltar/_/dngos la rtog pa'ang de bzhin no/_/rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i chos dag la/_/skye bar byis pa rnam rtog ste/_/tshul 'di rab tu mi shes pas/_/srid gsum gnas na rab 
[\[228a.3\]]tu 'khyam/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la rtag pa'i sgrar gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po nor ba'i phyir te/_nor pa 
[\[228a.4\]]'di ni 'phags pa rnams la yang snang mod kyi phyin ci log tu ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po 'di ltar 'jig rten na mi mkhas pa dag gis smig rgyu dang /_mgal me'i 'khor lo dang /_skra shad 'dzings pa dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_gzugs brnyan dag 
[\[228a.5\]]la phyin ci log tu 'dzin gyi/_mkhas pa rnams kyis ni ma yin te mi snang ba yang ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po nor pa de dag ni rnam pa du mar snang yang nor pas mi rtag par byed pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[228a.6\]]blo gros chen po ji ltar na nor pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa rnam par spangs she na/_'di lta ste/_byis pa thams cad kyi spyod yul sna tshogs pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar gang gA'i klung de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis mthong ba dang mi mthong ba'i phyir nor pa ni dngos po yod pa ma yin no/_/gzhan dag la 
[\[228a.7\]]snang bas na de'i phyir dngos po med pa yang ma yin te/_de ltar na nor pa ni 'phags pa rnams phyin ci log dang phyin ci log ma yin pa rnam par spangs pas de'i phyir nor pa ni rtag pa ste/_'di lta ste/_mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid mi 'jig pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros chen po nor pa ni mtshan ma sna 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]tshogs ma yin te/_rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'jig pas de'i phyir nor pa ni rtag pa'o/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na nor pa de kho na yin zhe na/_gal te yang rgyu dang rkyen gyi nor pa 'di la 'phags pa rnams phyin ci log gi blo dang phyin ci log ma yin pa'i blo yang mi skyed na'o/_/blo gros chen 
[\[228b.2\]]po 'phags pa rnams ma gtogs par nor pa 'di la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam du 'du shes yod pa ni 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam zhes bya ba de ni byis pa rnams kyi rnam par brtags pas brjod pa yin te/_'phags pas brjod pa ni ma yin no/_/
[\[228b.3\]]nor pa de yang phyin ci log dang phyin ci log ma yin par rnam par brtags pas rigs rnam pa gnyis skyed de/_'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i rigs dang /_byis pa so so'i skye bo'i rigs so/_/'phags pa'i rigs kyang rnam pa gsum du dbye bas 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang 
[\[228b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/ji ltar na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams rnam par brtags pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs skyed ce na/_'di lta ste/_rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pas nyan thos kyi rigs su 'gyur te/_de ltar na rnam par dag pas 
[\[228b.5\]]nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs skyed par byed pa yin no/_/blo gros chen po nor pa de nyid rnam par brtags pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs skyed par byed de/_'di lta ste/_nor pa de nyid kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid du sgom pa na mngon par zhen pa med pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs skyed 
[\[228b.6\]]par byed pa yin no/_/ji ltar na mkhas pa rnams kyis nor pa de nyid la rnam par brtags pas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs skyed par byed pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pas phyi rol gyi dngos po dang /_dngos po med par rnam par mi rtog na sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[228b.7\]]pa'i rigs skyed par byed pa yin te/_'di ni nor pa de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs skyed par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang dngos po sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du nor pa la byis pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas na byis pa so so'i skye bo'i rigs skyed par byed de/_de ni dngos po 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa yang ma yin pa ni rigs kyi don ces bya'o/_/blo gros chen po nor pa de nyid la rnam par mi rtog pas 'phags pa rnams sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das pa'i phyir bag chags kyi rang bzhin gyi chos las gzhan du 
[\[229a.2\]]gyur pa'i dngos po ni de bzhin nyid ces bya ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ni sems las grol ba'o zhes tshig 'di ngas smras te/_mtshan ma rnam par spangs pa bstan pa'i phyir mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes smras pa yin no/_/blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[229a.3\]]ldan 'das nor pa mchis pa'am ma mchis pa zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin du mngon par zhen pa'i mtshan nyid med de/_gal te nor pa la mngon par zhen pa'i mtshan nyid yod na ni mngon par zhen pa'i dngos po zlogs par mi 
[\[229a.4\]]'gyur la/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di yang mu stegs can gyi rgyu las skye ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te nor pa de sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa zhig lags na ni de ltar na nyon mongs pa gzhan gyi rgyu bgyid par 'gyur 
[\[229a.5\]]ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po sgyu ma ni nor pa'i rgyu ma yin te/_gnas ngan len gyi nyes pa mi skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros chen po sgyu ma ni gnas ngan len gyi nyes pa mi skyed de/_rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros chen po sgyu ma ni gzhan gyi rig 
[\[229a.6\]]sngags kyi mthu las 'byung gi rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags las skyes pa ma yin pas de'i phyir nyes pa skyed par byed pa ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi nor pa'i sems kyi mngon par zhen pa yin gyi 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin no/_/de nas 
[\[229a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/'phags pas nor pa mi mthong ste/_/dbus na'ang yang dag yod ma yin/_/gal te dbus de yang dag na/_/nor pa'ang yang dag nyid du 'gyur/_/nor pa thams cad spangs nas kyang /_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gal te mtshan ma yang skyed na/_/de nyid kyang ni nor pa ste/_/rab rib yongs su ma dag bzhin/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po sgyu ma ma yin pa chos dang mtshungs pa yod pa ma yin pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das la blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_
[\[229b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ni sgyu ma sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu lags sam/_'on te tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pas lags/_gal te sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pas dngos po thams cad sgyu ma lta bu lags 
[\[229b.3\]]na ni/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po rnams sgyu ma lta bu lags par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyu ma mchis pa ma lags la/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang yang gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur snang bar bgyid pa ma mchis 
[\[229b.4\]]so/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du sgyu ma sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa dang chos 'thun pa ma mchis pas dngos po rnams sgyu ma lta bu ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po sgyu ma sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa dang /_chos 
[\[229b.5\]]'thun pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin te/_myur du 'jig pa glog dang 'dra bas na sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po dper na glog 'gyu ba skad cig tu 'byung la/_byung nas 'jig pa ni byis pa so so'i skye 
[\[229b.6\]]bo rnams la mi snang ste/_de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la dngos po med par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa med pa dang /_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par ma chags pa med pa las snang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang 
[\[229b.7\]]bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/sgyu mar med min chos 'thun pas/_/dngos po rnams ni sgyu mar brjod/_/yang dag ma yin glog 'dra bas/_/de phyir sgyu ma lta bur bshad/_/blo gros chen pos yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]kyis dngos po thams cad ni ma skyes pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu zhes gsungs pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du bka' stsal pa'i tshig snga ma dang /_slad ma 'gal ba nongs par mi 'gyur ram ci na dngos po rnams skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu zhes gsungs/_
[\[230a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po ngas dngos po rnams skye ba med pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bur brjod kyang tshig snga phyi 'gal ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye ba rnams skye ba med pa dang /_rang gi sems snang ba tsam du rtogs pa dang /_phyi rol 
[\[230a.3\]]gyi dngos po dang dngos po med pa yod pa dang med pa las mi skye bar mthong bas na/_blo gros chen po nga'i tshig snga phyi 'gal ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur te/_'on kyang mu stegs can gyi rgyu las skye ba gzhig pa'i phyir ngas dngos po thams cad ma skyes pa zhes bshad do/_/blo gros chen po mu stegs can 
[\[230a.4\]]glen pa'i tshogs mang po rnams ni dngos po rnams yod pa dang /_med pa las skye bar 'dod de/_rang gi rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa'i rkyen gyis ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po nga ni yod na yang ma yin/_med na yang mi skye ste/_de'i phyir nga ni skye ba med pa'i tshig nyid du brjod 
[\[230a.5\]]de/_blo gros chen po dngos por bstan pa ni 'khor bar yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /_med do zhes chad par lta ba rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir dang /_nga'i slob ma rnams las sna tshogs kyis skye ba'i gnas yongs su 'dzin par bstan pa'i phyir dngos po'i sgras 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes 
[\[230a.6\]]bshad do/_/blo gros chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid bstan pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su spang ba'i phyir te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo lta ba ngan pa'i mtshan nyid du lhung ba'i bsam pa can rang gi sems snang ba tsam du ma gtogs pas/_rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa'i 
[\[230a.7\]]rang gi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa rnams rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma dang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid du bstan to/_/ci nas kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo lta ba ngan pa'i bsam pa can/_bdag dang gzhan dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa/_yang dag pa ji 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]lta ba bzhin gyi gnas su mthong ba dag log par smra bar mi bya ba'i phyir te/_blo gros chen po chos thams cad kyi yang dag par gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ni 'di lta ste/_rang gi sems snang ba tsam las 'das pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su 
[\[230b.2\]]bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/skye med byed pa dngos ma yin/_/dngos pos 'khor ba kun sdud de/_/sgyu ma la sogs 'dra mthong na/_/mtshan nyid la ni rnam mi rtog_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po ming dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge'i tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du rab tu bshad par bya ste/_ming dang /_tshig 
[\[230b.3\]]dang /_yi ge'i tshogs rab tu rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge'i tshogs kyi rjes su zhugs pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems 
[\[230b.4\]]can thams cad kyang de bzhin du khong du chud par byed do/_/blo gros chen po de la ming gi tshogs zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dngos po gang la brten nas ming du gdags pa ni ming gi tshogs zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po tshig gi tshogs ni 'di lta ste/_tshig gang don gyi tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_rang gi ngo bo 
[\[230b.5\]]nyid gdon mi za ba dang /_mthar thug pa de ni tshig gi tshogs zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po yi ge'i tshogs ni 'di lta ste/_gang gis ming dang tshig gsal bar byed pa de ni yi ge'i tshogs zhes bya'o/_/yang yi ge'i tshogs ni 'di lta ste/_ring po dang /_thung ngu dang /_mtho ba dang /_dma' ba'o/_/yang 
[\[230b.6\]]tshig gi tshogs ni 'gro ba'i rjes lta bu ste/_'di ltar glang po che dang /_rta dang /_mi dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa gang sa la 'gro ba'i rjes rnams ni tshig gi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo/_/blo gros chen po ming dang yi ge ni 'di lta ste/_ming gis phung po gzugs med pa bzhi brjod pa'i phyir ro/_/rang 
[\[230b.7\]]gi mtshan nyid snang bar byed pas ni yi ge ste/_de ni ming dang /_yi ge'i tshogs zhes bya'o/_/'di ni ming dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge'i tshogs rnams brjod pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de la khyod kyis nan tan du bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]pa 'di gsungs so/_/ming dang tshig gi tshogs rnams dang /_/yi ge'i tshogs la bye brag tu/_/mi shes byis pa chags pa ni/_/ji ltar glang chen rdzab bying bzhin/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mkhas pa dag gis gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi 
[\[231a.2\]]ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin par lta ba'i mtshan nyid las rnam par grol ba/_ngas rtogs pa'i don rnams mi mkhas pa de dag la dris pa na de dag 'di skad du 'di ni tshul bzhin 'dri ba ma yin no zhes zer zhing 'di lta ste/_gzugs la sogs pa dang /_mi rtag pa gcig gam tha dad ces bya ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[231a.3\]]du mya ngan las 'das pa las 'du byed dang /_mtshan nyid las mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang /_yon tan las yon tan can dang /_'byung ba las 'byung ba las gyur pa dang /_mthong ba las mthong bar bya ba dang /_rdul las rdul phra mo dang /_sgrub pa las rnal 'byor pa dang /_de bzhin du gcig la 
[\[231a.4\]]gcig phan tshun dpag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshul gyis de dag la sogs pa dris pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/_/zhes zer ro/_de la gzhag pa'i lung bstan pa ni skyes bu gti mug can de dag gis shes par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_'di ltar nyan pa'i blo dang mi ldan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs 
[\[231a.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de dag skrag pa'i gnas spang ba'i phyir lung mi bstan pa rnams lung mi ston to/_/gzhan yang mu stegs can gyi lta bar smra ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma bshad do/_/blo gros chen po mu stegs can ni 'di skad du smra ste/_'di ltar srog de nyid ni lus yin no 
[\[231a.6\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa lung du mi ston pa smra ba/_blo gros chen po mu stegs can rgyu la rnam par rmongs pa rnams ni lung mi ston pa smra'i/_de'i gsung rab la ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po nga'i gsung rab ni gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa rnam par spangs shing rnam par rtog pa mi skye ba'o/_/ji ltar de dag bzlog 
[\[231a.7\]]ce na/_blo gros chen po gang gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa la mngon par zhen cing rang gi sems snang ba tsam du mi shes pa de dag la ni rnam par bzlog pa yod do/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhis sems can rnams 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]la chos ston to/_/blo gros chen po gzhag pa'i lung bstan pa de ni ngas skabs skabs su dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la bshad pa yin gyi/_dbang po yongs su smin pa la ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni bya ba'i rgyu rkyen dang bral ba'i phyir mi skye la/_byed pa med pa'i phyir 
[\[231b.2\]]yang chos thams cad mi skye'o/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na dngos po thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa yin zhe na/_'di ltar rang gi blos rnam par dpyad pa'i tshe rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po mi dmigs pas na/_de'i phyir chos thams cad mi skye bar bshad do/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na chos thams cad 
[\[231b.3\]]'ong ba dang /_'gro ba med pa yin zhe na/_'di ltar rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid blang bar 'dod na yang 'ong ba'i gnas med la/_dor bar 'dod na yang 'gro ba'i gnas med pas/_de'i phyir chos thams cad 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang bral ba yin no/_/blo gros chen po ci'i phyir chos thams cad mi 'gag 
[\[231b.4\]]pa yin zhe na/_'di ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang /_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad mi 'gag pa yin no/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na chos thams cad mi rtag pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid skye ba mi rtag pa yod pas/_de'i phyir chos 
[\[231b.5\]]thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bshad do/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar chos thams cad rtag pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid skye ba mi skye ba'i dngos po mi rtag pas rtag ste/_de'i phyir chos thams cad rtag pa zhes bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i 
[\[231b.6\]]phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/lung bstan pa ni rnam bzhi ste/_/mgo gcig dang ni dri ba dang /_/rnam par dbye dang gzhag pa rnams/_/mu stegs smra ba bzlog pa'o/_/yod dang med las skye bar ni/_/grangs can dang ni khyad par shes/_/lung du mi ston thams cad 
[\[231b.7\]]kyang /_/de dag nyid kyis rab tu bstan/_/blo yis rnam par gzhigs na yang /_/rang bzhin dag ni mi dmigs te/_/brjod pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir/_/rang bzhin bral ba rab tu bstan/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'gro ba rab tu dbye ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi 'gro ba rab tu 
[\[232a.2\]]dbye ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid la mkhas na/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba rig nas sems can rnams la de lta de lta bur chos bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_ci nas bdag ma mchis pa 
[\[232a.3\]]gnyis kyi mtshan nyid dang /_sgrib pa gnyis yongs su sbyangs te/_sa rnams kyi sa'i mtshan nyid las 'da' ba rtogs par khong du chud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthar thug pa'i spyod yul rab tu rnyed nas/_ji ltar gzugs sna tshogs kyi nor bu dang 'dra 
[\[232a.4\]]bar sems can thams cad la shin tu phan 'dogs shing /_chos thams cad kyi spyod yul dang /_bsam pa 'tshal ba'i lus dang /_longs spyod kyis thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po legs par nyon la yid 
[\[232a.5\]]la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das la blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_legs so bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes bka' mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros chen po rgyun du zhugs pa dag 
[\[232a.6\]]gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rab tu dbye ba ni rnam pa gsum yod de/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tha ma dang /_bar ma dang /_mchog go/_/de la tha ma ni de ltar thog ma na tshe'i srid pa bdun no/_/bar ma ni srid pa gsum dang lngas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[232a.7\]]bar 'gyur ba'o/_/mchog ni tshe de nyid la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gsum po de dag la kun du sbyor ba gsum yod de/_chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po dag yin no/_de la kun du sbyor ba gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig tshogs 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]la lta ba dang /_the tsom dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/_kun du sbyor ba de gsum gyi bye brag gis gong nas gong du khyad par can du gyur nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang rnam pa 
[\[232b.2\]]gnyis yod de/_'di lta ste/_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_kun du brtags pa ltar gzhan gyi dbang la kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa bzhin no/_/dper na gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin la brten nas kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin la mngon par zhen pa sna 
[\[232b.3\]]tshogs 'byung ste/_de yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_de gnyi ga yang ma yin te/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi rnam par rtog pas/_sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid la mngon par 
[\[232b.4\]]zhen pa ni/_dper na smig rgyu la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skom pa rnams kyi chu'i 'du shes 'byung ba lta bu ste/_de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i kun du brtags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o/_/de yang gang zag la bdag med pas dngos po med par gzung ba'i phyir yun ring po nas mi shes pa dang /_
[\[232b.5\]]mngon par shes pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro/_blo gros chen po lhan cig skyes pa ni rgyun du zhugs pas bdag dang /_gzhan gyi lus mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang /_phung po bzhi la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang /_gzugs skye ba 'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las 
[\[232b.6\]]gyur pa'i phyir dang /_phan tshun rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir dang /_'byung ba dang /_gzugs rnams bsags pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang /_rgyun du zhugs pas yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs brtags na mi snang bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba spangs par 'gyur ro/_de ltar 'jig 
[\[232b.7\]]tshogs la lta ba spangs pas 'dod chags mi 'byung ste/_'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/blo gros chen po the tsom gyi mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/_chos thob pa legs par mthong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir dang /_snga ma'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba rnam pa gnyis kyi rnam 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir chos rnams la the tsom mi skye bas gzhan la ston pa'am/_dag pa'am/_ma dag pa'i lta ba skyed par mi byed de/_'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa the tsom spangs pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/blo gros chen po ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i tshul 
[\[233a.2\]]khrims mi snyems she na/_'di lta ste/_skye ba'i gnas kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid rab tu mthong bas na de'i phyir mi snyems so/_/blo gros chen po snyems pa ni 'di lta ste/_byis pa so so'i skye bo dag mi 'gyur bar dka' thub len cing sbyor ba dag gis longs spyod dang /_
[\[233a.3\]]bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir skye ba gnyer bar byed do/_/de de ltar mi snyems pa yang gzhan du na 'di ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_so so rang gis rig pa'i khyad par rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba zag pa med pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag 
[\[233a.4\]]yang dag par len cing srung bar byed de/_'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/_/rgyun du zhugs pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa la ni 'dod chags dang /_gti mug mi 'byung ste/_gal te rgyun du zhugs pa 
[\[233a.5\]]'di snyam du kun du sbyor ba 'di rnams ni bdag la mngon par ma grub bo snyam du sems pa ni nyes pa rnams gnyis yod par 'gyur te/_'jig tshogs la lta bar song ba dang /_kun du sbyor ba rnams ma spangs pa'o/_/blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[233a.6\]]'das kyis ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pa mang du gsungs na/_des 'dod chags gang zhig spangs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po bud med la sred cing 'dod pa dang /_mngon par chags shing zhen pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs las byung ba/_lus 
[\[233a.7\]]dang ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa des da ltar gyi bde ba la sred cing ma 'ongs pa na sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ba de dag de la mi 'byung ngo /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la gnas pa thob pas de'i phyir de spangs pa yin te/_mya ngan las 'das pa rtogs par bya ba'i 'dod 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]chags spangs pa ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid cig snang zhing rnam par rtog pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid du mthong ba'i mtshan nyid mi skye ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rab tu mthong ba'i phyir 'jig 
[\[233b.2\]]rten 'dir 'ongs nas cig car sdug bsngal mthar byas te mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par byed pas de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan 
[\[233b.3\]]nyid kyi dngos po rnams dngos po med pa dang /_lta ba'i nyes pa skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skye ba'i phyir dang /_kun du sbyor ba spangs pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po dgra bcom pa ni 'di lta ste/_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam 
[\[233b.4\]]par thar pa dang /_stobs dang /_rig pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po med pas de'i phyir dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra bcom pa rnam pa gsum du 
[\[233b.5\]]bka' stsal na/_'dir dgra bcom pa gang dag la bgyi bar bka' stsal/_ci bcom ldan 'das zhi ba phyogs gcig pa theg pa gcig gis lam rab tu thob pa'am/_'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs kyis de ltar ston pa'i dgra bcom pa'am/_de ste 
[\[233b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pas sprul pa zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po zhi ba phyogs gcig pa theg pa gcig gi lam du thob pa'i nyan thos yin gyi/_gzhan dag ni ma yin no/_gzhan ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[233b.7\]]'phrul pas sprul pa rnams te/_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skye ba ston te/_sangs rgyas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mdzes par bya ba'i phyir ro/_blo gros chen po rnam par rtog pa 'jug pa'i gnas su rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/_'bras bu 'thob par bya ba dang /_bsam gtan 'thob par bya ba'o/_/de la bsam gtan ni bsam gtan la zhugs pa na/_rab tu dben pa'i phyir dang /_rang gi sems snang bar ston pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'bras 
[\[234a.2\]]bu thob pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams las shin tu bzla bar 'dod na/_rang gi sems snang ba'i mtshan nyid las ldog par bya'o/_/blo gros chen po 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 
[\[234a.3\]]'jug pa ni rang gi sems snang ba las 'das zhes byar mi rung ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems snang ba yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med bzhi/_/gzugs 
[\[234a.4\]]med pa yi ting 'dzin dang /_/tshor ba 'du shes 'gog pa rnams/_/sems tsam la ni de yod min/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_/lan cig phyir 'ong phyir mi 'ong /_/dgra bcom pa yi 'bras bu rnams/_/de dag thams cad sems 'khrul pa/_/bsam gtan dang 
[\[234a.5\]]ni bsam gtan rkyen/_/spong zhes bden pa yang dag mthong /_/de dag rtog pa tsam yin par/_/gang gis rtogs pa de 'grol lo/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po blo rnam pa gnyis yod de/_'di lta ste/_rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i blo dang /_rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[234a.6\]]'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas rnam par gzhag pa'i blo'o/_/de la blo gros chen po rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i blo ni 'di lta ste/_blo gang gis dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid rab tu gzhig na mtha' bzhi dang bral bas mi dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i blo 
[\[234a.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/de la blo gros chen po mtha' bzhi ni 'di lta ste/_/gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang med pa dang /_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa ni mtha' bzhi zhes 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bshad de/_blo gros chen po mtha' bzhi po de dag dang bral ba ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/_/blo gros chen po mtha' bzhi po 'dis chos thams cad yongs su brtags pa la rab tu bslab par bya'o/_/de la blo gros chen po rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la mngon par 
[\[234b.2\]]zhen pas rnam par gzhag pa'i blo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa gang gis sra ba dang /_gsher ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_g.yo ba yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba chen po rnams su dam 'cha' 
[\[234b.3\]]ba dang /_rgyu mtshan dang /_dpe la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam par gzhag pas rnam par bzhag pa ste/_de ni rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas rnam par gzhag pa'i blo zhes bya ste/_de ni blo rnam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do/_/
[\[234b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang blo 'di gnyis kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan na gang zag dang chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du chud cing snang ba med pa'i blo la mkhas pa dang /_spyod pa'i sa la so sor rab tu rtog pas sa dang po rab tu 'thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[234b.5\]]brgya la snyoms par 'jug_/bye brag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu 'thob/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgya yang mthong /_bskal pa brgyar sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i dngos po la 'jug_/'od kyis zhing brgya yang snang bar byed do/_/gong 
[\[234b.6\]]nas gong du sa'i mtshan nyid shes te/_smon lam chen po khyad par can gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la dbang zhing chos kyi sprin gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gis thugs su chud pa'i sa thob nas mthar thug pa'i gnas bcu dang rab tu 
[\[234b.7\]]ldan pa'i chos su 'gyur te/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sprul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes shing so so rang gis rig pa'i bde bas mnyam par gzhag pa yang thob bo/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'byung 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]ba chen po dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba chen po dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_blo gros chen po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar yang dag par 
[\[235a.2\]]rab tu rtog ste/_de don dam pa'i bden par ni 'byung ba chen po dag skye ba med do/_/'byung ba chen po dag la skye ba med par de ltar rab tu rtog par byed de/_de ltar rab tu brtags nas ming dang rgyu mtshan rnams ni rnam par rtog pa tsam dang /_rang gi sems snang ba tsam dang /_phyi 
[\[235a.3\]]rol gyi dngos po rnams dngos po med par rtogs pa ni rang gi sems snang ba rnam par rtog pa tsam zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_khams gsum pa'i 'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa de dag la rab tu brtags na/_ngo bo nyid kyis mtha' bzhi dang bral bas tshul rnam par dag pa 
[\[235a.4\]]bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba/_yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dbyibs su gnas pa/_ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du 'grub par mthong ngo /_/blo gros chen po ji ltar na 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag gis rgyur byas pa'i gzugs rnams skyed ce na/_'di lta ste/_gsher 
[\[235a.5\]]bar rnam par rtog pa'i 'byung ba chen pos ni phyi nang gi chu'i khams skyed do/_/bya ba nus pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i 'byung ba chen pos ni phyi nang gi me'i khams skyed do/_/g.yo bar rnam par rtog pa'i 'byung ba chen pos ni phyi nang gi rlung gi khams skyed do/_/gzugs gcad du rung bar 
[\[235a.6\]]rnam par rtog pa'i 'byung ba chen pos ni phyi nang gi sa'i khams skyed do/_/gzugs dang nam mkha' gnyi ga yang log pa'i bden pa la mngon par zhen pas phung po lnga 'dus pa dang /_'byung ba chen po dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa skye'o/_/blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa ni gnas 
[\[235a.7\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_yul la mngon par chags pa'i rgyus 'gro ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po sa la sogs pa chen po bzhi dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa rnams la ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rten yod kyi/_'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag gi rkyen ni ma yin no/_/
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po dang /_dbyibs dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_gnas dang /_bya ba dang /_sbyor ba rnams dngos po med pas 'byung ba chen po rnams mi skye'o/_/blo gros chen po dngos po dang /_dbyibs dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_gnas dang /_bya ba dang /_
[\[235b.2\]]sbyor ba rnams 'dus pa las skye bas/_dbyibs med pa ma yin no/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen po 'byung ba chen po dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni mu stegs can rnams kyis rnam par brtags pa yin gyi ngas ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po phung po rnams 
[\[235b.3\]]kyi rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/phung po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po lnga rnams so/_/phung po lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams 
[\[235b.4\]]so/_/de la phung po bzhi rnams ni gzugs med de/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams so/_/blo gros chen po gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa phan tshun du mi 'thun pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/blo gros chen po gzugs 
[\[235b.5\]]med pa la bzhir bgrang du med de/_nam mkha' bzhin no/_dper na nam mkha' ni grangs kyi mtshan nyid las 'das te/_bgrang ba dang bral mod kyi/_rnam par rtog pas nam mkha' zhes brjod do/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin du phung po rnams kyang grangs kyi mtshan nyid las 'das te bgrang 
[\[235b.6\]]ba dang bral bas dngos po dang /_dngos po med pa rnam par spangs pa/_mtha' bzhi dang bral ba'o/_/grangs dang /_bgrang ba'i mtshan nyid ni byis pas rab tu brjod pa yin gyi/_'phags pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po 'phags pa rnams kyis ni sgyu ma lta bur 
[\[235b.7\]]gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa rnam par spangs par nye bar 'dogs so/_/yang rmi lam dang /_gzugs brnyan gyi skyes bu ltar gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi tshul ni phung po dang 'dra bar 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]rtog pas snang ngo /_/de ni phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid de/_khyod kyis bzlog par bya'o/_rnam par bzlog nas rab tu dben pa'i chos bstan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mu stegs can gyi lta ba rnams bzlog par bya'o/_/blo gros chen po rab tu dben pa'i chos 
[\[236a.2\]]bstan pa'i tshe chos bdag med pa mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur/_mi g.yo ba'i sa la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de mi g.yo ba'i sar rab tu zhugs nas/_ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi lus thob pas sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/_/stobs dang /_
[\[236a.3\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_dbang rnams rtogs par khong du chud pas sems can thams cad sdud cing phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/dper na sa chen po ni sems can rnams 'deg cing phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can thams cad la phan 
[\[236a.4\]]'dogs pa yin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po mu stegs can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa bzhi yod de bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po'i rang bzhin dngos po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi dngos po dngos po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_rang gi mtshan 
[\[236a.5\]]nyid kyi rang bzhin dngos po med par rtogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_phung po rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyud kyi rgyun chad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/de dag ni mu stegs can rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/_nga'i gsung rab la ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po nga'i gsung 
[\[236a.6\]]rab la ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa la zlog pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa brgyad du rnam par ma gzhag pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par gzhag go/_/
[\[236a.7\]]blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te rnam par bzhag na ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa log pas bsal/_rnam par shes pa bdun rnams ni ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis blo gros chen po la bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi rgyu dang /_de dag gis dmigs pa rkyen yin pa'i phyir 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]rnam par shes pa bdun rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yul rnams bye brag 'byed cing mngon par zhen pas bag chags rnams bskyed nas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgyas par byed de/_yid dang lhan cig tu bdag dang bdag gis 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen cing /_
[\[236b.2\]]ngar sems pa'i rkyen gyis skye bas lus kyi mtshan nyid rnam par mi 'jig go/_/kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rgyur gyur cing de la dmigs pa rang gi sems snang ba'i yul la mngon par zhen pas sems 'dus pa gcig gi rgyur gcig 'byung ste/_dper na rgya mtsho'i rlabs lta bur rang gi snang ba'i spyod 
[\[236b.3\]]yul gyi rlung gis bskyod pas 'jug cing ldog pa yang de bzhin te/_de lta bas na yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzlog pas rnam par shes pa bdun rnams kyang ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/bya ba dang ni 
[\[236b.4\]]mtshan nyid dang /_/dngos por mya ngan nga mi 'da'/_/rnam rtog shes bya rnam shes te/_/bzlog pas mya ngan nga 'das so/_/de rgyu de la dmigs pa ste/_/yid kyis 'gro sogs lus mngon 'grub/_/rgyu 'byin de ni sems yin te/_/rnam shes gnas ni rab tu byed/_/ji ltar chu chen zad nas ni/_/
[\[236b.5\]]rlabs rnams rgyun du mi 'byung ltar/_/de bzhin yid ni 'gag pa na/_/rnam shes sna tshogs skye mi 'gyur/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin rab tu dbye ba dang /_rtogs pa'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/_kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin rab tu dbye ba dang /_rtogs 
[\[236b.6\]]pa'i tshul gyis mtshan nyid la mkhas pa gang gis khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams kun du rtog pa spangs shing 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa la gnas pa dang /_mu stegs can gyi tshul rtogs pa dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i blos gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa'i rnam 
[\[236b.7\]]par rtog pa spangs nas gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid sna tshogs la kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'du byed du rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la blo gros chen po kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin rab tu dbye ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brjod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_smra bar 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_nor gyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rgyu'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_rigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_skye bar rnam par rtog pa dang /_
[\[237a.2\]]mi skye bar rnam par rtog pa dang /_'brel bar rnam par rtog pa dang /_bcings pa dang ma bcings par rnam par rtog pa yin te/_'di ni kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin rab tu dbye ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid do/_/de la blo gros chen po brjod pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbyangs dang /_glu 
[\[237a.3\]]snyan pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa yin te/_'di ni brjod pa'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po smra bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang ci yang rung ba smra bar bya ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba de la gnas nas brjod pa'i rnam pa 
[\[237a.4\]]'byung ba de ni smra bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_smra bar bya ba'i dngos po de dag nyid smig rgyu lta bu la mtshan nyid sna tshogs su mngon par zhen pas mngon par zhen te/_'di lta ste/_sra ba dang /_gsher ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_
[\[237a.5\]]g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid du dngos po thams cad la rnam par rtog pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po nor gyi rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par chags pa de ni nor gyi rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po rang 
[\[237a.6\]]bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po'i ngo bo nyid du 'dzin cing 'di ni 'di bzhin gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes log par lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_tha mi dad pa de ni rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po rgyu'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyu dang rkyen gang gis 
[\[237a.7\]]yod pa dang /_med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid skyed pa de ni rgyu'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yod pa dang /_med pa dang /_gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_gnyi ga dang /_gnyi ga ma yin par log par lta ba'i mu stegs can gyi rnam 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa de ni lta ba'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po rigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag dang bdag gi mtshan nyid rigs pas brtsad de smra ba ni rigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po skye bar rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[237b.2\]]lta ste/_rkyen rnams kyis yod pa dang /_med pa'i dngos po skye bar mngon par zhen pa de ni skye bar rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po mi skye bar rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po thams cad ni snga nas skye ba med de/_sa bon med pa las rgyu dang rkyen gyis rgyu med pa'i lus bskyed pa'o/_/zhes 
[\[237b.3\]]'dzin pa de ni mi skye bar rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po 'brel ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gser dang /_skud pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dang lhan cig pa'i mtshan nyid du 'brel ba de ni 'brel ba'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po bcings pa dang /_ma bcings pa'i rnam 
[\[237b.4\]]par rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'ching ba'i rgyu dang /_bcing bar bya ba la mngon par zhen pa ste/_ji ltar skyes bu thams cad dang ldan pas lag pa la mdud pa 'dor ba dang 'grol ba lta bu ni bcings pa dang /_ma bcings pa'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin rab tu 
[\[237b.5\]]dbye ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad yod pa dang med par mngon par zhen to/_/blo gros chen po gzhan gyi dbang la mngon par zhen pas mngon par zhen par gyur pa dag yongs su brtags pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pas sgyu ma bzhin du lus sna tshogs ston pa la byis pa 
[\[237b.6\]]rnams kyi rnam par rtog pas sgyu ma las gzhan du rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong ste/_blo gros chen po sgyu ma dang sna tshogs ni tha dad pa yang ma yin/_tha mi dad pa yang ma yin no/_/gal te tha dad na ni sgyu ma ni sna tshogs kyi rgyu ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste tha mi dad na ni sgyu ma dang sna tshogs bye brag med par 'gyur te/_
[\[237b.7\]]de'i bye brag mthong bas na de'i phyir gcig pa yang ma yin/_tha dad pa yang ma yin no/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen po khyod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis sgyu ma lta bu'i gzhan gyi dbang dang /_kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin la tha dad pa dang /_tha dad 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]pa ma yin pa dang /_yod pa dang med par mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sems ni yul gyis kun du bcings/_/rtog pa rig las ye shes 'jug_/snang ba med dang khyad 
[\[238a.2\]]par las/_/shes rab mnyam par rab tu bskyed/_/brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis yod de/_/gzhan dbang la ni de med do/_/kun brtags dag ni nor pas bsdus/_/gzhan dbang de ni kun brtags min/_/yan lag tha dad 'byung ba yang /_/sgyu ma ji bzhin mi 'grub ste/_/de yi mtshan ma sna tshogs 
[\[238a.3\]]yod/_/kun brtags de ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de yi mtshan ma gnas ngan len/_/sems kyi 'ching las skyes pa ste/_/rnam rtog shes pa med pa rnams/_/gzhan gyi dbang las rnam par rtog_/brtags pa'i dngos po 'di dag ni/_/de nyid gzhan gyi dbang yin te/_/brtags pa dag ni sna tshogs 
[\[238a.4\]]yod/_/gzhan gyi dbang la rtog par byed/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam ste/_/gsum pa rgyu las skye ba med/_/brtags pa dag ni kun rdzob bshad/_/de 'chad 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/rnal 'byor can gyi dngos po ltar/_/gcig la sna tshogs ston byed kyang /_/de la sna tshogs yod ma yin/_/
[\[238a.5\]]kun brtags mtshan nyid de bzhin no/_/ji ltar rab rib can dag gi/_/rnam rtog sna tshogs gzugs su snang /_/rab rib gzugs dang gzugs min med/_/gzhan dbang ma rtogs de bzhin no/_/ji ltar gser ni rab sbyangs pa/_/dri ma dag ni spangs gyur dang /_/nam mkha' dag ni sprin med ltar/_/
[\[238a.6\]]kun brtags pa yang de bzhin no/_/kun brtags pa yi dngos po dang /_/de bzhin gzhan dbang yod min la/_/sgro 'dogs skur pa 'debs byed de/_/rnam brtags dbang gis 'jig pa yin/_/gal te brtags pa dngos med la/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni yod gyur na/_/dngos med dngos po yod pas 
[\[238a.7\]]na/_/dngos yod dngos po med las 'byung /_/kun brtags pa la brten pa'i rgyus/_/gzhan dbang de ni nye bar dmigs/_/rgyu mtshan ming dang 'brel pa las/_/kun brtags rnams ni skye bar 'gyur/_/shin tu ma grub rtogs pa'i tshe/_/kun brtags las ni 'da' bar 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]yongs su dag rig pa/_/de ni don dam zhes bya'o/_/kun brtags rnam pa bcu gnyis te/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni rnam pa drug_/so so rang rig ye shes kyis/_/shes bya de la bye brag med/_/chos lnga yang dag nyid yin te/_/rang bzhin la ni rnam gsum yod/_/rnal 'byor can gyis de bsgoms 
[\[238b.2\]]na/_/de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/mtshan ma dag dang gzhan gyi dbang /_/ming des kun du brtags pa skyed/_/kun brtags mtshan ma de dag ni/_/gzhan dbang de las byung ba'o/_/blo yis so sor rab brtags na/_/gzhan dbang med cing brtags pa'ang med/_/yongs grub la ni dngos 
[\[238b.3\]]med na/_/blo yis ci zhig rnam par brtags/_/kun brtags rang bzhin de dag la/_/rang bzhin gnyis ni rnam par gzhag_/brtags pa dag ni sna tshogs snang /_/rnam dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/kun brtags ri mo'i rnam pa bzhin/_/gzhan gyi dbang las brtags pa ste/_/rnam 
[\[238b.4\]]pa gzhan du brtags na ni/_/mu stegs smra la gnas par 'gyur/_/rtogs pas brtags zhes brjod pa ste/_/'dus las skye bar mthong ba'i rgyus/_/rnam rtog gnyis las grol ba ni/_/de nyid yongs su grub pa yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 
[\[238b.5\]]yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang /_theg pa gcig gi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol/_'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid dang /_theg pa gcig rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[238b.6\]]des bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan rnams 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid dang /_theg pa gcig la mkhas shing gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[238b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_/blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes bka' mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/blo gros chen po de la 'phags pa snga ma rnams kyis khong du chud nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/_kun brtags pa dngos po med par bstan pa la brten nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis gcig pu dben par song nas/_
[\[239a.2\]]rang gi blos rnam pa dpyod pa/_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing lta ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa spangs te/_gong nas gong du khyad par can du gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la rab tu 'jug pa ni so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o/_/de la blo gros 
[\[239a.3\]]chen po theg pa gcig gi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_theg pa gcig gi lam rig pa ni ngas theg pa gcig ces bshad do/_/theg pa gcig gi lam khong du chud pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas 
[\[239a.4\]]la rnam par rtog pa mi skye ba ni theg pa gcig khong du chud pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po theg pa gcig khong du chud pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gzhan mu stegs can dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pas thob pa ma yin no/_/
[\[239a.5\]]de'i phyir theg pa gcig ces bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la blo gros chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du theg pa gsum du bka' stsal la theg pa gcig tu ma gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po bdag nyid yongs su mya 
[\[239a.6\]]ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la theg pa gcig tu ma bshad de/_'di ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i sbyor bas rnam par grol 
[\[239a.7\]]ba 'thob kyi/_bdag nyid kyi mthus ni ma yin pa'i phyir theg pa gcig tu ma bshad do/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_las kyi bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la theg pa gcig tu ma bshad do/_/chos 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]bdag med par ma rtogs shing dngos po dang bcas pa'i 'chi 'pho ma spangs pa'i phyir theg pa gsum du bstan te/_blo gros chen po de dag na ma nyes pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs shing chos bdag med par rtogs pa de na de dag nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa thams cad skyed pa'i bag chags spangs 
[\[239b.2\]]te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ro myong ba'i dngos po med par gyur nas zag pa med pa'i dbyings las sad de/_sad nas yang 'jig rten las 'das par zhugs te/_gong nas gong du zag pa med pa'i dbyings su tshogs rnams yongs su bskangs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 
[\[239b.3\]]kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang byed pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/lha rnams dang ni tshangs pa'i theg_/nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[239b.4\]]kyi theg_/nga yis theg pa de dag ni/_/ji srid sems rnams 'jug pa'i bar/_/de dag mthar phyin min par bshad/_/gal te sems de zad gyur na/_/theg pa med cing gdeg pa med/_/theg pa rnam par gzhag med pas/_/theg pa gcig tu ngas bstan to/_/sems 
[\[239b.5\]]can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/_/theg pa tha dad ngas bshad de/_/rnam par grol ba rnam gsum yod/_/chos la bdag med de nyid dang /_/nyon mongs shes rab la sogs pas/_/rnam par grol na stong par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho la ni shing 'phyo ba/_/rtag tu rlabs kyis 
[\[239b.6\]]g.yeng ba ltar/_/nyan thos rmongs pa'ang de bzhin te/_/mtshan nyid rlung gis rnam par g.yengs/_/kun nas ldang las de log kyang /_/nyon mongs bag chags gzhan gyis rmongs/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi bde bas myos/_/zag pa med pa'i dbyings la gnas/_/
[\[239b.7\]]mthar phyin tshul ni de la med/_/phyir yang de las mi ldog ste/_/ting 'dzin rnams kyi lus thob nas/_/bskal pa'i bar du de mi sad/_/chang gis myos pa'i skyes bu dag_/myos byed zad nas sangs 'gyur ltar/_/de dag chos rtogs de bzhin te/_/bla med sangs rgyas sku 'thob 'gyur//_//
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa rin po che'i mdo las/_bam po lnga pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros chen po yid las byung ba'i lus 
[\[240a.2\]]rab tu dbye ba rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan gyis de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_legs so bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes bka' mnyan pa dang /_
[\[240a.3\]]de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros chen po yid las byung ba'i lus ni rnam pa gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la snyoms par zhugs pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus dang /_chos kyi ngo bo nyid 
[\[240a.4\]]rtogs pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus dang /_ris su lhan cig skyes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pas yid las byung ba'i lus te/_rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sa dang po nas gong nas gong du sa'i mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas lus rnam pa gsum po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[240a.5\]]de la blo gros chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la snyoms par zhugs pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa la ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir rang gi sems rnam pa mang po dben par spyod pas 
[\[240a.6\]]sems kyi rgya mtsho la gnas te/_rnam par shes pa'i rlabs kyi mtshan nyid mi 'byung bas rang gi sems snang ba'i yul dngos po yod pa dang /_dngos po med pa yongs su shes pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la snyoms par zhugs pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus zhes bya'o/_/blo 
[\[240a.7\]]gros chen po chos kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa brgyad pa la sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i chos la snang ba med par rnam par khong du chud pas lus dang sems gnas shin tu gyur te/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa dang /_gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_mtshan ma dang /_stobs dang /_dbang dang /_mngon par shes pa dpag tu med pa 'thob ste/_me tog ltar rgyas shing yid bzhin du mgyogs pa dang /_sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam dang /_chu zla dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bu 'byung ba 
[\[240b.2\]]las gyur pa ma yin yang 'byung ba las gyur pa dang 'dra ba/_gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis yan lag phun sum tshogs par brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'jug pa/_chos kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par khong du chud pa'i 
[\[240b.3\]]phyir de ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa las byung ba'i lus zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po de la ris su lhan cig skyes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rang gis thob pa'i bde ba'i 
[\[240b.4\]]mtshan nyid la dmigs pa de ni ris su lhan cig skyes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i yid las byung ba'i lus zhes bya ste/_blo gros chen po lus gsum po de dag gi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba rtogs pa 'di la rab tu brtson par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 
[\[240b.5\]]de nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/nga yis theg pa theg chen min/_/bshad pa med cing yi ge med/_/bden pa ma yin rnam grol min/_/spyod yul med pa'ang ma yin te/_/'on kyang theg chen theg pa ni/_/ting nge 
[\[240b.6\]]'dzin la dbang byed cing /_/yid las byung lus sna tshogs la/_/dbang gi me tog dag gis brgyan/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[240b.7\]]kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mtshams med pa lnga'i las spyod kyang mnar med pa'i dmyal bar lhung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /_spro ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir byin gyi rlabs kyis sprul pa dag mngon par rtogs par rab tu ston to/_/mtshams med pa'i dngos po 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]byas pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa mi 'thob par gcig tu nges pa yang med de/_rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pa dang /_lus dang longs spyod du rnam par rtog pa dang /_bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba dang /_gal te brgya 
[\[241a.2\]]lam na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas 'gro ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par rtog pa las grol bar 'gyur ba ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'dod pa'i srid 
[\[241a.3\]]pa ma zhes bya/_/ma rig pa ni pha yin no/_/yul rig rnam shes sangs rgyas te/_/bag la nyal ni dgra bcom pa/_/phung po 'dus pa dge 'dun yin/_/mtshams med rim gyis bcad pas na/_/de na mtshams med lnga yin te/_/mnar med dmyal bar ltung mi 
[\[241a.4\]]'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas pa nyid bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[241a.5\]]pa nyid lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po gang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs pa dang /_sgrib pa gnyis yongs su shes shing khong du chud pa dang /_shi 'pho rnam pa gnyis dang bral ba dang /_nyon mongs pa rnam pa gnyi ga 
[\[241a.6\]]spangs pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas pa nyid ces bya'o/_/blo gros chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos de dag nyid khong du chud na de yang sangs rgyas pa nyid ces bya ste/_des na de'i phyir ngas theg pa gcig tu bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[241a.7\]]'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/bdag med rnam gnyis mkhas pa dang /_/sgrib gnyis nyon mongs rab spangs dang /_/shi 'pho gnyis dang gtan bral ba/_/de ni sangs rgyas nyid ces bya/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' blo 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi nang du 'di skad ces nga ni gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nyid do/_/skyes pa'i rabs sna tshogs su yang nga nyid de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[241b.2\]]rgyal po spyi bo skyes dang /_glang po che so drug pa dang /_ne tso dang /_dbang po dang /_drang srong mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa'o zhes skyes pa'i rabs brgya stong gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po mtshungs pa rnam pa bzhi'i phyir de bzhin 
[\[241b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'khor gyi nang du 'di skad ces nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung du gyur to zhes gsung ngo /_/mtshungs pa rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[241b.4\]]yi ge mtshungs pa dang /_gsung mtshungs pa dang /_chos mtshungs pa dang /_sku mtshungs pa ni mtshungs pa rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ste/_'di ltar mtshungs pa rnam pa 'di bzhi'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de skad du 
[\[241b.5\]]gsungs te/_de la yi ge mtshungs pa gang zhe na/_yi ge gang gis nga'i ming sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa'i yi ge des sangs rgyas thams cad kyang brjod pas/_yi ge de dag gi rang bzhin bye brag med pas na de ni yi ge mtshungs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la gsung mtshungs 
[\[241b.6\]]pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_nga'i gsung rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid du 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi gsung yang de bzhin du rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi tshangs pa'i 
[\[241b.7\]]sgra skad kyi dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid du 'byung ste/_ka la ping ka dang /_tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin du bye brag med cing lhag chad med do/_/de la sku mtshungs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad ni chos kyi sku dang /_gzugs dang /_mtshan 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dang /_dpe byad bzang po'i skur mtshungs shing bye brag med de/_'gro ba'i bye brag sems can de dang de dag gdul ba'i phyir gzugs tha dad pa sna tshogs ston pa ni ma gtogs te/_de ni sku mtshungs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos mtshungs pa gang zhe na/_
[\[242a.2\]]'di lta ste/_nga dang sangs rgyas de dag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thugs su chud de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mdor bsdus te bstan pa de ni mtshungs pa rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ste/_de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[242a.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'khor gyi nang du de skad ces gsung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/'od srung dang ni 'khor ba 'jig_/gser thub kyang ni 
[\[242a.4\]]nga yin zhes/_/mtshungs pa bzhi ni mnyam gyur pas/_/rgyal ba'i sras la ngas bshad do/_/blo gros chen pos yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ni gang gi nub mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs 
[\[242a.5\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du yi ge gcig kyang ma bshad/_mi 'chad 'chad par mi 'gyur te/_bshad pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'o zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[242a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ci'i rgyus bshad pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'o zhes gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po ngas chos rnam pa gnyis la dgongs nas de skad ces smras so/_/chos gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[242a.7\]]rang gis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa'i chos te/_'di ni chos gnyis zhes bya'o/_/chos gnyis po de las dgongs nas de'i phyir ngas de skad ces bshad do/_/de la rang gis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa de dag gi gang thugs su chud pa de bzhin du ngas kyang rang gis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos mthar phyin pa'i spyod yul tshig gi rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba/_yi ge'i tshul rnam pa gnyis las rnam par grol ba/_lhag chad med par thugs su chud pa'o/_/de la 
[\[242b.2\]]ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa'i chos gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon gyi 'phags pa'i lam rnying pa gser dang /_dngul la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rtag par gnas pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung yang rung /_'jig rten du ma
