[\[282a.6\]]kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir ni rtag par lta ba skyed do/_/bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ni thog ma'i mtha' mi shes so/_/rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i blo 'gags pa'i phyir ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas pa'i sa gzhi dang ma rig pa gnas kyi sa'i bag chags 
[\[282a.7\]]spangs pa'i phyir nyes pa thams cad spangs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/theg pa gsum ni theg ma yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi 'gyur/_/thams cad sangs rgyas lung bstan cing /_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]nyes pa rnams dang bral bar bshad/_/mngon rtogs ye shes thob bya dang /_/lhag med mya ngan 'da' ba dang /_/zhum pa rnams kyang spro bya'i phyir/_/de phyir dgongs te bshad pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i ye shes dag_/de nyid rnam 'byed lam du bshad/_/theg pa rnams ni theg ma yin/_/
[\[282b.2\]]de ni mya ngan 'da' ba min/_/'dod gzugs srid dang lta ba rnams/_/gnas bzhi'i sar ni bshad pa yin/_/yid kyi rnam par shes las 'byung /_/rnam shes khyim du yid ni gnas/_/yid dang mig sogs rnam par shes/_/'gag pa la ni mi rtag bshad/_/yang na mya ngan 'das par lta/_/
[\[282b.3\]]rtag par gnas pa nyid du 'dod/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/_byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa/_/bla med byang chub tshol ba dag_/sha dang chang dang sgog btsong rnams/_/'tshal zhing btung bar bgyi mi bgyi/_/bla na ma mchis gtso mchog 
[\[282b.4\]]gis/_/thugs rjes bdag la bshad du gsol/_/byis pa de la brkam par bgyid/_/dri nga grags pa ma mchis 'gyur/_/shi na gcan gzan rnams kyi zas/_/ji ltar de ni 'tshal bar rung /_/'tshal nas nongs dmigs ci mchis dang /_/ma 'tshal yon tan gang lags pa/_/'tshal dang ma 
[\[282b.5\]]'tshal dge sdig rnams/_/thugs rjes bdag la bshad du gsol/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pos tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis zhu ba zhus nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la sogs pa'i slad du sha 'tshal ba dang mi 
[\[282b.6\]]'tshal ba'i nongs pa dang yon tan rnams bshad du gsol/_bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa na sha'i zas la chags shing re ba'i sems can sna tshogs la rnam par phye ste chos bshad pas sems can de dag byams pa'i sems kyis phan tshun gcig la 
[\[282b.7\]]gcig lta ba dang /_byams pa'i sems thob nas kyang so so'i sa la gnas shing rnam par dag pa gsal bar rtog ste myur du mthar thug pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag rang gi sa la bsti zhing /_bstis nas kyang bla na 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos ngan pa log par smra ba'i mu stegs can gang dag log par lta ba dang /_rtag pa dang chad pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyis kyang sha 'tshal ba bkag ste sha 'tshal du mi gnang ba lags na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi mgon 
[\[283a.2\]]po yang dag pa'i chos yongs su grub pas sha mi gsol ba lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_de bzhin 
[\[283a.3\]]du 'tshal lo zhes bka' mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po rgyu dang rkyen tshad med pa'i phyir sha rnams bza' bar mi bya ste/_'on kyang 'dir khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_srog chags rnams ni yun ring po nas phan tshun gyi rgyu rkyen gyis rtag par 
[\[283a.4\]]gnyen du gyur te/_'di ltar gnyen du gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi phyir sha rnams bza' bar mi bya'o/_/bong bu dang /_dre'u dang /_rnga mo dang /_wa dang /_khyi dang /_glang dang /_rta dang /_mi dang /_gcan gzan gyi sha la sogs pa ni shen pa dag 'dres par 'tshong bar byed pas de'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/sha ni khu 
[\[283a.5\]]chu dang khrag las byung ba'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/sems can gyis de'i dri tshor na yang thams cad 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur te/_shen pa dang /_gdol pa la sogs pa bzhin du khyi rnams kyis mthong na yang de la sngang zhing 'jigs pas khyis zugs pa'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[283a.6\]]rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi byams pa'i sems skye bar mi byed pa'i phyir sha bza' bar mi rigs so/_/'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo dag brkam zhing dri mi zhim par 'gyur la snyan pa'i grags pa med pa'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/rig sngags rnams sgrub pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir sha bza' bar mi 
[\[283a.7\]]bya'o/_/'di ltar srog gcod pa ni gzugs mthong ma thag tu mngon par chags pa'i sems skyed par byed pa'i phyir sha mi za'o/_/gang sha za ba de dag la ni lha rnams kyis spong bar byed pa'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/kha'i dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba'i phyir yang sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/rmi lam ngan pa mang 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]ba'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/dgon pa'i gnas nags tshal dag na gnas pa'i tshe stag dang spyang ki la sogs pas dri tshor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/zas kyi tshod mi zin par byed pa'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/rnal 'byor pa rnams yongs su skyo ba'i sems skye 
[\[283b.2\]]bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/ngas rtag tu ji tsam du bza' ba dang btung ba rnams la bu'i sha'i 'du shes dang /_sman gyi 'du shes bya'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya ste/_ngas sha bza' bar gnang ngo zhes zer na de ni gnas med do/_/gzhan yang 
[\[283b.3\]]blo gros chen po sngon 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po seng ge 'bangs bzang zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_sha sna tshogs la za zhing mi sha yang zos par gyur pas blon po dang /_gnyen dang /_gnyen 'dab kyi skye bo'i tshogs rnams log nas sngon gyi dbang thang rnams kyang bcad pas 
[\[283b.4\]]nyon mongs par gyur to/_/de lta bas na sha za ba la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu yod pa'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po de la srog gcod pa dag ni khe 'dod pa'i phyir srog bcad nas 'tshong bar byed do/_/gang blun po sha za ba de dag ni rin gyis 
[\[283b.5\]]sha rnams nyo bar byed do/_/srog gcod par byed pa de dag khe 'dod pa'i phyir lcags kyu dang rgya rnams kyis srog chags nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /_chu la gnas pa dang /_sa la 'gro ba dag rnam pa du mas gsod cing khe tshol bar byed do/_/blo gros chen po 
[\[283b.6\]]byed du ma bcug pa dang /_ma btsal ba dang /_'du shes med pa zhes bya ba'i sha gang yang med pas de'i phyir sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/blo gros chen po ngas sngar sha rnam pa lnga dang bcu bkag la mdo sde 'dir ni rnam pa thams cad dang dus thams cad du thabs kyis gnang ba 
[\[283b.7\]]thams cad kyang bkag go/_/blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni bza' bar bya ba yang med na nya'i sha za ba lta ci smos te/_gzhan yang byed du mi 'jug go/_/thugs rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]sems can thams cad bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar gzigs te/_de'i phyir bu'i sha bza' bar mi gnang ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sngon chad gnyen bshes 
[\[284a.2\]]byas phyir dang /_/ngan pa mi gtsang 'dres pa dang /_/khu chu khrag las byung ba dang /_/dri tshor thams cad 'jigs skrag pas/_/sha rnams dang ni btsong dag dang /_/ki'u dang byis ku la sogs dang /_/bag med sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i chang /_/rnal 'byor 
[\[284a.3\]]pas ni rtag tu spang /_/'bru mar dag kyang spang bya ste/_/bug phug pa yi khri yang spang /_/srog chags dag ni phra mo rnams/_/de na rab tu 'jigs phyir ro/_/zas las bag med skye bar 'gyur/_/bag med pa las rtog pa skye/_/rtog pa las ni 'dod 
[\[284a.4\]]chags skye/_/de yi phyir na bza' mi bya/_/zas kyi dbang gis 'dod chags skye/_/'dod chags kyis ni sems rmongs byed/_/rmongs pas srid pa'i 'dod pa skyed/_/'khor ba las ni grol mi 'gyur/_/khe yi phyir ni sems can gsod/_/sha yi phyir 
[\[284a.5\]]ni nor sbyin byed/_/gnyi ga sdig pa'i las can pas/_/shi nas 'o dod 'bod par ltung /_/bcol tshol 'du shes de med na/_/rnam gsum dag pa'i sha yang med/_/rgyu med las ni yod min pas/_/de yi phyir na bza' mi bya/_/rnal 'byor pa ni de dag gis/_/
[\[284a.6\]]des na thams cad spang byar bya/_/phyogs bcu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/thams cad rab tu smod par 'gyur/_/gcig la gcig ni za bar byed/_/shi nas gcan gzan rigs su ltung /_/dri mi zhim pa smad pa dang /_/glen pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[284a.7\]]phal cher gdol pa'i rigs su skye/_/rngon pa sme sha can rigs dang /_/yang na 'phra men rigs su skye/_/sha za'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_/srin po byi la la sogs pa'i/_/mngal kun du ni skye bar 'gyur/_/glang po 'ching dang sprin chen dang /_/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]sor mo'i phreng ba'i mdo dag dang /_/lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo 'di las/_/ngas ni sha rnams rab tu bkag_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/nyan thos rnams kyis smad pa dang /_/ngo mi tsha bar za ba ni/_/rtag tu glen par skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[284b.2\]]sngar yang mthong thos dogs pa yi/_/sha rnams thams cad spang bar bshad/_/rtog ge rnams kyis ma rtogs pas/_/de phyir sha zan gnas su skyes/_/ji ltar 'dod chags nyes pa yis/_/'phags pa'i rnam grol sgrib 'gyur zhing /_/sha 
[\[284b.3\]]chang sgog btsong la sogs pa'ang /_/'phags pa'i lam gyi bar chad byed/_/ma 'ongs dus kyi skye bo dag_/sha za gti mug smra ba rnams/_/sha ni sdig med rung bas na/_/sangs rgyas nged la gnang zhes zer/_/zas la sman sten 'du shes dang /_/
[\[284b.4\]]de bzhin bu sha lta bur yang /_/chos shes skyo ba bskyed nas ni/_/rnal 'byor can gyis bsod snyoms spyad/_/snying rje sems la gang gnas pa/_/yongs su skyo bar nga yis bshad/_/stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan rnams/_/rtag tu lhan cig 
[\[284b.5\]]'grogs shing gnas/_/gal te sha rnams za byed na/_/sems can dag ni skrag 'gyur bas/_/de phyir rnal 'byor pa dag gis/_/snying rje'i sems kyis sha mi bza'/_/sha za snying rje shes rab med/_/rnam par grol la rgyab kyis phyogs/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[284b.6\]]rgyal mtshan dag dang 'gal/_/de yi phyir na bza' mi rigs/_/bram ze'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa yi gnas/_/shes rab phyug po'i khyim du skye/_/'di ni sha spangs dbang gis so/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa rin po che'i mdo las sangs rgyas 
[\[284b.7\]]thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis rgya'i slob dpon wen hwi yis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang sbyar nas/_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong 'gos chos grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus//_//
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]{D109}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ga yA shir+Sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ga yA mgo'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[285a.2\]]thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yun ring po ma lon par bcom ldan 'das ri ga yA na ga yA mgo'i mchod rten na/_dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang sngon ral pa can du 
[\[285a.3\]]gyur pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa/_
[\[285a.4\]]dgra bcom pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gcig pu dben par gshegs te/_nang du yang dag bzhag nas chos kyi dbyings nyid la brtags te/_bdag 
[\[285a.5\]]gis byang chub ni thob/_bdag gis ye shes ni khong du chud/_bdag gis bya ba ni byas/_bdag gis khur ni bor/_bdag gis 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las ni rgal/_bdag gis ma rig pa ni bsal/_bdag gis rig pa ni sgrub/_bdag gis zug rngu ni phyung /_
[\[285a.6\]]bdag gi sred pa ni zad/_bdag gis chos kyi gru ni sbyar/_bdag gis chos kyi rnga ni brdungs/_bdag gis chos kyi dung ni bus/_bdag gis chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng /_bdag gis 'khor ba'i lugs ni bzlog_/bdag gis chos kyi lugs ni bsnyad/_
[\[285a.7\]]bdag gis lam ngan pa ni bcad/_bdag gis lam ni yang dag par bstan/_bdag gis zhing ngan pa dag ni rnam par bzlog_/bdag gis bsod nams kyi zhing dag ni yang dag par bstan na/_'di ltar bdag gis byang chub de ji ltar khong du chud pa dang /_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]gang gis khong du chud pa dang /_sus khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i chos de la nges par brtag par bya ste/_ci lus kyis khong du chud dam/_'on te sems kyis khong du chud/_gal te lus kyis khong du chud du ni lus ni bems po/_g.yo ba med pa dang /_rtswa 
[\[285b.2\]]dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_bong ba dang /_mig yor lta bu ste/_sems med pa/_'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa/_pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las byung ba dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_rtag tu bsku ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_mnye dgos pa dang /_
[\[285b.3\]]'jig pa dang /_rnam par 'gyes pa dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can no/_/sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/_gnas med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_dngos po med pa/_bla gab med pa'o/_/byang chub ni 
[\[285b.4\]]ming tsam tha snyad tsam ste/_sgra skad med pa/_dpyad du med pa/_grub pa med pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_'jug pa med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_gdags par bya ba ma yin pa/_'ong ba dang 'gro ba las yang dag par 'das pa/_gdags pa las 
[\[285b.5\]]yang dag par 'das pa/_khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa/_ma mthong ba/_ma thos pa/_bye brag ma phyed pa/_gzhi med pa/_dmigs pa med pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_spros pa med pa/_'jug pa med pa/_brtag tu med pa/_dpag tu med pa/_bstan 
[\[285b.6\]]du med pa/_sgra med pa/_yi ge med pa/_tshig gi lam med pa'o/_/de ltar na su mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba ni gang yin/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni ming 
[\[285b.7\]]tsam/_btags pa tsam/_brda tsam/_tha snyad tsam ste/_brtags pa/_yongs su brtags pa/_ma byung ba/_byung ba med pa/_rdzas ma yin pa/_rdzas med pa/_len pa med pa/_bstan du med pa/_mngon par chags pa med pa yin te/_de la ni 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba su yang med/_cis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang med/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba ci yang med/_rnam pa gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba yang med de/_
[\[286a.2\]]'di la gang de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de'i phyir/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba zhes bya ste/_de la byang chub ni 'gyur ba med pa/_mi 'gyur ba/_mtshan nyid med pa'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal 
[\[286a.3\]]gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos ji ltar byang chub kyi slad du 'jug par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[286a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub de ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub ji ltar rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[286a.5\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub ni khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa/_tha snyad las yang dag par 'das pa/_yi ge'i sgra skad las yang dag par 'das pa/_sgra las yang dag par 'das pa/_'jug pa med pa/_gzod ma nyid nas 
[\[286a.6\]]'jug pa med pa'o/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa la yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi phyir 'jug par bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'jug pa med pa'i 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal dngos po 
[\[286a.7\]]med pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal bla gab med pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer med pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal dor ba med pa dang /_gzhag pa med pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal tha dad pa 
[\[286b.2\]]ma yin pa dang /_tha dad pa med pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/'jam dpal so so yang dag par rig pa'i mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_nam mkha' dang /_chu zla dang /_smig rgyu la 'jug pa ni byang chub la 'jug pa'o/_/de nas lha'i 
[\[286b.3\]]bu zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'od zer gyi 'od kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa rtsom pa ni ci/_gnas ni gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[286b.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i rtsom pa ni snying rje chen po'o/_/gnas ni sems can no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po cis bsdus/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen 
[\[286b.5\]]po ni g.yo med pas bsdus so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal g.yo med pa cis bsdus/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yo med pa ni sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis bsdus pa'o/_/smras pa/_
[\[286b.6\]]'jam dpal sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems cis bsdus/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems ni tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pas bsdus so/_/
[\[286b.7\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa cis bsdus/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_tha dad pa med pa'i spyod pa ni bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]pas bsdus pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi phyir byung ngo /_/
[\[287a.2\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal pha rol tu phyin pa drug ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_
[\[287a.3\]]lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal thabs dang shes rab ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang shes rab 
[\[287a.4\]]ni bag yod pa'i phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal bag yod pa ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag yod pa ni legs par spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal legs par spyod 
[\[287a.5\]]pa rnam pa gsum ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs par spyod pa rnam pa gsum ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_
[\[287a.6\]]lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ni sdom pa'i phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal sdom pa ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa ni tshul bzhin yid la bya ba'i phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam 
[\[287a.7\]]dpal tshul bzhin yid la bya ba ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin yid la bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal so sor rtog pa ci'i phyir byung /_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]rnams kyi so sor rtog pa ni dran pa'i phyir byung ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dag rgyur bsdu ba dang /_'bras bur bsdu bar 'gyur ba du/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[287b.2\]]dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dag rgyur bsdu ba dang /_'bras bur bsdu bar 'gyur ba ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dang po sems bskyed pa dang /_spyod pa dang 'brel pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_skye ba gcig gis thogs 
[\[287b.3\]]pa'o/_/de la dang po sems bskyed pa ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i rgyur blta'o/_/spyod pa dang 'brel pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyur blta'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i rgyur blta'o/_/skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni 'bras bu dang 
[\[287b.4\]]'brel pa'i rgyur blta'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang dper na sa bon btab pa de lta bur ni dang po sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na sa bon las myu gu mngon par 'grub pa de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na sdong bu dang /_
[\[287b.5\]]'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu 'byung ba de lta bur phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na 'bras bu yongs su smin pa de lta bur ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang dper na shing rta 
[\[287b.6\]]mkhan shing bsdu ba shes pa de lta bur ni dang po sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na shing rta'i yan lag yongs su sbyang ba shes pa de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na shing rta yan lag sbyor ba shes pa de lta bur ni phyir mi ldog 
[\[287b.7\]]pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na khal dgal ba shes pa de lta bur ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_lha'i bu gzhan yang zla ba tshes pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub pa de lta bur ni dang po sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]na tshes lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun gyi nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na tshes bcu'i nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de lta bur ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sems 
[\[288a.2\]]bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de lta bur ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nub mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba de lta bur ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 
[\[288a.3\]]blta'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni nyan thos kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni ma nges pa'i sa las yang dag par 
[\[288a.4\]]'da'o/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni nges pa'i phung po la gnas so/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang dang po sems bskyed pa ni yi ge'i phyi mo 'dzin pa'i tshul du blta'o/_/dper na rnam par dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa de lta bur ni spyod pa dang 'brel 
[\[288a.5\]]pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa de lta bur ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa blta'o/_/dper na bstan bcos rnams khong du chud pa de lta bur ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i sems bskyed pa 
[\[288a.6\]]blta'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyur 'brel pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni ye shes dang 'brel pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong ba dang 'brel pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'o/_/
[\[288a.7\]]lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyus bsdus pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni ye shes kyis bsdus pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong bas bsdus pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bus bsdus pa'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyu las yang dag par byung ba'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni ye shes las yang dag par byung ba'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong ba las yang dag par byung ba'o/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bu las yang dag 
[\[288b.2\]]par byung ba'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni rgyu rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni ye shes rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni spong ba rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go/_/sems bskyed 
[\[288b.3\]]pa bzhi pa ni 'bras bu rab tu dbye ba'i yan lag go/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni sman bsdu ba'i tshul du blta'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni sman rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa'i tshul du blta'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni sman sbyor ba la 
[\[288b.4\]]mkhas pa'i tshul du blta'o/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni nad pa gso ba la mkhas pa'i tshul du blta'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang sems bskyed pa dang po ni chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i tshul du blta'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos kyi rgyal 
[\[288b.5\]]po'i rigs kyi rgyud kyi bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul du blta'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud kyi bslab pa tshar phyin pa'i tshul du blta'o/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni chos kyi rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud kyi bslab pa la dbang sgyur 
[\[288b.6\]]ba'i tshul du blta'o/_/de nas lha'i bu 'od rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam gang dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[288b.7\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mdor bsdus pa gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni mdor bsdus na 'di gnyis te/_byang chub sems dpa' dag lam 'di gnyis dang ldan na myur 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_thabs dang shes rab bo/_/de la thabs ni bsdu ba shes pa'o/_/shes rab ni yongs su gcod pa shes pa'o/_/thabs 
[\[289a.2\]]ni sems can la blta ba'o/_/shes rab ni chos thams cad la mi lta ba'o/_/thabs ni chos la sbyor ba shes pa'o/_/shes rab ni bral ba shes pa'o/_/thabs ni rgyu la dmigs pa shes pa'o/_/shes rab ni rgyu zad par 'gro ba'o/_/thabs ni chos tha dad pa 
[\[289a.3\]]shes pa'o/_/shes rab ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa'o/_/thabs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan shes pa'o/_/shes rab ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid dbyer med par shes pa'o/_/thabs ni sems can gyi dbang po dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes 
[\[289a.4\]]pa'o/_/shes rab ni sems can dmigs su med par shes pa'o/_/thabs ni byang chub kyi rgyan thob par byed pa shes pa'o/_/shes rab ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa shes pa'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i 
[\[289a.5\]]lam gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_tshogs kyi lam dang /_yongs su gcod pa'i lam mo/_/de la tshogs kyi lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go/_/yongs su gcod pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te/_
[\[289a.6\]]gnyis gang zhe na/_chags pa dang bcas pa'i lam dang /_chags pa med pa'i lam mo/_/de la chags pa dang bcas pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go/_/chags pa med pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam 
[\[289a.7\]]gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam dang zag pa med pa'i lam mo/_/de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go/_/zag pa med pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_tshad yod par byas pa'i lam dang /_tshad med par byas pa'i lam mo/_/de la tshad yod par byas pa'i lam ni mtshan ma'i gnas so/_/tshad med par byas pa'i lam ni mtshan ma med pa'i gnas so/_/gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis 
[\[289b.2\]]te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_shes pa'i lam dang spong ba'i lam mo/_/de la shes pa'i lam ni sa dang po nas bzung ste sa bdun pa'i bar du'o/_/spong ba'i lam ni sa brgyad pa nas bzung ste sa bcu pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes 
[\[289b.3\]]sgrub pa dpa' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na don gyis rab tu phye ba yin/_ji ltar na ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu don ni 
[\[289b.4\]]ldan pa med pa'o/_/ye shes ni ldan pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir don ni ldan pa med la ye shes ni ldan pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu don ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_chos gang dang yang ldan pa'am mi ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud 
[\[289b.5\]]par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don ni 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin te/_de ni chos gang dang yang ldan pa'am mi ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/don ni gzod ma nas yongs su grub pa med pa'i phyir chos gang dang yang ldan pa'am mi ldan pa ma yin par 
[\[289b.6\]]khong du chud par bya'o/_/don ni dor ba med pa dang gzhag pa med pa'i phyir chos gang dang yang ldan pa'am mi ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o/_/ye shes zhes bya ba ni lam ste/_lam ni sems dang yang dag par ldan pa yin gyi mi ldan pa ma yin te/_rigs 
[\[289b.7\]]kyi bu de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste/_mi ldan pa ma yin no/_/ye shes ni spong ba dang yang dag par ldan pa yin gyi mi ldan pa ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste/_mi ldan pa ma yin no/_/ye shes zhes bya ba ni phung po la 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste/_/
[\[290a.2\]]mi ldan pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rnam pa bcu ste/_rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyu shes pa dang /_'bras bu shes pa dang /_don shes pa dang /_thabs shes pa dang /_shes rab shes pa 
[\[290a.3\]]dang /_bsdu ba shes pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa dang /_snying rje chen po shes pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par shes pa ste/_rigs kyi bu rnam pa de bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[290a.4\]]chen po rnams kyi shes pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtsom pa rnam pa bcu ste/_rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi las yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir lus kyi rtsom pa dang /_sems 
[\[290a.5\]]can thams cad kyi ngag gi las yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir ngag gi rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi las yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir sems kyi rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir nang gi rtsom pa dang /_sems 
[\[290a.6\]]can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir phyi'i rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa kun tu bstan pa'i phyir zhing gi rtsom pa dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[290a.7\]]pa'i nad kyi sman yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i rtsom pa dang /_nges pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de kho na'i rtsom pa dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad la sems mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas kyi 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rtsom pa ste/_/rigs kyi bu rnam pa 'di bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtsom pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyor ba bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[290b.2\]]'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sbyor ba dang /_shes rab kyi sbyor ba dang /_thabs kyi sbyor ba dang /_snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su 
[\[290b.3\]]tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang /_bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba'i sbyor ba dang /_bden pa rnam par dpyad pa'i sbyor ba dang /_sdug pa dang mi sdug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sbyor ba ste/_/rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[290b.4\]]rnams kyi sbyor ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi zad pa la rtog pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_dngos po mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_chos mi zad pa la rtog pa 
[\[290b.5\]]dang /_sred pa mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_lta ba mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_tshogs mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_nye bar len pa mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_mngon par zhen pa med pa mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_'du ba mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po 
[\[290b.6\]]shes pa mi zad pa la rtog pa ste/_rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi zad pa la rtog pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dngos po 
[\[290b.7\]]bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gtong ba'i char rab tu 'bebs pas ser sna'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /_las rnam gsum yongs su sbyong bas 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems 'dul ba nyid dang /_byams pa sgom pas khong khro ba'i sems 'dul 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]ba nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mi skyo bas le lo'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar par rnam par 'phrul pas mi dge ba'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gtan la 
[\[291a.2\]]'bebs pa la mkhas pa'i tshogs sogs pas mi shes pa'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /_lam gyi tshogs bskyed pas nyon mongs pa 'dul ba nyid dang /_phyin ci ma log pa'i lam bskyed pas bden pa'i tshogs sogs pas 'dul ba nyid dang /_dus dang dus ma yin par dbang sgyur 
[\[291a.3\]]bas sems 'dul ba nyid dang /_bdag med pa'i chos la rtogs pas bdag 'dul ba nyid de/_rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dngos po'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub 
[\[291a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dul ba'i sa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi las mi dge ba rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bas lus dul ba nyid dang /_ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi yongs su spong bas ngag dul ba nyid dang /_yid kyi 
[\[291a.5\]]nyes par spyod pa rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bas sems dul ba nyid dang /_rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis nang dul ba nyid dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol gyi yul dul ba nyid dang /_lam la mngon 
[\[291a.6\]]par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis ye shes kyi tshogs la mngon par zhen pa med pa dul ba nyid dang /_'phags pa'i sa'i ngo bo nyid la rtog pa'i tshul gyis bdag la stod pa dul ba nyid dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i tshul gyis phyi ma'i mtha' rnam 
[\[291a.7\]]par dag pa yongs su sbyong ba dul ba nyid dang /_sems can thams cad la mi slu ba'i tshul gyis tha snyad shin tu yongs su dul ba nyid dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul gyis lus dang sems la mi lta ba dul ba 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]nyid de/_rigs kyi bu bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dul ba'i sa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yin te/_log par 
[\[291b.2\]]sgrub pa snying por byed pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/de la sgrub pa snying por byed pa ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin no/_/log par sgrub pa snying por byed pa ni tshig gi dngos po kho na'o/_/de ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa mang ba yin gyi/_log par sgrub 
[\[291b.3\]]pa snying por byed pa mang ba ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gnyis po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lam sgrub pa dang /_spong ba sgrub pa ste/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[291b.4\]]gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag 'dul ba'i sgrub 
[\[291b.5\]]pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgrub pa ste/_/rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub 
[\[291b.6\]]pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_/rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i shes pas sgrub pa dang /_lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis sgrub pa ste/_rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o/_/
[\[291b.7\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas par sgrub pa dang /_sa dbyer med pa la mkhas par sgrub pa ste/_rigs 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa'i 
[\[292a.2\]]nyes pa rnam par spong ba'i sgrub pa dang /_sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgrub pa ste/_rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[292a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa bstan pa'i sgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la mkhas pa'i sgrub pa ste/_
[\[292a.4\]]rigs kyi bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa ni 'di lta bu 'di dag ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 
[\[292a.5\]]'bad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sgrub pa rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' ba ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[292a.6\]]'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par bshad pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[292a.7\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa ga yA mgo'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
